Quote: If a man will begin with certainties, he shall end in doubts; but if he will be content to begin with doubts, he shall end in certainties.

Author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Eat, Pray, Love
Quote: The Bhagavad Gita--that ancient Indian Yogic text--says that it is better to live your own destiny imperfectly than to live an imitation of somebody else's life with perfection.

Author: Khloe Kardashian
Quote: I don't believe in revenge. When people are bullies it's because of a deeper-rooted issue - either their family life is tough or they're being bullied by someone bigger than they are.

Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote: Sometimes I lie awake at night, and I ask, 'Where have I gone wrong'.Then a voice says to me, 'This is going to take more than one night.

Author: Mae West
Quote: I'll try anything once, twice if I like it, three times to make sure.

Author: Dennis Banks
Quote: Since the beginning, Native Peoples lived a life of being in harmony with all that surrounds us.

Author: Dalai Lama XIV
Quote: There is a saying in Tibetan, 'Tragedy should be utilized as a source of strength.'No matter what sort of difficulties, how painful experience is, if we lose our hope, that's our real disaster.

Author: Aldous Huxley
Quote: Maybe this world is another planet’s hell.

Author: Katharine Weber,  The Music Lesson
Quote: Life seems sometimes like nothing more than a series of losses, from beginning to end. That's the given. How you respond to those losses, what you make of what's left, that's the part you have to make up as you go.

Author: Marcus Samuelsson
Quote: For many of us, clean water is so plentiful and readily available that we rarely, if ever, pause to consider what life would be like without it.

Author: Elie Wiesel
Quote: That I survived the Holocaust and went on to love beautiful girls, to talk, to write, to have toast and tea and live my life - that is what is abnormal.

Author: Neil Gaiman,  The Sandman, Vol. 1: Preludes and Nocturnes
Quote: You get what anybody gets - you get a lifetime.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Dear John
Quote: When I look in the mirror, I know I’m looking at someone who isn’t sure she deserves to be loved at all.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: One of my main regrets in life is giving considerable thought to inconsiderate people.

Author: Victoria Osteen
Quote: Reality TV is to popular because it allows so many people to sit on the sidelines and just watch somebody else's life. God is saying, 'Don't sit on the sidelines of life. I have put so much in you, but you have got to be strong and very courageous. You have got to step out in faith.'

Author: Anaïs Nin
Quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.

Author: Erica Jong
Quote: I have accepted fear as part of life – specifically the fear of change... I have gone ahead despite the pounding in the heart that says: turn back....

Author: Charles Darwin,  The Life & Letters of Charles Darwin
Quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.

Author: Stephen Vincent Benet
Quote: Life is not lost by dying; life is lost minute by minute, day by dragging day, in all the thousand small uncaring ways.

Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote: I believe in being strong when everything seems to be going wrong. I believe that happy girls are the prettiest girls. I believe that tomorrow is another day, and I believe in miracles

Author: Jonathan Safran Foer,  Everything Is Illuminated
Quote: If there is no love in the world, we will make a new world, and we will give it walls, and we will furnish it with soft, red interiors, from the inside out, and give it a knocker that resonates like a diamond falling to a jeweller's felt so that we should never hear it. Love me, because love doesn't exist, and I have tried everything that does.

Author: Lester Holt
Quote: What I've come to know is that in life, it's not always the questions we ask, but rather our ability to hear the answers that truly enriches our understanding. Never, never stop learning.

Author: Judy Blume
Quote: My only advice is to stay aware, listen carefully, and yell for help if you need it.

Author: Groucho Marx
Quote: The secret of life is honesty and fair dealing. If you can fake that, you've got it made.

Author: Johnny Weir
Quote: I'm not ashamed to be me. More than anyone else I know, I love my life and accept myself. What's wrong with being unique? I am proud of everything that I am and will become.

Author: Ariana Grande
Quote: Love is a really scary thing, and you never know what's going to happen. It's one of the most beautiful things in life, but it's one of the most terrifying. It's worth the fear because you have more knowledge, experience, you learn from people, and you have memories.

Author: Amy Tan
Quote: If you can't change your fate, change your attitude.

Author: Kenneth Branagh
Quote: Lighten up, just enjoy life, smile more, laugh more, and don't get so worked up about things.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: It is not the length of life, but the depth.

Author: Skylar Grey
Quote: Your personal life, your professional life, and your creative life are all intertwined. I went through a few very difficult years where I felt like a failure. But it was actually really important for me to go through that. Struggle, for me, is the most inspirational thing in the world at the end of the day - as long as you treat it that way.

Author: Miley Cyrus
Quote: God wants my life to be about being successful and being happy and blessing other people and being blessed.

Author: Ben Okri
Quote: The most authentic thing about us is our capacity to create, to overcome, to endure, to transform, to love and to be greater than our suffering.

Author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower
Quote: I just need to know that someone out there listens and understands and doesn't try to sleep with someone even if they could have. I need to know these people exist.

Author: Ralph Ellison,  Invisible Man
Quote: Life is to be lived, not controlled; and humanity is won by continuing to play in face of certain defeat.

Author: James E. Faust
Quote: All of us suffer some injuries from experiences that seem to have no rhyme or reason. We cannot understand or explain them. We may never know why some things happen in this life. The reason for some of our suffering is known only to the Lord.

Author: Lillian Gish
Quote: A happy life is one spent in learning, earning, and yearning.

Author: Alice Hoffman,  Practical Magic
Quote: Sometimes the right thing feels all wrong until it is over and done with.

Author: Kareena Kapoor Khan
Quote: Life is full of happiness and tears; be strong and have faith.

Author: Katharine Hepburn,  Me: Stories of My Life
Quote: We are taught you must blame your father, your sisters, your brothers, the school, the teachers - but never blame yourself. It's never your fault. But it's always your fault, because if you wanted to change you're the one who has got to change.

Author: Juan Pablo Galavis
Quote: In life, you have to take the pace that love goes. You don't force it. You just don't force love, you don't force falling in love, you don't force being in love - you just become. I don't know how to say that in English, but you just feel it.

Author: Lana Del Rey
Quote: I have a personal ambition to live my life honestly and honor the true love that I've had and also the people I've had around me. I want to stay hopeful, even though I get scared about why we're even alive at all.

Author: James Hilton,  Lost Horizon
Quote: People make mistakes in life through believing too much, but they have a damned dull time if they believe too little.

Author: Simone de Beauvoir,  La Vieillesse
Quote: I am incapable of conceiving infinity, and yet I do not accept finity. I want this adventure that is the context of my life to go on without end.

Author: Neil Gaiman,  M Is for Magic
Quote: Stories you read when you're the right age never quite leave you. You may forget who wrote them or what the story was called. Sometimes you'll forget precisely what happened, but if a story touches you it will stay with you, haunting the places in your mind that you rarely ever visit.

Author: Waris Dirie
Quote: I love life. I wish I could live another 500 years, truly. There is so much to do. I don't feel bitter or angry or disappointed. If anything, I am very grateful for where I come from. I have absolutely no regrets.

Author: John Lennon
Quote: Living is Easy with Eyes Closed.

Author: Lemony Snicket,  Horseradish
Quote: There are times to stay put, and what you want will come to you, and there are times to go out into the world and find such a thing for yourself.

Author: Robin Quivers
Quote: I'm nutty for nutrition. I've become one of those people who can't stop talking about the connection between food and health. Now that I know how much changing what you eat can transform your life, I can't stop proselytizing.

Author: Kami Garcia,  Beautiful Creatures
Quote: The right thing and the easy thing are never the same.

Author: Brendon Burchard
Quote: Have you ever played a video game that didn't have escalating levels of difficulty? Well, life can feel like play, too, when we purposefully engage in activities that demand we test and develop our skills.

Author: Juliana Hatfield
Quote: If you want to achieve things in life, you've just got to do them, and if you're talented and smart, you'll succeed.

Author: Laura Ingalls Wilder
Quote: The real things haven't changed. It is still best to be honest and truthful; to make the most of what we have; to be happy with simple pleasures; and have courage when things go wrong.

Author: Mike Huckabee
Quote: I'm in this wonderful place of life, where everything I'm doing is something I do because I enjoy it.

Author: Tom Clancy
Quote: The difference between fiction and reality? Fiction has to make sense.

Author: S. Jay Olshansky
Quote: I'm not sure the least educated members of the population are missing out on the advances in medical technology as much as they are adopting harmful behavioral habits that shorten their life.

Author: Hunter S. Thompson
Quote: Life has become immeasurably better since I have been forced to stop taking it seriously.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Dear John
Quote: I'd learned that some things are best kept secret.

Author: Toni Morrison
Quote: We die. That may be the meaning of life. But we do language. That may be the measure of our lives.

Author: Emo Philips
Quote: You don't appreciate a lot of stuff in school until you get older. Little things like being spanked every day by a middle-aged woman: Stuff you pay good money for in later life.

Author: John Irving,  A Prayer for Owen Meany
Quote: If you care about something you have to protect it – If you’re lucky enough to find a way of life you love, you have to find the courage to live it.

Author: Veronica Roth,  Insurgent
Quote: No matter how long you train someone to be brave, you never know if they are or not until something real happens.

Author: George Saunders,  The Braindead Megaphone
Quote: Don't be afraid to be confused. Try to remain permanently confused. Anything is possible. Stay open, forever, so open it hurts, and then open up some more, until the day you die, world without end, amen.

Author: Harry Callahan
Quote: I wish more people felt that photography was an adventure the same as life itself and felt that their individual feelings were worth expressing. To me, that makes photography more exciting.

Author: Gustav Mahler
Quote: I also had a brother who was like me a musician and a composer. A man of great talent, far more gifted than I. He died very young... he killed himself in the prime of his life.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.

Author: Coco Chanel
Quote: You live but once; you might as well be amusing.

Author: Antonio Tabucchi
Quote: People with lots of doubts sometimes find life more oppressive and exhausting than others, but they're more energetic - they aren't robots.

Author: Guillaume Apollinaire
Quote: Now and then it's good to pause in our pursuit of happiness and just be happy.

Author: George R.R. Martin,  A Game of Thrones
Quote: Death is so terribly final, while life is full of possibilities.

Author: Kobayashi Issa,  Poems
Quote: What a strange thing!to be alivebeneath cherry blossoms.

Author: Oliver James
Quote: why are trying so hard to fit in, when you're born to stand out

Author: Henry Ford
Quote: The highest use of capital is not to make more money, but to make money do more for the betterment of life.

Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.

Author: Monica Ali,  Brick Lane
Quote: The thing about getting older is that you don't need everything to be possible any more, you just need things to be certain.

Author: Steven Patrick Morrissey
Quote: Life's full of tricky snakes and ladders.

Author: Leo Buscaglia
Quote: Love is life. And if you miss love, you miss life.

Author: Marie Curie
Quote: Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood. Now is the time to understand more, so that we may fear less.

Author: Thomas Keneally,  Schindler's List
Quote: Whoever saves one life, saves the world entire.

Author: Geraldine Ferraro
Quote: If you think somebody cares about you and believes your life is worth saving, how can you give up?

Author: Confucius
Quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.

Author: Stephenie Meyer,  Twilight
Quote: Death is Peaceful, Life is Harder

Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.

Author: Henry David Thoreau,  Civil Disobedience and Other Essays
Quote: Most men lead lives of quiet desperation and go to the grave with the song still in them.

Author: Nikos Kazantzakis,  Zorba the Greek
Quote: I felt once more how simple and frugal a thing is happiness: a glass of wine, a roast chestnut, a wretched little brazier, the sound of the sea. Nothing else.

Author: Akhil Sharma
Quote: I am shamelessly biased about the people in my life, and it makes sense to me that other people are the same.

Author: أحمد خالد توفيق
Quote: لا أخاف الموت ..أخاف أن أموت قبل أن أحيا

Author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Fight Club
Quote: At the time, my life just seemed too complete, and maybe we have to break everything to make something better out of ourselves.

Author: Margaret Mitchell,  Gone with the Wind
Quote: After all, tomorrow is another day!

Author: Sylvia Plath
Quote: Wear your heart on your skin in this life.

Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
Quote: It was only a sunny smile, and little it cost in the giving, but like morning light it scattered the night and made the day worth living.

Author: John Keats,  Letters of John Keats
Quote: Do you not see how necessary a world of pains and troubles is to school an intelligence and make it a soul?

Author: Nancy Reagan
Quote: To my young friends out there: Life can be great, but not when you can't see it. So, open your eyes to life: to see it in the vivid colors that God gave us as a precious gift to His children, to enjoy life to the fullest, and to make it count. Say yes to your life.

Author: Lauren Myracle
Quote: I live in my own little world. But its ok, they know me here.

Author: Preity Zinta
Quote: People will always have an opinion, but you have to live life the way you want to. It's very easy to tell others what to do, but difficult to implement it on yourself.

Author: William Goldman,  The Princess Bride
Quote: Life isn't fair, it's just fairer than death, that's all.

Author: Malala Yousafzai
Quote: In some parts of the world, students are going to school every day. It's their normal life. But in other part of the world, we are starving for education... it's like a precious gift. It's like a diamond.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  The Truth About Forever
Quote: Some people, they can't just move on, you know, mourn and cry and be done with it. Or at least seem to be. But for me... I don't know. I didn't want to fix it, to forget. It wasn't something that was broken. It's just...something that happened. And like that hole, I'm just finding ways, every day, of working around it. Respecting and remembering and getting on at the same time.

Author: Katherine Jenkins
Quote: Children should be able to live a life free from bullying and harassment and it is time that we all took a stand against this.

Author: Henry Miller,  Stand Still Like the Hummingbird
Quote: Let me be, was all I wanted. Be what I am, no matter how I am.

Author: Mary Manin Morrissey
Quote: Even though you may want to move forward in your life, you may have one foot on the brakes. In order to be free, we must learn how to let go. Release the hurt. Release the fear. Refuse to entertain your old pain. The energy it takes to hang onto the past is holding you back from a new life. What is it you would let go of today?

Author: Merlin Olsen
Quote: One of life's most painful moments comes when we must admit that we didn't do our homework, that we are not prepared.

Author: Sophie Kinsella,  The Undomestic Goddess
Quote: There’s no such thing as ruining your life. Life’s a pretty resilient thing, it turns out.

Author: Randy Pausch,  The Last Lecture
Quote: We cannot change the cards we are dealt, just how we play the hand.

Author: Dan Marino
Quote: I'm getting married because I'm in love with a girl and want to spend my life with her. You can't live your life doing what other people want you to or you'll be miserable. At some point you just have to be yourself.

Author: Rosa Parks
Quote: Each person must live their life as a model for others.

Author: Gerard Way
Quote: Sometimes you have to kind of die inside in order to rise from your own ashes and believe in yourself and love yourself to become a new person.

Author: Joan of Arc
Quote: One life is all we have and we live it as we believe in living it. But to sacrifice what you are and to live without belief, that is a fate more terrible than dying.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  Eleven Minutes
Quote: I can choose either to be a victim of the world or an adventurer in search of treasure. It's all a question of how I view my life.

Author: Sally Ride
Quote: I think it's important for little girls growing up, and young women, to have one in every walk of life. So from that point of view, I'm proud to be a role model!

Author: Anatole France
Quote: All changes, even the most longed for, have their melancholy; for what we leave behind us is a part of ourselves; we must die to one life before we can enter another.

Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote: I think I've discovered the secret of life -- you just hang around until you get used to it.

Author: Deb Caletti
Quote: That's what people do who love you. They put their arms around you and love you when you're not so lovable.

Author: William Wordsworth
Quote: Life is divided into three terms - that which was, which is, and which will be. Let us learn from the past to profit by the present, and from the present, to live better in the future.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Sometimes life knocks you on your ass... get up, get up, get up!!! Happiness is not the absence of problems, it's the ability to deal with them.

Author: Hunter S. Thompson,  Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas
Quote: No sympathy for the devil; keep that in mind. Buy the ticket, take the ride...and if it occasionally gets a little heavier than what you had in mind, well...maybe chalk it off to forced conscious expansion: Tune in, freak out, get beaten.

Author: bell hooks
Quote: There is no life to be found in violence. Every act of violence brings us closer to death. Whether it's the mundane violence we do to our bodies by overeating toxic food or drink or the extreme violence of child abuse, domestic warfare, life-threatening poverty, addiction, or state terrorism.

Author: Lily Tomlin
Quote: The trouble with being in the rat race is that even if you win, you're still a rat.

Author: Gautama Buddha
Quote: You can search throughout the entire universe for someone who is more deserving of your love and affection than you are yourself, and that person is not to be found anywhere. You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.

Author: Pope Paul VI
Quote: Somebody should tell us, right at the start of our lives, that we are dying. Then we might live life to the limit, every minute of every day. Do it! I say. Whatever you want to do, do it now! There are only so many tomorrows.

Author: Maya Angelou
Quote: Eating is so intimate. It's very sensual. When you invite someone to sit at your table and you want to cook for them, you're inviting a person into your life.

Author: Virginia Woolf
Quote: When you consider things like the stars, our affairs don't seem to matter very much, do they?

Author: Oliver Goldsmith
Quote: Life is a journey that must be traveled no matter how bad the roads and accommodations.

Author: Gustave Flaubert
Quote: There is not a particle of life which does not bear poetry within it

Author: Saint Patrick
Quote: If I have any worth, it is to live my life for God so as to teach these peoples; even though some of them still look down on me.

Author: John W. Gardner
Quote: Life is the art of drawing without an eraser.

Author: Lana Del Rey
Quote: I have a personal ambition to live my life honestly and honor the true love that I've had and also the people I've had around me. I want to stay hopeful, even though I get scared about why we're even alive at all.

Author: Tracy McMillan
Quote: Caring - about people, about things, about life - is an act of maturity.

Author: Connie Willis,  Passage
Quote: That's what literature is. It's the people who went before us, tapping out messages from the past, from beyond the grave, trying to tell us about life and death! Listen to them!

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Blind Willow, Sleeping Woman: 24 Stories
Quote: Death is not the opposite of life, but a part of it.

Author: Leo Tolstoy
Quote: In the name of God, stop a moment, cease your work, look around you.

Author: Daniel Libeskind
Quote: Life it is not just a series of calculations and a sum total of statistics, it's about experience, it's about participation, it is something more complex and more interesting than what is obvious.

Author: Khalil Gibran
Quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.

Author: Aristotle
Quote: Those who educate children well are more to be honored than they who produce them; for these only gave them life, those the art of living well.

Author: Kurt Vonnegut,  Cat's Cradle
Quote: Tiger got to hunt, bird got to fly;Man got to sit and wonder 'why, why, why?'Tiger got to sleep, bird got to land;Man got to tell himself he understand.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
Quote: There is no good and evil, there is only power and those too weak to seek it.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: How would your life be different if…You stopped making negative judgmental assumptions about people you encounter? Let today be the day…You look for the good in everyone you meet and respect their journey.

Author: Richard Dawkins
Quote: Don't kid yourself that you're going to live again after you're dead; you're not. Make the most of the one life you've got. Live it to the full.

Author: Saul Bellow,  Herzog
Quote: Unexpected intrusions of beauty. This is what life is.

Author: Jeffrey Kluger
Quote: It's one of the worst-kept secrets of family life that all parents have a preferred son or daughter, and the rules for acknowledging it are the same everywhere: The favored kids recognize their status and keep quiet about it - the better to preserve the good thing they've got going and to keep their siblings off their back.

Author: Andrew Solomon,  The Noonday Demon: An Atlas of Depression
Quote: Listen to the people who love you. Believe that they are worth living for even when you don't believe it. Seek out the memories depression takes away and project them into the future. Be brave; be strong; take your pills. Exercise because it's good for you even if every step weighs a thousand pounds. Eat when food itself disgusts you. Reason with yourself when you have lost your reason.

Author: W. Somerset Maugham,  Books and You
Quote: To acquire the habit of reading is to construct for yourself a refuge from almost all the miseries of life.

Author: H.P. Lovecraft
Quote: Almost nobody dances sober, unless they happen to be insane.

Author: Michel de Montaigne
Quote: The value of life lies not in the length of days, but in the use we make of them... Whether you find satisfaction in life depends not on your tale of years, but on your will.

Author: Khalil Gibran
Quote: March on. Do not tarry. To go forward is to move toward perfection. March on, and fear not the thorns, or the sharp stones on life's path.

Author: Neil Gaiman,  The Graveyard Book
Quote: Face your life, its pain, its pleasure, leave no path untaken.

Author: Buddha
Quote: To be idle is a short road to death and to be diligent is a way of life; foolish people are idle, wise people are diligent.

Author: Wayne W. Dyer
Quote: How people treat you is their karma; how you react is yours.

Author: John Burroughs,  Studies in Nature and Literature
Quote: Do not despise your own place and hour. Every place is under the stars, every place is the center of the world.

Author: Leonardo DiCaprio
Quote: If you can do what you do best and be happy, you're further along in life than most people.

Author: Jack Kerouac,  On the Road
Quote: A pain stabbed my heart, as it did every time I saw a girl I loved who was going the opposite direction in this too-big world.

Author: John Updike
Quote: Rain is grace; rain is the sky descending to the earth; without rain, there would be no life.

Author: Andrew Solomon,  The Noonday Demon: An Atlas of Depression
Quote: I believe that words are strong, that they can overwhelm what we fear when fear seems more awful than life is good.

Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote: The biggest adventure you can ever take is to live the life of your dreams.

Author: Voltaire
Quote: Each player must accept the cards life deals him or her: but once they are in hand, he or she alone must decide how to play the cards in order to win the game.

Author: Dale Carnegie,  How to Win Friends and Influence People
Quote: Don't be afraid of enemies who attack you. Be afraid of the friends who flatter you.

Author: Ayn Rand
Quote: Why do they always teach us that it's easy and evil to do what we want and that we need discipline to restrain ourselves? It's the hardest thing in the world--to do what we want. And it takes the greatest kind of courage. I mean, what we really want.

Author: Eric Idle
Quote: I have been very blessed in my life and rewarded with good friends and good health. I am grateful and happy to be able to share this.

Author: Cristiano Ronaldo
Quote: Without football, my life is worth nothing.

Author: Woody Allen
Quote: If you want to make God laugh, tell him about your plans.

Author: Antonio Porchia
Quote: One lives in the hope of becoming a memory.

Author: Isaac Asimov
Quote: Life is pleasant. Death is peaceful. It's the transition that's troublesome.

Author: Jacques Yves Cousteau
Quote: Water and air, the two essential fluids on which all life depends, have become global garbage cans.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: There is some kind of a sweet innocence in being human- in not having to be just happy or just sad- in the nature of being able to be both broken and whole, at the same time.

Author: Nuno Bettencourt
Quote: Having a baby is one of the most wonderful things in your life, as well as the hardest thing in your life.

Author: T.S. Eliot
Quote: Do I dare Disturb the universe? In a minute there is time For decisions and revisions which a minute will reverse.

Author: Khalil Gibran
Quote: Your children are not your children. They are the sons and daughters of Life's longing for itself. They came through you but not from you and though they are with you yet they belong not to you.

Author: Veronica Roth,  Divergent
Quote: One ChoiceOne Choice, decided your friends.One Choice, defines your beliefs.One Choice, determines your loyalties - Forever.ONCE CHOICE CAN TRANSFORM YOU

Author: Cassandra Clare
Quote: If there's a thing I've learned in my life it's to not be afraid of the responsibility that comes with caring for other people. What we do for love: those things endure. Even if the people you do them for don't

Author: Simone de Beauvoir
Quote: I am awfully greedy; I want everything from life. I want to be a woman and to be a man, to have many friends and to have loneliness, to work much and write good books, to travel and enjoy myself, to be selfish and to be unselfish… You see, it is difficult to get all which I want. And then when I do not succeed I get mad with anger.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: The only person who can pull me down is myself, and I'm not going to let myself pull me down anymore.

Author: Ernest Hemingway
Quote: Every man's life ends the same way. It is only the details of how he lived and how he died that distinguish one man from another.

Author: Immanuel Kant
Quote: Science is organized knowledge. Wisdom is organized life.

Author: Mark Haddon,  The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time
Quote: I think prime numbers are like life. They are very logical but you could never work out the rules, even if you spent all your time thinking about them

Author: Ruth Reichl
Quote: Pull up a chair. Take a taste. Come join us. Life is so endlessly delicious.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of other's opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary.

Author: Rainer Maria Rilke,  Rilke's Book of Hours: Love Poems to God
Quote: I live my life in widening circles that reach out across the world.

Author: Josie Maran
Quote: There's so much to appreciate about my life every single day, and I make a big point of taking time to smell the roses and noticing how lucky I am. I never want to take that for granted.

Author: Nicole Sobon,  Program 13
Quote: Sometimes the hardest part isn't letting go but rather learning to start over.

Author: Jennifer Aniston
Quote: I think it's important to have closure in any relationship that ends - from a romantic relationship to a friendship. You should always have a sense of clarity at the end and know why it began and why it ended. You need that in your life to move cleanly into your next phase.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  Brida
Quote: Accept what life offers you and try to drink from every cup. All wines should be tasted; some should only be sipped, but with others, drink the whole bottle.

Author: Confucius
Quote: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.

Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote: The most important thing is to enjoy your life - to be happy - it's all that matters.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: Lots of things can be fixed. Things can be fixed. But many times, relationships between people cannot be fixed, because they should not be fixed. You're aboard a ship setting sail, and the other person has joined the inland circus, or is boarding a different ship, and you just can't be with each other anymore. Because you shouldn't be.

Author: Buddha
Quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.

Author: Jenny O'Connell,  The Book of Luke
Quote: [H]iding how you really feel and trying to make everyone happy doesn't make you nice, it just makes you a liar.

Author: Kirk Cameron
Quote: It is my goal to love everyone. I hate no one. Regardless of their race, religion, their proclivities, the desire of their heart and how they want to live their life and the decisions that they make. I can even respect people's decisions and lifestyle choices just as I hope they have the courtesy to respect my decisions and my choices.

Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quote: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  Mockingjay
Quote: That what I need to survive is not Gale's fire, kindled with rage and hatred. I have plenty of fire myself. What I need is the dandelion in the spring. The bright yellow that means rebirth instead of destruction. The promise that life can go on, no matter how bad our losses. That it can be good again. And only Peeta can give me that.

Author: Cesare Pavese
Quote: We do not remember days, we remember moments.

Author: Douglas Adams,  The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
Quote: This must be Thursday,' said Arthur to himself, sinking low over his beer. 'I never could get the hang of Thursdays.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: Never complain, never explain. Resist the temptation to defend yourself or make excuses.

Author: John Green,  Paper Towns
Quote: Nothing ever happens like you imagine it will

Author: Virginia Woolf
Quote: Growing up is losing some illusions, in order to acquire others.

Author: Abraham Lincoln
Quote: In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.

Author: Coco Chanel
Quote: Simplicity is the keynote of all true elegance.

Author: Marcus Aurelius
Quote: Very little is needed to make a happy life; it is all within yourself, in your way of thinking.

Author: Thomas A. Edison
Quote: Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: I think that we are like stars. Something happens to burst us open; but when we burst open and think we are dying; we’re actually turning into a supernova. And then when we look at ourselves again, we see that we’re suddenly more beautiful than we ever were before!

Author: Sholom Aleichem
Quote: Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy for the poor.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I can tell if two people are in love by how they hold each other’s hands, and how thick their sanitation gloves are.

Author: Nikolai Gogol
Quote: I am fated to journey hand in hand with my strange heroes and to survey the surging immensity of life, to survey it through the laughter that all can see and through the tears unseen and unknown by anyone.

Author: Steven Adler
Quote: Every musician, their goal in life is to play music that people love, and I've accomplished my goal. I was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and left that chapter of my life and those people in the past. Good and bad, I've loved and am thankful for that chapter.

Author: Soren Kierkegaard
Quote: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  The Hunger Games
Quote: We could do it, you know.""What?""Leave the district. Run off. Live in the woods. You and I, we could make it.

Author: Mae West
Quote: It's not the men in your life that matters, it's the life in your men.

Author: Eminem
Quote: The truth is you don't know what is going to happen tomorrow. Life is a crazy ride, and nothing is guaranteed.

Author: John Steinbeck,  Travels with Charley: In Search of America
Quote: What good is the warmth of summer, without the cold of winter to give it sweetness.

Author: Rumi
Quote: This is love: to fly toward a secret sky, to cause a hundred veils to fall each moment. First to let go of life. Finally, to take a step without feet.

Author: William J. Clinton
Quote: If you live long enough, you'll make mistakes. But if you learn from them, you'll be a better person. It's how you handle adversity, not how it affects you. The main thing is never quit, never quit, never quit.

Author: Søren Kierkegaard
Quote: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.

Author: Sai Baba
Quote: Life is a song - sing it. Life is a game - play it. Life is a challenge - meet it. Life is a dream - realize it. Life is a sacrifice - offer it. Life is love - enjoy it.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Norwegian Wood
Quote: Despite your best efforts, people are going to be hurt when it's time for them to be hurt.

Author: L.M. Montgomery,  Anne of Green Gables
Quote: Life is worth living as long as there's a laugh in it.

Author: Waris Dirie
Quote: I love life. I wish I could live another 500 years, truly. There is so much to do. I don't feel bitter or angry or disappointed. If anything, I am very grateful for where I come from. I have absolutely no regrets.

Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote: Life's most persistent and urgent question is, 'What are you doing for others?'

Author: Cesare Pavese,  Il mestiere di vivere: Diario 1935-1950
Quote: Every luxury must be paid for, and everything is a luxury, starting with being in this world.

Author: George Bernard Shaw,  Man and Superman
Quote: There are two tragedies in life. One is to lose your heart's desire. The other is to gain it.

Author: Edgar Allan Poe
Quote: The best things in life make you sweaty.

Author: Henry Rollins
Quote: Scar tissue is stronger than regular tissue. Realize the strength, move on.

Author: Will Smith
Quote: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.

Author: Dalai Lama
Quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

Author: William Steig,  Dominic
Quote: Oh, Life, I am yours. Whatever it is you want of me, I am ready to give.

Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote: My life is my message.

Author: Elisabeth Kübler-Ross
Quote: People are like stained-glass windows. They sparkle and shine when the sun is out, but when the darkness sets in, their true beauty is revealed only if there is a light from within.

Author: Ann Brashares,  Forever in Blue: The Fourth Summer of the Sisterhood
Quote: Parents were the only ones obligated to love you; from the rest of the world you had to earn it.

Author: Jean-Paul Sartre
Quote: Everything has been figured out, except how to live.

Author: Henry Miller
Quote: Develop an interest in life as you see it; the people, things, literature, music - the world is so rich, simply throbbing with rich treasures, beautiful souls and interesting people. Forget yourself.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: People have to forgive. We don't have to like them, we don't have to be friends with them, we don't have to send them hearts in text messages, but we have to forgive them, to overlook, to forget. Because if we don't we are tying rocks to our feet, too much for our wings to carry!

Author: Jonathan Safran Foer
Quote: I'm sorry for my inability to let unimportant things go, for my inability to hold on to the important things.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: When in a relationship, a real man doesn't make his woman jealous of others, he makes others jealous of his woman.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  The Alchemist
Quote: I don’t live in either my past or my future. I’m interested only in the present. If you can concentrate always on the present, you’ll be a happy man. Life will be a party for you, a grand festival, because life is the moment we’re living now.

Author: Bertrand Russell
Quote: To fear love is to fear life, and those who fear life are already 3-parts dead.

Author: William Morris
Quote: The true secret of happiness lies in taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Kafka on the Shore
Quote: Every one of us is losing something precious to us. Lost opportunities, lost possibilities, feelings we can never get back again. That’s part of what it means to be alive.

Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote: Life is too short, or too long, for me to allow myself the luxury of living it so badly.

Author: Neil Young
Quote: It's better to burn out than to fade away.

Author: Arthur Rubinstein
Quote: I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.

Author: Henry Miller
Quote: The aim of life is to live, and to live means to be aware, joyously, drunkenly, serenely, divinely aware.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  Brida
Quote: How much I missed, simply because I was afraid of missing it.

Author: Rose Kennedy
Quote: Life isn't a matter of milestones, but of moments.

Author: Michael Cunningham
Quote: One always has a better book in one's mind than one can manage to get onto paper.

Author: William Goldman,  The Princess Bride
Quote: Who says life is fair, where is that written?

Author: Joseph Campbell
Quote: The privilege of a lifetime is being who you are.

Author: Yann Martel,  Life of Pi
Quote: Life is so beautiful that death has fallen in love with it, a jealous, possessive love that grabs at what it can. But life leaps over oblivion lightly, losing only a thing or two of no importance, and gloom is but the passing shadow of a cloud...

Author: Elizabeth Gilbert,  Eat, Pray, Love
Quote: It all goes away. Eventually, everything goes away.

Author: Bertrand Russell
Quote: The good life is one inspired by love and guided by knowledge.

Author: Jean-Paul Sartre
Quote: Man is condemned to be free; because once thrown into the world, he is responsible for everything he does. It is up to you to give [life] a meaning.

Author: Johnny Depp
Quote: My body is my journal, and my tattoos are my story.

Author: William Feather
Quote: One way to get the most out of life is to look upon it as an adventure.

Author: Lauren Oliver,  Delirium
Quote: I know that the whole point—the only point—is tofind the things that matter, and hold on to them, and fight for them, and refuse tolet them go.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This is the best book I've ever written, and it still sucks
Quote: Writers fish for the right words like fishermen fish for, um, whatever those aquatic creatures with fins and gills are called.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: There is nothing more rare, nor more beautiful, than a woman being unapologetically herself; comfortable in her perfect imperfection. To me, that is the true essence of beauty.

Author: Albert Camus
Quote: You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life.

Author: Ray Bradbury
Quote: Learning to let go should be learned before learning to get. Life should be touched, not strangled. You’ve got to relax, let it happen at times, and at others move forward with it.

Author: Theodore Roethke,  Straw for the Fire: From the Notebooks of Theodore Roethke
Quote: Those who are willing to be vulnerable move among mysteries.

Author: Kurt Vonnegut
Quote: One of the few good things about modern times: If you die horribly on television, you will not have died in vain. You will have entertained us.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  The Zahir
Quote: Our true friends are those who are with us when the good things happen. They cheer us on and are pleased by our triumphs. False friends only appear at difficult times, with their sad, supportive faces, when, in fact, our suffering is serving to console them for their miserable lives.

Author: Dan Marino
Quote: I'm getting married because I'm in love with a girl and want to spend my life with her. You can't live your life doing what other people want you to or you'll be miserable. At some point you just have to be yourself.

Author: William Shakespeare
Quote: This life, which had been the tomb of his virtue and of his honour, is but a walking shadow; a poor player, that struts and frets his hour upon the stage, and then is heard no more: it is a tale told by an idiot, full of sound and fury, signifying nothing.

Author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska
Quote: You spend your whole life stuck in the labyrinth, thinking about how you'll escape one day, and how awesome it will be, and imagining that future keeps you going, but you never do it. You just use the future to escape the present.

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  Family Happiness
Quote: A quiet secluded life in the country, with the possibility of being useful to people to whom it is easy to do good, and who are not accustomed to have it done to them; then work which one hopes may be of some use; then rest, nature, books, music, love for one's neighbor — such is my idea of happiness.

Author: Charles Bukowski,  Hot Water Music
Quote: Life's as kind as you let it be.

Author: Leo Buscaglia
Quote: Too often we underestimate the power of a touch, a smile, a kind word, a listening ear, an honest compliment, or the smallest act of caring, all of which have the potential to turn a life around.

Author: Lao Tzu
Quote: Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them - that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.

Author: Benjamin Franklin
Quote: Many people die at twenty five and aren't buried until they are seventy five.

Author: أحمد خالد توفيق
Quote: و شعرت بأن فى روحى ثقباً .. ثقباً يتسع .. و يمتص كل ذكرياتى و حياتى و أحلامى ..وددت لو كان شخص أعرفه بقربى .. أحكى له كل شئ .. أقص عليه حكاية الثقب

Author: Lao Tzu,  Tao Te Ching
Quote: A man with outward courage dares to die; a man with inner courage dares to live.

Author: Julius Erving
Quote: The key to success is to keep growing in all areas of life - mental, emotional, spiritual, as well as physical.

Author: Pope Paul VI
Quote: All life demands struggle. Those who have everything given to them become lazy, selfish, and insensitive to the real values of life. The very striving and hard work that we so constantly try to avoid is the major building block in the person we are today.

Author: David Mitchell,  Cloud Atlas
Quote: I believe there is another world waiting for us. A better world. And I'll be waiting for you there.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Paradoxically though it may seem, it is none the less true that life imitates art far more than art imitates life.

Author: Buddha
Quote: Just as a candle cannot burn without fire, men cannot live without a spiritual life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  It Occurred to Me
Quote: When a girl says she wants to be friends with benefits, I always ask if that includes dental insurance.

Author: Will Smith
Quote: Throughout life people will make you mad, disrespect you and treat you bad. Let God deal with the things they do, cause hate in your heart will consume you too.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Kafka on the Shore
Quote: In everybody’s life there’s a point of no return. And in a very few cases, a point where you can’t go forward anymore. And when we reach that point, all we can do is quietly accept the fact. That’s how we survive.

Author: Diane Von Furstenberg
Quote: When a woman becomes her own best friend life is easier.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
Quote: What would come, would come...and you would have to meet it, when it did.

Author: Dennis Rodman
Quote: This life is like a swimming pool. You dive into the water, but you can't see how deep it is.

Author: W. Somerset Maugham,  The Painted Veil
Quote: How can I be reasonable? To me our love was everything and you were my whole life. It is not very pleasant to realize that to you it was only an episode.

Author: Elbert Hubbard
Quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.

Author: Mark Twain
Quote: Part of the secret of a success in life is to eat what you like and let the food fight it out inside.

Author: Henry Rollins
Quote: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.

Author: Demi Lovato
Quote: He's not your prince charming if he doesn't make sure you know that you're his princess.

Author: Woody Allen
Quote: My one regret in life is that I am not someone else.

Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe,  Faust: First Part
Quote: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.

Author: Martin Lawrence
Quote: I'm most proud of the blessings that God has bestowed upon me, in my life. He's given me the vision to truly see that you can fall down, but you can still get back up. Hopefully I'll learn from my mistakes and have the opportunity to strengthen and improve the next thing I do.

Author: Horace Walpole
Quote: The world is a tragedy to those who feel, but a comedy to those who think.

Author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath
Quote: I wonder why I don't go to bed and go to sleep. But then it would be tomorrow, so I decide that no matter how tired, no matter how incoherent I am, I can skip on hour more of sleep and live.

Author: Wendelin Van Draanen,  Flipped
Quote: Some of us get dipped in flat, some in satin, some in gloss...."He turned to me. "But every once in a while, you find someone who's iridescent, and when you do, nothing will ever compare.

Author: Kevyn Aucoin
Quote: Today I choose life. Every morning when I wake up I can choose joy, happiness, negativity, pain... To feel the freedom that comes from being able to continue to make mistakes and choices - today I choose to feel life, not to deny my humanity but embrace it.

Author: Abraham Lincoln
Quote: I can see how it might be possible for a man to look down upon the earth and be an atheist, but I cannot conceive how a man could look up into the heavens and say there is no God.

Author: Emily Brontë,  Wuthering Heights
Quote: She burned too bright for this world.

Author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky,  White Nights
Quote: But how could you live and have no story to tell?

Author: A. R. Rahman
Quote: Success comes to those who dedicate everything to their passion in life. To be successful, it is also very important to be humble and never let fame or money travel to your head.

Author: Wilma Rudolph
Quote: Winning is great, sure, but if you are really going to do something in life, the secret is learning how to lose. Nobody goes undefeated all the time. If you can pick up after a crushing defeat, and go on to win again, you are going to be a champion someday.

Author: Mark Twain
Quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.

Author: Samuel Beckett
Quote: You're on Earth. There's no cure for that.

Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you've imagined.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I told her I'd wait forever for her, but that was before I found somebody else who'd give me a ride home.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: We all make mistakes, have struggles, and even regret things in our past. But you are not your mistakes, you are not your struggles, and you are here NOW with the power to shape your day and your future.

Author: Stephenie Meyer
Quote: When you can live forever what do you live for?

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: We love life, not because we are used to living but because we are used to loving.

Author: Dr. Seuss,  Oh, The Places You’ll Go!
Quote: Oh the places you'll go! There is fun to be done! There are points to be scored. There are games to be won. And the magical things you can do with that ball will make you the winning-est winner of all.

Author: Helen Keller
Quote: Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much

Author: أنيس منصور
Quote: الإكتشاف ليس أن تجد أرضاً جديدة .. وإنما أن ترى بعيون جديدة

Author: Jack London,  The Call of the Wild
Quote: He was mastered by the sheer surging of life, the tidal wave of being, the perfect joy of each separate muscle, joint, and sinew in that it was everything that was not death, that it was aglow and rampant, expressing itself in movement, flying exultantly under the stars.

Author: Earl Nightingale
Quote: We are at our very best, and we are happiest, when we are fully engaged in work we enjoy on the journey toward the goal we've established for ourselves. It gives meaning to our time off and comfort to our sleep. It makes everything else in life so wonderful, so worthwhile.

Author: Amy Sedaris,  I Like You: Hospitality Under the Influence
Quote: Don't leave a piece of jewelry at his house so you can go back and get it later; he may be with his real girlfriend.

Author: Heath L. Buckmaster,  Box of Hair: A Fairy Tale
Quote: Often, it’s not about becoming a new person, but becoming the person you were meant to be, and already are, but don’t know how to be.

Author: Jeanne Calment
Quote: Always keep your smile. That's how I explain my long life.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: You must learn to let go. Release the stress. You were never in control anyway.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: I can't decide whether I'm a good girl wrapped up in a bad girl, or if I'm a bad girl wrapped up in a good girl. And that's how I know I'm a woman!

Author: Aristotle
Quote: Those who educate children well are more to be honored than they who produce them; for these only gave them life, those the art of living well.

Author: Neil Gaiman,  The Sandman, Vol. 9: The Kindly Ones
Quote: Then, one stupid person, no different from any other stupid person, wanders into your stupid life...you give them a piece of you. They don't ask for it. They do something dumb one day like kiss you or smile at you, and then your life isn't your own anymore.

Author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
Quote: We have always held to the hope, the belief, the conviction that there is a better life, a better world, beyond the horizon.

Author: Bruce Lee
Quote: If you love life, don't waste time, for time is what life is made up of.

Author: Terry Pratchett,  Moving Pictures
Quote: The whole of life is just like watching a film. Only it's as though you always get in ten minutes after the big picture has started, and no-one will tell you the plot, so you have to work it out all yourself from the clues.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: At the end of the day, let there be no excuses, no explanations, no regrets.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quote: My favorite things in life don't cost any money. It's really clear that the most precious resource we all have is time.

Author: J.D. Salinger,  The Catcher in the Rye
Quote: I'm the most terrific liar you ever saw in your life. It's awful. If I'm on my way to the store to buy a magazine, even, and somebody asks me where I'm going, I'm liable to say I'm going to the opera. It's terrible.

Author: Neil Gaiman,  Neverwhere
Quote: You've a good heart. Sometimes that's enough to see you safe wherever you go. But mostly, it's not.

Author: Abraham Lincoln
Quote: Do I not destroy my enemies when I make them my friends?

Author: John Lennon
Quote: Imagine all the people living life in peace. You may say I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one. I hope someday you'll join us, and the world will be as one.

Author: Aristotle
Quote: To perceive is to suffer.

Author: Tupac Shakur
Quote: I know it seems hard sometimes but remember one thing. Through every dark night, there's a bright day after that. So no matter how hard it get, stick your chest out, keep ya head up.... and handle it.

Author: Tony DeLiso,  Legacy: The Power Within
Quote: Keep your best wishes, close to your heart and watch what happens

Author: E.A. Bucchianeri,  Brushstrokes of a Gadfly
Quote: So it’s true, when all is said and done, grief is the price we pay for love.

Author: Valerie Bertinelli
Quote: Happiness is a choice. You can choose to be happy. There's going to be stress in life, but it's your choice whether you let it affect you or not.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Make a pact with yourself today to not be defined by your past. Sometimes the greatest thing to come out of all your hard work isn't what you get for it, but what you become for it. Shake things up today! Be You...Be Free...Share.

Author: Franz Kafka
Quote: The meaning of life is that it stops.

Author: Janet Evanovich
Quote: Romance novels are birthday cake and life is often peanut butter and jelly. I think everyone should have lots of delicious romance novels lying around for those times when the peanut butter of life gets stuck to the roof of your mouth.

Author: Michael Chabon,  Wonder Boys
Quote: There's nothing more embarrassing than to have earned the disfavor of a perceptive animal.

Author: Rashida Jones
Quote: Smiling is definitely one of the best beauty remedies. If you have a good sense of humor and a good approach to life, that's beautiful.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: I'm not in search of sanctity, sacredness, purity; these things are found after this life, not in this life; but in this life I search to be completely human: to feel, to give, to take, to laugh, to get lost, to be found, to dance, to love and to lust, to be so human.

Author: Michelle Obama
Quote: You may not always have a comfortable life and you will not always be able to solve all of the world's problems at once but don't ever underestimate the importance you can have because history has shown us that courage can be contagious and hope can take on a life of its own.

Author: Suzanne Weyn,  Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium
Quote: Your life is an occasion. Rise to it.

Author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez
Quote: nothing in this world was more difficult than love.

Author: Charles Stanley
Quote: Our heavenly Father understands our disappointment, suffering, pain, fear, and doubt. He is always there to encourage our hearts and help us understand that He's sufficient for all of our needs. When I accepted this as an absolute truth in my life, I found that my worrying stopped.

Author: Ernest Hemingway
Quote: I love sleep. My life has the tendency to fall apart when I'm awake, you know?

Author: Vivian Greene
Quote: Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass...It's about learning to dance in the rain.

Author: Tom Brady
Quote: Too often in life, something happens and we blame other people for us not being happy or satisfied or fulfilled. So the point is, we all have choices, and we make the choice to accept people or situations or to not accept situations.

Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
Quote: Life was meant to be lived, and curiosity must be kept alive. One must never, for whatever reason, turn his back on life.

Author: Elizabeth Gilbert
Quote: You were given life; it is your duty (and also your entitlement as a human being) to find something beautiful within life, no matter how slight.

Author: Edith Sitwell
Quote: I have often wished I had time to cultivate modesty...But I am too busy thinking about myself.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.

Author: Neil Gaiman,  The Graveyard Book
Quote: Sleep my little baby-ohSleep until you wakenWhen you wake you'll see the worldIf I'm not mistaken...Kiss a loverDance a measure,Find your nameAnd buried treasure...Face your lifeIts pain, Its pleasure,Leave no path untaken.

Author: Lucas Grabeel
Quote: The greatest thing about where my life is right now is it's very relaxed and chill. I'm just hanging out, being myself and doing my work.

Author: Tom Robbins
Quote: Our lives are not as limited as we think they are; the world is a wonderfully weird place; consensual reality is significantly flawed; no institution can be trusted, but love does work; all things are possible; and we all could be happy and fulfilled if we only had the guts to be truly free and the wisdom to shrink our egos and quit taking ourselves so damn seriously.

Author: Laurell K. Hamilton,  A Stroke of Midnight
Quote: My father had taught me to be nice first, because you can always be mean later, but once you've been mean to someone, they won't believe the nice anymore. So be nice, be nice, until it's time to stop being nice, then destroy them.

Author: Henry Ford
Quote: Life is a series of experiences, each one of which makes us bigger, even though sometimes it is hard to realize this. For the world was built to develop character, and we must learn that the setbacks and grieves which we endure help us in our marching onward.

Author: Rumi
Quote: This is love: to fly toward a secret sky, to cause a hundred veils to fall each moment. First to let go of life. Finally, to take a step without feet.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  The Devilin Fey
Quote: I envy people that know love. That have someone who takes them as they are.

Author: Walt Disney
Quote: All the adversity I've had in my life, all my troubles and obstacles, have strengthened me... You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson,  Journals of Ralph Waldo Emerson, with Annotations - 1841-1844
Quote: Don't be too timid and squeamish about your actions. All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better.

Author: Lauren Kate,  Fallen
Quote: The only way to survive eternity is to be able to appreciate each moment.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Heavenly Fire
Quote: We are all the pieces of what we remember. We hold in ourselves the hopes and fears of those who love us. As long as there is love and memory, there is no true loss.

Author: Osho,  Everyday Osho: 365 Daily Meditations for the Here and Now
Quote: Sadness gives depth. Happiness gives height. Sadness gives roots. Happiness gives branches. Happiness is like a tree going into the sky, and sadness is like the roots going down into the womb of the earth. Both are needed, and the higher a tree goes, the deeper it goes, simultaneously. The bigger the tree, the bigger will be its roots. In fact, it is always in proportion. That's its balance.

Author: Michael Jordan
Quote: I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.

Author: Albert Camus
Quote: Do not wait for the last judgment. It comes every day.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: It is important that we forgive ourselves for making mistakes. We need to learn from our errors and move on.

Author: Coco Chanel
Quote: My life didn't please me, so I created my life.

Author: Hunter S. Thompson,  Fear and Loathing on the Campaign Trail '72
Quote: When the going gets weird, the weird turn professional.

Author: Edgar Allan Poe
Quote: The boundaries which divide Life from Death are at best shadowy and vague. Who shall say where the one ends, and where the other begins?

Author: Sylvia Plath,  The Bell Jar
Quote: But when it came right down to it, the skin of my wrist looked so white and defensless that I couldn't do it. It was as if what I wanted to kill wasn't in that skin or the thin blue pulse that jumped under my thumb, but somewhere else, deeper, more secret, and a whole lot harder to get.

Author: Mark Twain
Quote: When we remember we are all mad, the mysteries disappear and life stands explained.

Author: Mitch Albom,  The Five People You Meet in Heaven
Quote: Sacrifice is a part of life. It's supposed to be. It's not something to regret. It's something to aspire to.

Author: Joss Whedon
Quote: Bottom line is, even if you see 'em coming, you're not ready for the big moments. No one asks for their life to change, not really. But it does. So what are we, helpless? Puppets? No. The big moments are gonna come. You can't help that. It's what you do afterwards that counts. That's when you find out who you are.

Author: Booker T. Washington
Quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.

Author: Mitch Albom,  Tuesdays with Morrie
Quote: Life is a series of pulls back and forth... A tension of opposites, like a pull on a rubber band. Most of us live somewhere in the middle. A wrestling match...Which side win? Love wins. Love always wins

Author: J.K. Rowling
Quote: The best of us must sometimes eat our words.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: I will not try to convince you to love me, to respect me, to commit to me. I deserve better than that; I AM BETTER THAN THAT...Goodbye.

Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quote: The life of the dead is placed in the memory of the living.

Author: Woody Allen,  Illustrated Woody Allen Reader
Quote: I don't want to achieve immortality through my work; I want to achieve immortality through not dying. I don't want to live on in the hearts of my countrymen; I want to live on in my apartment.

Author: B. R. Ambedkar
Quote: Unlike a drop of water which loses its identity when it joins the ocean, man does not lose his being in the society in which he lives. Man's life is independent. He is born not for the development of the society alone, but for the development of his self.

Author: Joyce Giraud
Quote: With me, what you see is what you get. Yes, call me naive, but I love life. I am happy, and for that, I make no apologies. I do like to see the best in people, and when someone is nice to my face, I tend to believe them.

Author: Heraclitus
Quote: No man ever steps in the same river twice, for it's not the same river and he's not the same man.

Author: Rick Yancey,  The 5th Wave
Quote: We’re here, and then we’re gone, and it’s not about the time we’re here, but what we do with the time.

Author: Vladimir Nabokov,  Lolita
Quote: Human life is but a series of footnotes to a vast obscure unfinished masterpiece

Author: Marcus Aurelius,  Meditations
Quote: When you arise in the morning think of what a privilege it is to be alive, to think, to enjoy, to love ...

Author: Jess C. Scott,  The Other Side of Life
Quote: Friends are the family you choose (~ Nin/Ithilnin, Elven rogue).

Author: Bill Watterson
Quote: Reality continues to ruin my life.

Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
Quote: Happiness is not a goal...it's a by-product of a life well lived.

Author: Philip Pullman,  The Golden Compass
Quote: You cannot change what you are, only what you do.

Author: Jesus Christ
Quote: I am the Way, the Truth, and the Life. No one comes to the Father except through me.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Ashes
Quote: Growing up happens when you start having things you look back on and wish you could change -Clary Fray

Author: Nora Roberts
Quote: Magic exists. Who can doubt it, when there are rainbows and wildflowers, the music of the wind and the silence of the stars? Anyone who has loved has been touched by magic. It is such a simple and such an extraordinary part of the lives we live.

Author: Lyle Lovett
Quote: You don't have to have anything in common with people you've known since you were five. With old friends, you've got your whole life in common.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Renew, release, let go. Yesterday’s gone. There’s nothing you can do to bring it back. You can’t “should’ve” done something. You can only DO something. Renew yourself. Release that attachment. Today is a new day!

Author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars
Quote: You do not immortalize the lost by writing about them. Language buries, but does not resurrect.

Author: Tom Hiddleston
Quote: You never know what's around the corner. It could be everything. Or it could be nothing. You keep putting one foot in front of the other, and then one day you look back and you've climbed a mountain.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: Successful people are always looking for opportunities to help others. Unsuccessful people are always asking, "What's in it for me?

Author: Henry Rollins
Quote: Life will not break your heart. It'll crush it.

Author: Ronald Reagan
Quote: Life is one grand, sweet song, so start the music.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: There are people who are generic. They make generic responses and they expect generic answers. They live inside a box and they think people who don't fit into their box are weird. But I'll tell you what, generic people are the weird people. They are like genetically-manipulated plants growing inside a laboratory, like indistinguishable faces, like droids. Like ignorance.

Author: George Bernard Shaw,  Getting Married
Quote: When two people are under the influence of the most violent, most insane, most delusive, and most transient of passions, they are required to swear that they will remain in that excited, abnormal, and exhausting condition continuously until death do them part.

Author: Woody Allen,  Annie Hall: Screenplay
Quote: I feel that life is divided into the horrible and the miserable. That's the two categories. The horrible are like, I don't know, terminal cases, you know, and blind people, crippled. I don't know how they get through life. It's amazing to me. And the miserable is everyone else. So you should be thankful that you're miserable, because that's very lucky, to be miserable.

Author: Stephen King,  The Green Mile
Quote: Time takes it all, whether you want it to or not.

Author: Eric Roth,  The Curious Case of Benjamin Button Screenplay
Quote: Our lives are defined by opportunities, even the ones we miss.

Author: Gary Zukav
Quote: Caregivers attract caregivers and live in a community of love. They are energized by their caring, fulfilled, and they love life. Caretakers attract caretakers and live in the company of resentful victims who see themselves as misused and are fatigued from constant giving with no return.

Author: Bernie Siegel
Quote: Being a survivor doesn't mean being strong - it's telling people when you need a meal or a ride, company, whatever. It's paying attention to heart wisdom, feelings, not living a role, but having a unique, authentic life, having something to contribute, finding time to love and laugh. All these things are qualities of survivors.

Author: أحلام مستغانمي
Quote: عجيبة هي الحياة بمنطقها المعاكس. أنت تركض خلف الأشياء لاهثاً، فتهرب الأشياء منك. وما تكاد تجلس وتقنع نفسك بأنها لا تستحق كل هذا الركض، حتى تأتيك هي لاهثة. وعندها لا تدري أيجب أن تدير لها ظهرك أم تفتح لها ذراعيك، وتتلقى هذه الهبة التي رمتها السماء إليك، والتي قد تكون فيها سعادتك، أو هلاكك؟

Author: George Lucas,  The Star Wars Trilogy
Quote: No! Try not. Do, or do not. There is no try.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: How would your life be different if…You walked away from gossip and verbal defamation? Let today be the day…You speak only the good you know of other people and encourage others to do the same.

Author: Jimi Hendrix
Quote: I'm the one that has to die when it's time for me to die, so let me live my life, the way I want to.

Author: Osho
Quote: To be creative means to be in love with life. You can be creative only if you love life enough that you want to enhance its beauty, you want to bring a little more music to it, a little more poetry to it, a little more dance to it.

Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote: Don’t sacrifice yourself too much, because if you sacrifice too much there’s nothing else you can give and nobody will care for you.

Author: Joss Whedon
Quote: Very occasionally, if you pay really close attention, life doesn't suck.

Author: Alfred Lord Tennyson
Quote: Tears, idle tears, I know not what they mean, Tears from the depths of some devine despairRise in the heart, and gather to the eyes, In looking on the happy autumn fields, And thinking of the days that are no more.

Author: Roman Payne
Quote: She is free in her wildness, she is a wanderess, a drop of free water. She knows nothing of borders and cares nothing for rules or customs. 'Time' for her isn’t something to fight against. Her life flows clean, with passion, like fresh water.

Author: Mahatma Gandhi
Quote: Action expresses priorities.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: Don't think about making life better for other people who don't even deserve you, rather, focus on making your life the best, for yourself and those who love you.

Author: Rabindranath Tagore
Quote: Let your life lightly dance on the edges of Time like dew on the tip of a leaf.

Author: Celia Imrie
Quote: A 'naughty pickle' is how I'd best describe myself. I think fun and laughter is the whole point of life.

Author: Red Haircrow
Quote: You don't have to disrespect and insult others simply to hold your own ground. If you do, that shows how shaky your own position is.

Author: Kirsten Dunst
Quote: You can never control who you fall in love with, even when you're in the most sad, confused time of your life. You don't fall in love with people because they're fun. It just happens.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Life imitates art far more than art imitates Life.

Author: C.S. Lewis
Quote: The future is something which everyone reaches at the rate of sixty minutes an hour, whatever he does, whoever he is.

Author: Hans Christian Andersen,  The Complete Fairy Tales
Quote: Just living is not enough,"said the butterfly, "one must have sunshine, freedom, and a little flower.

Author: Eleanor Roosevelt
Quote: People grow through experience if they meet life honestly and courageously. This is how character is built.

Author: Gordon B. Hinckley
Quote: In all of living, have much fun and laughter. Life is to be enjoyed, not just endured.

Author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.
Quote: Remember that everyone you meet is afraid of something, loves something and has lost something.

Author: William Arthur Ward
Quote: It is wise to direct your anger towards problems -- not people; to focus your energies on answers -- not excuses.

Author: Veronica Roth,  Allegiant
Quote: The person you became with her is worth being.

Author: Richard Bach,  Illusions: The Adventures of a Reluctant Messiah
Quote: Your conscience is the measure of the honesty of your selfishness.Listen to it carefully.

Author: Theodore Roosevelt
Quote: Far and away the best prize that life has to offer is the chance to work hard at work worth doing.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
Quote: If there were such a thing as terminal literalism, you'd have died in childhood.

Author: Ray Bradbury,  Fahrenheit 451
Quote: Don't ask for guarantees. And don't look to be saved in any one thing, person, machine, or library. Do your own bit of saving, and if you drown, at least die knowing you were heading for shore.

Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote: If you want to do really important things in life and big things in life, you can't do anything by yourself. And your best teams are your friends and your siblings.

Author: Gayle Forman,  If I Stay
Quote: I just wanted to tell you that I understand if you go. It’s okay if you have to leave us. It’s okay if you want to stop fighting.

Author: مصطفى محمود,  رحلتي من الشك إلى الإيمان
Quote: الندم هو صوت الفطرة لحظة الخطأ

Author: Joan Lunden
Quote: Holding on to anger, resentment and hurt only gives you tense muscles, a headache and a sore jaw from clenching your teeth. Forgiveness gives you back the laughter and the lightness in your life.

Author: Mark Haddon,  The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-Time
Quote: Prime numbers are what is left when you have taken all the patterns away. I think prime numbers are like life. They are very logical but you could never work out the rules, even if you spent all your time thinking about them.

Author: Mitch Albom,  The Five People You Meet in Heaven
Quote: There are no random acts...We are all connected...You can no more separate one life from another than you can separate a breeze from the wind...

Author: Wayne Dyer
Quote: The essential lesson I've learned in life is to just be yourself. Treasure the magnificent being that you are and recognize first and foremost you're not here as a human being only. You're a spiritual being having a human experience.

Author: Jimi Hendrix
Quote: The story of life is quicker than the wink of an eye, the story of love is hello and goodbye...until we meet again

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I don't understand people who say they need more "Me Time."What other time is there? Do these people spend part of their day in someone else's body?

Author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky
Quote: Man is a mystery. It needs to be unravelled, and if you spend your whole life unravelling it, don't say that you've wasted time. I am studying that mystery because I want to be a human being.

Author: John Wayne
Quote: Tomorrow is the most important thing in life. Comes into us at midnight very clean. It's perfect when it arrives and it puts itself in our hands. It hopes we've learned something from yesterday.

Author: Roma Downey
Quote: People come together with their families to celebrate Easter. What better way to celebrate than to spend a few hours going on the journey of Christ's life.

Author: Zayn Malik
Quote: Life is funny. Things change, people change, but you will always be you, so stay true to yourself and never sacrifice who you are for anyone.

Author: Jonathan Safran Foer,  Everything Is Illuminated
Quote: I don't think that there are any limits to how excellent we could make life seem.

Author: Miriam Toews
Quote: The whole notion of pain, and how every individual experiences pain, is up for debate. We don't know how another person experiences pain - physical pain or psychic pain. Some of these clinics where assisted suicide or euthanasia is practiced, they call it 'weariness of life.'

Author: Dorothy Parker,  The Complete Poems of Dorothy Parker
Quote: Inventory:"Four be the things I am wiser to know:Idleness, sorrow, a friend, and a foe.Four be the things I'd been better without:Love, curiosity, freckles, and doubt.Three be the things I shall never attain:Envy, content, and sufficient champagne.Three be the things I shall have till I die:Laughter and hope and a sock in the eye.

Author: Bob Marley
Quote: Though the road's been rocky it sure feels good to me.

Author: Kenneth Scott Latourette
Quote: The primary source of the appeal of Christianity was Jesus - His incarnation, His life, His crucifixion, and His resurrection.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: If you hang out with chickens, you're going to cluck and if you hang out with eagles, you're going to fly.

Author: Anais Nin
Quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.

Author: Victoria Osteen
Quote: Let me encourage you to get up every day and focus on what you do have in life. Be thankful for the blessings of the little things, even when you don't get what you expect.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Forget yesterday - it has already forgotten you. Don't sweat tomorrow - you haven't even met. Instead, open your eyes and your heart to a truly precious gift - today.

Author: Sidney Sheldon
Quote: Life is like a novel. It's filled with suspense. You have no idea what is going to happen until you turn the page.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  I Want
Quote: I want my kids to have the things in life that I never had when I was growing up. Things like beards and chest hair.

Author: Mary Oliver,  Wild Geese
Quote: You must not ever stop being whimsical. And you must not, ever, give anyone else the responsibility for your life.

Author: Jim Butcher,  Dead Beat
Quote: Life is a journey. Time is a river. The door is ajar

Author: Johnny Depp
Quote: Just keep moving forward and don't give a shit about what anybody thinks. Do what you have to do, for you.

Author: John W. Gardner
Quote: Life is the art of drawing without an eraser.

Author: William Goldman,  The Princess Bride
