Quote: Conventionality is not morality. Self-righteousness is not religion. To attack the first is not to assail the last.

Author: Stephen Jay Gould,  The Mismeasure of Man
Quote: We pass through this world but once. Few tragedies can be more extensive than the stunting of life, few injustices deeper than the denial of an opportunity to strive or even to hope, by a limit imposed from without, but falsely identified as lying within.

Author: Langston Hughes
Quote: Well, I like to eat, sleep, drink, and be in love.I like to work, read, learn, and understand life.

Author: Hanh Nhat Thich
Quote: Drink your tea slowly and reverently, as if it is the axis on which the world earth revolves - slowly, evenly, without rushing toward the future.

Author: Jo Nesbø
Quote: Losing your life is not the worst thing that can happen. The worst thing is to lose your reason for living.

Author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
Quote: For me life is continuously being hungry. The meaning of life is not simply to exist, to survive, but to move ahead, to go up, to achieve, to conquer.

Author: Audrey Niffenegger,  The Time Traveler's Wife
Quote: I am suddenly comsumed by nostalgia for the little girl who was me, who loved the fields and believed in God, who spent winter days home sick from school reading Nancy Drew and sucking menthol cough drops, who could keep a secret.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If it’s the last kiss, we’d better make it last. I hope you don’t have anywhere to be, because I have the rest of my life free.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When I compliment you, I compliment myself, because I am who I associate with.

Author: Tim Tebow
Quote: I'm just thankful for everything, all the blessings in my life, trying to stay that way. I think that's the best way to start your day and finish your day. It keeps everything in perspective.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Unreturned love is like trying to make a sandwich with one slice of bread. Don’t stress—fold it in half and love yourself.

Author: Aldous Huxley,  Crome Yellow
Quote: All that happens means something; nothing you do is ever insignificant.

Author: Charles de Lint
Quote: We're all made of stories. When they finally put us underground, the stories are what will go on. Not forever, perhaps, but for a time. It's a kind of immortality, I suppose, bounded by limits, it's true, but then so's everything.

Author: Goldie Hawn
Quote: You often meet your fate on the road you take to avoid it.

Author: Mitch Albom,  For One More Day
Quote: Sharing tales of those we've lost is how we keep from really losing them.

Author: Søren Kierkegaard,  Either/Or: A Fragment of Life
Quote: If I were to wish for anything, I should not wish for wealth and power, but for the passionate sense of the potential, for the eye which, ever young and ardent, sees the possible. Pleasure disappoints, possibility never. And what wine is so sparkling, what so fragrant, what so intoxicating, as possibility!

Author: John Lennon
Quote: Part of me suspects that I'm a loser, and the other part of me thinks I'm God Almighty.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  I Want
Quote: I want to write a poem about "Truth,""Honor,""Dignity,"and whether the toilet paper should roll over or under when you pull on it.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quote: Sometimes life hits you in the head with a brick. Don't lose faith.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: She has a sly smile, and eyes that seem to see my essence as they explore my soul and implore my spirit to enter her. I look at her and I see love.

Author: Maria V. Snyder,  Fire Study
Quote: There's always another storm. It's the way the world works. Snowstorms, rainstorms, windstorms, sandstorms, and firestorms. Some are fierce and others are small. You have to deal with each one separately, but you need to keep an eye on whats brewing for tomorrow.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ll be your Dostoevsky, if you’ll be my Tolstoy. Our life together will be so full of despair that death will be like a gulag full of joy.

Author: Robert T. Kiyosaki,  Rich Dad, Poor Dad
Quote: Winners are not afraid of losing. But losers are. Failure is part of the process of success. People who avoid failure also avoid success.

Author: Osho,  The Buddha Said...: Meeting the Challenge of Life's Difficulties
Quote: Truth is not something outside to be discovered, it is something inside to be realized.

Author: Albert Einstein
Quote: We know from daily life that we exist for other people first of all, for whose smiles and well-being our own happiness depends.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  1Q84
Quote: Life is not like water. Things in life don't necessarily flow over the shortest possible route.

Author: Emily Giffin,  Something Blue
Quote: Love and friendship. They are what make us who we are, and what can change us, if we let them.

Author: Masashi Kishimoto
Quote: When a man learns to love, he must bear the risk of hatred.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Safe Haven
Quote: I've come to believe that in everyone's life, there's one undeniable moment of change, a set of circumstances that suddenly alters everything.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: The right thing to do and the hard thing to do are usually the same.

Author: Colleen Hoover,  Slammed
Quote: And life  definitely  doesn't want me To just let it  tell  me that the  girl  I met,The  beautiful, amazing, strong, resilient girl That I fell so  hard  forShould only come in  third Life  knows. Life is trying to  tell  neThat the  girl  I  love The girl I fellSo  hard  for?There's room for her in  first. I'm putting  her  first.

Author: Aristotle,  The Nicomachean Ethics
Quote: One swallow does not make a summer,neither does one fine day; similarly one day or brief time of happiness does not make a person entirely happy.

Author: Alexandre Dumas,  The Count of Monte Cristo
Quote: When you compare the sorrows of real life to the pleasures of the imaginary one, you will never want to live again, only to dream forever.

Author: Raymond Carver,  Where I'm Calling From: New and Selected Stories
Quote: I've crossed some kind of invisible line. I feel as if I've come to a place I never thought I'd have to come to. And I don't know how I got here. It's a strange place. It's a place where a little harmless dreaming and then some sleepy, early-morning talk has led me into considerations of death and annihilation.

Author: Eric Davis
Quote: Life is too short to worry about anything. You had better enjoy it because the next day promises nothing.

Author: Lance Armstrong
Quote: A boo is a lot louder than a cheer.

Author: Charles Bukowski
Quote: People are strange: They are constantly angered by trivial things, but on a major matter like totally wasting their lives, they hardly seem to notice.

Author: Sarah J. Maas,  Crown of Midnight
Quote: Some things you hear with your ears. Others, you hear with your heart.

Author: Vladimir Nabokov
Quote: Let all of life be an unfettered howl.

Author: John Keats
Quote: Life is but a day:A fragile dewdrop on its perilious wayFrom a tree's summit

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: Carve your name on hearts, not tombstones. A legacy is etched into the minds of others and the stories they share about you.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: It's funny how, in this journey of life, even though we may begin at different times and places, our paths cross with others so that we may share our love, compassion, observations, and hope. This is a design of God that I appreciate and cherish.

Author: Miranda Kerr
Quote: I feel like life is really short, and it's important to enjoy yourself and embrace whatever comes your way, whether it's a challenging day or a great day, just welcome it with open arms. No matter who you are, you can't escape challenges; they are part of life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Life, it’s made up of two things—time and love. A watch tells one, but what tells the other? We tell each other.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Title is Invisible
Quote: When faced with two equally tough choices, most people choose the third choice: to not choose.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Rescue
Quote: Youth offers the promise of happiness, but life offers the realities of grief.

Author: Joyce Meyer
Quote: Spending time with God is the key to our strength and success in all areas of life. Be sure that you never try to work God into your schedule, but always work your schedule around Him.

Author: Anne Lamott,  Plan B: Further Thoughts on Faith
Quote: It's good to do uncomfortable things. It's weight training for life.

Author: Josh McDowell
Quote: Few people seem to realize that the resurrection of Jesus is the cornerstone to a worldview that provides the perspective to all of life.

Author: Thomas Jefferson,  Letters of Thomas Jefferson
Quote: I had rather be shut up in a very modest cottage with my books, my family and a few old friends, dining on simple bacon, and letting the world roll on as it liked, than to occupy the most splendid post, which any human power can give.

Author: Mary Oliver
Quote: To pay attention, this is our endless and proper work.

Author: Roopleen
Quote: If you have a dream, don’t just sit there. Gather courage to believe that you can succeed and leave no stone unturned to make it a reality.

Author: Harper Lee,  To Kill a Mockingbird
Quote: Before I can live with other folks I’ve got to live with myself. The one thing that doesn’t abide by majority rule is a person’s conscience.

Author: William Faulkner,  The Sound and the Fury
Quote: Clocks slay time... time is dead as long as it is being clicked off by little wheels; only when the clock stops does time come to life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Our love went from fly to flower to butterfly, and it was meant to beautifully flutter, not sit still on a shelf like a trophy to be collected.

Author: John Burroughs
Quote: I still find each day too short for all the thoughts I want to think, all the walks I want to take, all the books I want to read, and all the friends I want to see.

Author: L. Lionel Kendrick
Quote: We cannot always control everything that happens to us in this life, but we can control how we respond. Many struggles come as problems and pressures that sometimes cause pain. Others come as temptations, trials, and tribulations.

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  War and Peace
Quote: Pierre was right when he said that one must believe in the possibility of happiness in order to be happy, and I now believe in it. Let the dead bury the dead, but while I'm alive, I must live and be happy.

Author: Neil Gaiman,  The Graveyard Book
Quote: Kiss a lover, Dance a measure, Find your name And buried treasure. Face your life, It's pain, It's pleasure, Leave no path untaken.

Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry,  Le Petit Prince
Quote: Voici mon secret. Il est très simple: on ne voit bien qu'avec le cœur. L'essentiel est invisible pour les yeux.

Author: Paula Hawkins,  The Girl on the Train
Quote: Hollowness: that I understand. I'm starting to believe that there isn't anything you can do to fix it. That's what I've taken from the therapy sessions: the holes in your life are permanent. You have to grow around them, like tree roots around concrete; you mold yourself through the gaps

Author: حافظ,  The Subject Tonight Is Love: 60 Wild and Sweet Poems of Hafiz
Quote: For a day, just for one day,Talk about that which disturbs no oneAnd bring some peace into yourBeautiful eyes.

Author: Ann Brashares,  Girls In Pants: The Third Summer of the Sisterhood
Quote: When she is happy, she can't stop talking, when she is sad she doesn't say a word.

Author: George Carlin
Quote: It's important in life if you don't give a shit. It can help you a lot.

Author: Hans Christian Andersen
Quote: Enjoy life. There's plenty of time to be dead.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  A Walk to Remember
Quote: Jamie: You know what I figured out today?Landon: What?Jamie: Maybe God has a bigger plan for me than I had for myself. Like this journey never ends. Like you were sent to me because I'm sick. To help me through all this. You're my angel.

Author: Robyn Schneider,  The Beginning of Everything
Quote: Life is the tragedy,' she said bitterly. 'You know how they categorize Shakespeare's plays, right? If it ends with a wedding, it's a comedy. And if it ends with a funeral, it's a tragedy. So we're all living tragedies, because we all end the same way, and it isn't with a goddamn wedding.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Bones
Quote: And when I saw him[my father] lying dead in a pool of his own blood, I knew then that I hadn't stopped believing in God. I'd just stopped believing God cared. There might be a God, Clary, and there might be not. Either way, we're on our own.

Author: Mary Manin Morrissey
Quote: Even though you may want to move forward in your life, you may have one foot on the brakes. In order to be free, we must learn how to let go. Release the hurt. Release the fear. Refuse to entertain your old pain. The energy it takes to hang onto the past is holding you back from a new life. What is it you would let go of today?

Author: Holly Black,  Red Glove
Quote: Changing is what people do when they have no options left.

Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote: When you make a choice, you change the future.

Author: Tennessee Williams
Quote: Why did I write? Because I found life unsatisfactory.

Author: Ally Condie,  Matched
Quote: That’s how I know they are dreams. Because the simple and plain and everyday things are the ones that we can never have. (Cassia Reyes)

Author: Edgar Allan Poe,  The Premature Burial
Quote: The boundaries which divide Life from Death are at best shadowy and vague. Who shall say where the one ends, and where the other begins?

Author: Jonathan Safran Foer
Quote: It has shown me that everything is illuminated in the light of the past. It is always along the side of us...on the inside, looking out.

Author: Nikki Sixx,  The Heroin Diaries: A Year In The Life Of A Shattered Rock Star
Quote: Selling my soul would be a lot easier if I could just find it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: New streets should be Twitter friendly and be named with hashtags up front. I’d build a house on ‪#‎LoversLane‬.

Author: Irving Berlin
Quote: Life is 10 percent what you make itand 90 percent how you take it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: People tell me I look like my father. I've never seen my dad, so does that mean I look invisible?

Author: Ashly Lorenzana
Quote: We judge others instantly by their clothes, their cars, their appearance, their race, their education, their social status. The list is endless. What gets me is that most people decide who another person is before they have even spoken to them. What's even worse is that these same people decide who someone else is, and don't even know who they are themselves.

Author: Dr. Seuss
Quote: Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living, it's a way of looking at life through the wrong end of a telescope, and that enables you to laugh at life's realities.

Author: Caitlin Moran,  How to Be a Woman
Quote: I cannot understand anti-abortion arguments that centre on the sanctity of life. As a species we've fairly comprehensively demonstrated that we don't believe in the sanctity of life. The shrugging acceptance of war, famine, epidemic, pain and life-long poverty shows us that, whatever we tell ourselves, we've made only the most feeble of efforts to really treat human life as sacred.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The difference between you and everyone else, is everyone else. And that’s a lot, so you should feel special.

Author: Jason Mraz
Quote: Frustration and Love can’t exist in the same place at the same time, so get real and start doing what you would rather be doing in life. Love your life. All of it. Even the heavy shit that happened to you when you were 8. All of it was and IS perfect.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook
Quote: Our lives can't be measured by our final years, of this I am sure.

Author: Gerard Way
Quote: Life is but a dream for the dead.

Author: Masashi Kishimoto
Quote: There's no advantage to hurrying through life."-Shikamaru Nara

Author: Dora J. Arod,  Love quotes for the ages. And the ageless sages.
Quote: My love is pizza shaped. Won’t you have a slice? It’s circular, so there’s enough to go around.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Whenever You're Gone, I'm Here For You
Quote: My love is expansive. Your love is expensive.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Kafka on the Shore
Quote: Even chance meetings are the result of karma… Things in life are fated by our previous lives. That even in the smallest events there’s no such thing as coincidence.

Author: Anaïs Nin,  The Diary of Anaïs Nin, Vol. 1: 1931-1934
Quote: I don’t really want to become normal, average, standard. I want merely to gain in strength, in the courage to live out my life more fully, enjoy more, experience more. I want to develop even more original and more unconventional traits

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Handle with Care
Quote: All any of us wanted, really, was to know that we counted. That someone else's life would not have been as rich without us here.

Author: Bruce Lee
Quote: You must be shapeless, formless, like water. When you pour water in a cup, it becomes the cup. When you pour water in a bottle, it becomes the bottle. When you pour water in a teapot, it becomes the teapot. Water can drip and it can crash. Become like water my friend.

Author: Eugene Kennedy
Quote: The real test of friendship is: can you literally do nothing with the other person? Can you enjoy those moments of life that are utterly simple?

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: Communication is a skill that you can learn. It's like riding a bicycle or typing. If you're willing to work at it, you can rapidly improve the quality of evry part of your life.

Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote: In the Book of Life, The answers aren't in the back.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  The Alchemist
Quote: When someone sees the same people every day, as had happened with him at the seminary, they wind up becoming a part of that person's life. And then they want the person to change. If someone isn't what others want them to be, the others become angry. Everyone seems to have a clear idea of how other people should lead their lives, but none about his or her own.

Author: Dee Lestari,  Supernova: Ksatria, Puteri, dan Bintang Jatuh
Quote: Semua perjalanan hidup adalah sinema. Bahkan lebih mengerikan. Darah adalah darah, dan tangis adalah tangis. Tak ada pemeran pengganti yang akan menanggung sakitmu.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: Develop an attitude of gratitude, and give thanks for everything that happens to you, knowing that every step forward is a step toward achieving something bigger and better than your current situation.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’m hard to love, but I love hard, like my heart is the sun yearning to tan your naked body. I promise I won’t burn you.

Author: Ani DiFranco
Quote: Art is the reason I get up in the morning, but the definition ends there. It doesn't seem fair that I'm living for something I can't even define.

Author: Tahereh Mafi,  Unravel Me
Quote: I am nothing more than the consequence of catastrophe.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The darkness has ink eyes, and if you stare long enough, you’re going to see it blink black. That’s the moment to start writing.

Author: Martha Graham
Quote: All that is important is this one moment in movement. Make the moment important, vital, and worth living. Do not let it slip away unnoticed and unused.

Author: C.S. Lewis,  Mere Christianity
Quote: If the whole universe has no meaning, we should never have found out that it has no meaning: just as, if there were no light in the universe and therefore no creatures with eyes, we should never know it was dark. Dark would be without meaning.

Author: Elie Wiesel
Quote: That I survived the Holocaust and went on to love beautiful girls, to talk, to write, to have toast and tea and live my life - that is what is abnormal.

Author: Anonymous,  Holy Bible: New International Version
Quote: I love the Lord, for he heard my voice; he heard my cry for mercy. Because he turned his ear to me, I will call on him as long as I live. (Psalms 116:1-2 NIV)

Author: Raymond E. Feist,  Silverthorn
Quote: Life is problems. Living is solving problems.

Author: Stephen Hawking
Quote: My expectations were reduced to zero when I was 21. Everything since then has been a bonus."[The Science of Second-Guessing (New York Times Magazine Interview, December 12, 2004)]

Author: Jocelyn Soriano,  Mend My Broken Heart
Quote: Yes, I understand why things had to happen this way. I understand his reason for causing me pain. But mere understanding does not chase away the hurt. It does not call upon the sun when dark clouds have loomed over me. Let the rain come then if it must come! And let it wash away the dust that hurt my eyes!

Author: Ellen DeGeneres,  Seriously... I'm Kidding
Quote: My point is, life is about balance. The good and the bad. The highs and the lows. The pina and the colada.

Author: Melody Beattie,  The Language of Letting Go: Daily Meditations on Codependency
Quote: I used to spend so much time reacting and responding to everyone else that my life had no direction. Other people's lives, problems, and wants set the course for my life. Once I realized it was okay for me to think about and identify what I wanted, remarkable things began to take place in my life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Let us embrace each other like we have the arms of two chairs. Let us dance like our legs are those of a table. We should do dinner sometime.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Some people try to change the world one life at a time. Others try to change the world one death at a time. And I try to change the world one bucket full of dirt at a time.

Author: Anton Chekhov
Quote: You have lost your reason and taken the wrong path. You have taken lies for truth, and hideousness for beauty. You would marvel if, owing to strange events of some sorts, frogs and lizards suddenly grew on apple and orange trees instead of fruit, or if roses began to smell like a sweating horse; so I marvel at you who exchange heaven for earth. I don't want to understand you.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Life is not complex. We are complex. Life is simple, and the simple thing is the right thing.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Your fantasies define you, so dream carefully. A man with no imagination is a man with no future in today’s world—and no past in tomorrow’s.

Author: Stephen King,  11/22/63
Quote: We never know which lives we influence, or when, or why.

Author: Charles Addams
Quote: Normal is an illusion. What is normal for the spider is chaos for the fly.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I realize all guys have thorns. But I am a rose, and she chose a cactus over me. I wish her luck with her dry, desert-like existence with him.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love now, not later. Also, love later.

Author: Red Haircrow
Quote: I welcome questions. I hate assumptions.

Author: Ariana Grande
Quote: Love is a really scary thing, and you never know what's going to happen. It's one of the most beautiful things in life, but it's one of the most terrifying. It's worth the fear because you have more knowledge, experience, you learn from people, and you have memories.

Author: A.J. Russell
Quote: All sacrifice and suffering is redemptive. It is used to either teach the individual or to help others. Nothing is by chance.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I just invented a hug machine. It’s solar powered so you can use it when you feel depressed, like on a cloudy day. Shit.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My hands will get dirty holding your rose-shaped heart, because love is like gardening—it’s earthy and takes work to keep it alive.

Author: Tom Hiddleston
Quote: Stay hungry, stay young, stay foolish, stay curious, and above all, stay humble because just when you think you got all the answers, is the moment when some bitter twist of fate in the universe will remind you that you very much don't.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I had a second friend come over to my house, and do you know what I called her? A refill. If relationships aren’t drinkable, why do we thirst for them so much?

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: As long as I am breathing, in my eyes, I am just beginning.

Author: Alysha Speer
Quote: Love is hard to find, hard to keep, and hard to forget.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  Keeping the Moon
Quote: If something doesn't work exactly right, or maybe needs some special treatment, you don't just throw it away. Everything can't be fully operational all the time. Sometimes, we need to have the patience to give something the little nudge it needs.

Author: Thornton Wilder
Quote: We can only be said to be alive in those moments when our hearts are conscious of our treasures.

Author: Wil Zeus,  Sun Beyond the Clouds
Quote: Always forgive, but never forget, else you will be a prisoner of your own hatred, and doomed to repeat your mistakes forever.

Author: Jeannette Walls,  The Glass Castle
Quote: One time I saw a tiny Joshua tree sapling growing not too far from the old tree. I wanted to dig it up and replant it near our house. I told Mom that I would protect it from the wind and water it every day so that it could grow nice and tall and straight. Mom frowned at me. "You'd be destroying what makes it special,"she said. "It's the Joshua tree's struggle that gives it its beauty.

Author: Tom Robbins,  Jitterbug Perfume
Quote: Our individuality is all, all, that we have. There are those who barter it for security, those who repress it for what they believe is the betterment of the whole society, but blessed in the twinkle of the morning star is the one who nurtures it and rides it in, in grace and love and wit, from peculiar station to peculiar station along life's bittersweet route.

Author: Mitch Albom,  For One More Day
Quote: Going back to something is harder than you think.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: How would your life be different if…You stopped worrying about things you can’t control and started focusing on the things you can? Let today be the day…You free yourself from fruitless worry, seize the day and take effective action on things you can change.

Author: Henry Miller,  Stand Still Like the Hummingbird
Quote: Everyone has his own reality in which, if one is not too cautious, timid or frightened, one swims. This is the only reality there is.

Author: Eddie Cantor
Quote: Slow down and enjoy life. It's not only the scenery you miss by going to fast - you also miss the sense of where you are going and why.

Author: Terry Pratchett,  Witches Abroad
Quote: Progress just means bad things happen faster.

Author: Jane Austen,  Emma
Quote: Without music, life would be a blank to me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Has No Title
Quote: Coaching 101: First you build the team, and then you build the torture chamber for underperformers.

Author: Nicole Krauss
Quote: If I had a camera,' I said, 'I'd take a picture of you every day. That way I'd remember how you looked every single day of your life.

Author: Hans Christian Andersen
Quote: Life is like a beautiful melody, only the lyrics are messed up.

Author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass
Quote: If you learn to really sit with loneliness and embrace it for the gift that it is…an opportunity to get to know YOU, to learn how strong you really are, to depend on no one but YOU for your happiness…you will realize that a little loneliness goes a LONG way in creating a richer, deeper, more vibrant and colorful YOU.

Author: Marcel Proust
Quote: My destination is no longer a place, rather a new way of seeing.

Author: Lana Del Rey
Quote: Live fast. Die young. Be wild. Have fun.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: There comes a time in your life when you have to choose to turn the page, write another book or simply close it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I drank her essence, and it’s like she never existed and now I’m thirsty again. Let this be a lesson in love.

Author: Sam Levenson
Quote: For beautiful eyes, look for the good in others; for beautiful lips, speak only words of kindness; and for poise, walk with the knowledge that you are never alone.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When I dance, I’m so fluid you could drink my moves. And if you sip it with your morning coffee, you’ll be light on your feet all day.

Author: Stephanie Perkins,  Lola and the Boy Next Door
Quote: Life isn’t about what you get, it’s about what you DO with what you get.

Author: Malala Yousafzai
Quote: The terrorists thought they would change my aims and stop my ambitions, but nothing changed in my life except this: weakness, fear and hopelessness died. Strength, power and courage were born.

Author: Roman Payne,  Rooftop Soliloquy
Quote: It’s not that we have to quit this life one day, but it’s how many things we have to quit all at once: music, laughter,the physics of falling leaves, automobiles, holding hands,the scent of rain, the concept of subway trains... if only one could leave this life slowly!

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love isn’t in a hurry like a flurry of flowery words on paper. It’s lush and slow to grow its aroma in the garden of time.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Let’s be romantic and dance in the rain. I’ll prove my feelings for you by bringing an umbrella, because I’m drowning in my love for you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I don’t want my love with her to wither like grapes on a vine, so I’ll water it with romance to turn it into wine.

Author: ياسر حارب,  على لسان الطائر الأزرق
Quote: إحدى مشكلاتنا أن ذكرياتنا أكثر وضوحاً من أحلامنا

Author: Ruskin Bond,  Scenes from a Writer's Life
Quote: and when all the wars are over, a butterfly will still be beautiful.

Author: John Green,  An Abundance of Katherines
Quote: Do you know what your problem is? You can't live with the idea that someone might leave.

Author: Ann Brashares,  My Name Is Memory
Quote: Love demands everything, they say, but my love demands only this: that no matter what happens or how long it takes, you`ll keep faith in me, you`ll remember who we are, and you`ll never feel despair.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I used to think how lucky she was to have me, but now I realize that’s backwards. A spirit of gratitude yields patience, love, and forgiveness.

Author: Winston S. Churchill
Quote: A joke is a very serious thing.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: To be invisible, paint yourself with the direct shade of zero. Leave nothing to chance, by taking nothing with you wherever you go.

Author: Julio Cortázar
Quote: Creo que todos tenemos un poco de esa bella locura que nos mantiene andando cuando todo alrededor es tan insanamente cuerdo.

Author: Carl Sagan
Quote: The cosmos is within us. We are made of star-stuff. We are a way for the universe to know itself.

Author: Stephen King,  Wolves of the Calla
Quote: No one ever does live happily ever after, but we leave the children to find that out for themselves.

Author: Walter Payton
Quote: I am happy to say that everyone that I have met in my life, I have gained something from them; be it negative or positive, it has enforced and reinforced my life in some aspect.

Author: Gillian Flynn,  Gone Girl
Quote: Because isn’t that the point of every relationship: to be known by someone else, to be understood? He gets me. She gets me. Isn’t that the simple magic phrase?

Author: Eric Roth,  The Curious Case of Benjamin Button Screenplay
Quote: I hope you live a life you’re proud of. If you find that you’re not, I hope you have the strength to start all over again.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: If you're not comfortable enough with yourself or with your own truth when entering a relationship, then you're not ready for that relationship.

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: I'm sure you think that I don't understand what you're going through, but I do. It's just that sometimes, our future is dictated by what we are, opposed to what we want.

Author: Joseph Campbell,  A Joseph Campbell Companion: Reflections on the Art of Living
Quote: The goal of life is to make your heartbeat match the beat of the universe, to match your nature with Nature.

Author: Libba Bray,  A Great and Terrible Beauty
Quote: I run after her, not really giving chase. I’m running because I can, because I must.Because I want to see how far I can go before I have to stop.

Author: John Irving,  A Prayer for Owen Meany
Quote: My life is a reading list.

Author: Anthony Robbins
Quote: I've come to believe that all my past failure and frustration were actually laying the foundation for the understandings that have created the new level of living I now enjoy.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  Mockingjay
Quote: An ability to look into the confusing mess of life and see things for what they are.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Hide things everywhere. Forget about them. Find them randomly and feel surprised like a pirate finding buried treasure. Avoid scurvy. Love more.

Author: Brad Garrett
Quote: You take away all the other luxuries in life, and if you can make someone smile and laugh, you have given the most special gift: happiness.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  A Story That Talks about Talking Is Like Chatter to Chattering Teeth, and Every Set of Dentures Can Attest to the Fact That No..
Quote: The sunset faded and blended from pink to peach to mango in a smoothie in the sky. For as long as she doesn’t love me, I will love her.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: This is the key to life: To expect everything to be given to you from above, yet to be genuinely surprised and forever grateful, when they are. Expecting all good things to be yours, while not knowing how to take anything for granted. If there may be a key in life, this is the key.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: As a fiction writer, let me make it up, and let me make it up to you. I’ll pen our love story, if you’ll be my co-author.

Author: Khaled Hosseini,  The Kite Runner
Quote: In the end, the world always wins. That's just the way of things.

Author: Joseph Addison
Quote: What sunshine is to flowers, smiles are to humanity. These are but trifles, to be sure; but scattered along life's pathway, the good they do is inconceivable.

Author: Marie Lu,  Champion
Quote: I scream for everything that has gone wrong. I scream for everything broken in our lives.

Author: Jane Austen,  Persuasion
Quote: ...when pain is over, the remembrance of it often becomes a pleasure.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Nothing carries meaning. People carry meaning. We are the porters of importance.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: Life is a bowl of cherries. Some cherries are rotten while others are good; its your job to throw out the rotten ones and forget about them while you enjoy eating the ones that are good! There are two kinds of people: those who choose to throw out the good cherries and wallow in all the rotten ones, and those who choose to throw out all the rotten ones and savor all the good ones.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Dinner was a riot, but the food was bland, so I doused it with pepper spray. The chef wanted to protest, but he didn’t, because I had the pepper spray.

Author: Selena Gómez
Quote: You have every right to a beautiful life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The sides of buildings should be like the tops of lakes. I’d fish through your window hoping to catch a smile.

Author: Arthur Golden,  Memoirs of a Geisha
Quote: Hopes are like hair ornaments. Girls want to wear too many of them. When they become old women they look silly wearing even one.

Author: Guy Finley
Quote: Once something has outlived its usefulness in one area of life, its purpose for being in existence is no longer the same. The leaf that captures a stream of sunlight, and then transfers its energy to the tree, serves one purpose in the spring and summer, and another completely different one through the fall and winter.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: I don't understand dating.. and the other things that people do.. all I know is that you ought to find the one you recognize. The one who gives you four arms, four legs, four eyes, and has the other half of your heart. There's only one of those, so what are all the other things for? Like dating?

Author: Ron White
Quote: I believe when life gives you lemons, you should make lemonade...and try to find someone whose life has given them vodka, and have a party.

Author: John Green,  Let It Snow
Quote: I always had this idea that you should never give up a happy middle in the hopes of a happy ending, because there is no such thing as a happy ending. Do you know what I mean? There is so much to lose.

Author: علي الوردي,  مهزلة العقل البشري
Quote: ليس في هذه الدنيا شيء يمكن أن يتلذذ به الانسان تلذُذاً مستمراً..فكل لذة مهما كانت عظيمة تتناقص تدريجياً عند تعاطيها.

Author: Turcois Ominek
Quote: Your time is way too valuable to be wasting on people that can't accept who you are.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A flowing flurry of flowers fell to the floor when I fell in love, as if my heart were a garden that gushed forth and flooded her being with the fragrance of romance.

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Attachments
Quote: I want someone whose heart is big enough to hold me.

Author: Dodie Smith,  I Capture the Castle
Quote: I only want to write. And there's no college for that except life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I got a zero. That’s like a perfect ten—it’s only one away from being flawless. Remember this next time you think you have nothing.

Author: Horace,  The Odes of Horace: Bilingual Edition
Quote: Pulvis et umbra sumus. (We are but dust and shadow.)

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The middle finger is a great body language tool for letting people know you’re upset. Poetry isn’t quite as effective in a fit of road rage.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: Look for the good in every person and every situation. You'll almost always find it.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: The greatest step towards a life of simplicity is to learn to let go.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: There’s no reason to not be humble, because as great as you may be, you can always be greater.

Author: Edward Gorey
Quote: I really think I write about everyday life. I don't think I'm quite as odd as others say I am. Life is intrinsically, well, boring and dangerous at the same time. At any given moment the floor may open up. Of course, it almost never does; that's what makes it so boring.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My cabinet was made by hand. My applause is also made by hand, and I stood there clapping the whole time the carpenter was making my cabinet.

Author: Joseph Addison
Quote: What sunshine is to flowers, smiles are to humanity. These are but trifles, to be sure; but scattered along life's pathway, the good they do is inconceivable.

Author: Aristotle,  The Nicomachean Ethics
Quote: For the things we have to learn before we can do them, we learn by doing them.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: I don't know why people are afraid of lust. Then I can imagine that they are very afraid of me, for I have a great lust for everything. A lust for life, a lust for how the summer-heated street feels beneath my feet, a lust for the touch of another's skin on my skin...a lust for everything. I even lust after cake. Yes, I am very lusty and very scary.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The storm is coming whether you’re aware of it or not, and whether you’re prepared for it or not. Thank God you have a man like me in your life, a man with a variety of umbrellas for sale in an affordable range of prices.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I love letting her know how much she means to me. A love in secret is but a shadow that’s cold and lonely.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A window—it’s more entertaining than TV. Just ask a cat looking out, or a man looking in on a life he desires.

Author: Santosh Kalwar,  Quote Me Everyday
Quote: Never stop just because you feel defeated. The journey to the other side is attainable only after great suffering.

Author: Gayle Forman,  Just One Day
Quote: We are born in one day. We die in one day. We can change in one day. And we can fall in love in one day. Anything can happen in just one day.

Author: Franz Kafka
Quote: He is terribly afraid of dying because he hasn’t yet lived.

Author: Margaret George,  Memoirs of Cleopatra
Quote: So I learned two things that night, and the next day, from him: the perfection of a moment, and the fleeting nature of it.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  Safe Haven
Quote: That's the thing about life. A lot of the time, it isn't easy at all. We just have to try to make the best of it.

Author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
Quote: Life doesn't require that we be the best, only that we try our best.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Notebook
Quote: It is life, I think, to watch the water. A man can learn so many things.

Author: Arundhati Roy
Quote: Another world is not only possible, she is on her way. On a quiet day, I can hear her breathing.

Author: Pittacus Lore,  The Power of Six
Quote: Never lose faith in yourself, and never lose hope; remember, even when this world throws its worst and then turns its back, there is still always hope.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love burns. Whiskey burns. George Burns. What do all three have in common? They’re all dead to me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: To become one who believes two become one, you need love in your life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She doesn’t want me to leave, and she doesn’t want me to stay. That’s a double helping of Doesn’t Want Me, and one big I’m Not Hungry back at her.

Author: David Bowie
Quote: ... And these childrenthat you spit onas they try to change their worldsare immune to your consultations.They're quite awareof what they're going through...

Author: Jennifer E. Smith,  The Statistical Probability of Love at First Sight
Quote: Who would have guessed that four minutes could change everything?

Author: J.R. Ward,  Lover Avenged
Quote: Life is such a glorious trauma, is it not?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: 75% of my life is spent wasting time. The other 25% isn’t nearly as productive.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  My love can only occupy one person at a time
Quote: My ashtray is full, the carton of cigarettes is empty, and I just cremated grandpa. But I never inhaled—or told him I loved him.

Author: Percy Bysshe Shelley,  The Complete Poems
Quote: Our sweetest songs are those of saddest thought.

Author: Sigmund Freud
Quote: Whoever loves becomes humble. Those who love have , so to speak , pawned a part of their narcissism.

Author: Bertrand Russell
Quote: Those who have never known the deep intimacy and the intense companionship of happy mutual love have missed the best thing that life has to give.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The world may be running out of water, but it isn’t running low on music. Let the dancing flow!

Author: Abraham Lincoln
Quote: The Lord prefers common-looking people. That is why he made so many of them.

Author: Randy Pausch,  The Last Lecture
Quote: When we're connected to others, we become better people.

Author: Dorothea Lange
Quote: Photography takes an instant out of time, altering life by holding it still.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I like coffee tables. I’m into drinkable furniture.

Author: Lev Grossman,  The Magicians
Quote: [F]or just one second, look at your life and see how perfect it is. Stop looking for the next secret door that is going to lead you to your real life. Stop waiting. This is it: there's nothing else. It's here, and you'd better decide to enjoy it or you're going to be miserable wherever you go, for the rest of your life, forever.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Based on the questions we both answered, we’re a 0% love match. That means we’re 100% compatible, once I enlighten her to the correct perspective on life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Our love will blend together like turquoise is blue and green. There’s no depression or envy when both blur into one.

Author: Alice Sebold,  The Lovely Bones
Quote: Because horror on Earth is real and it is every day. It is like a flower or like the sun; it cannot be contained.

Author: Mitch Albom,  For One More Day
Quote: You can go your whole life collecting days, and none will outweigh the one you wish you had back.

Author: Virginia Woolf,  Mrs. Dalloway
Quote: It might be possible that the world itself is without meaning.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: Love is the best gift because it’s free to give and priceless to receive.

Author: Michael Cunningham,  The Hours
Quote: Beauty is a whore, I like money better.

Author: Arthur Conan Doyle,  A Case of Identity
Quote: Life is infinitely stranger than anything which the mind of man could invent.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I think eulogies are wasted on the dead. It’s the living who need to hear kind words spoken about them.

Author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Choke
Quote: After you find out all the things that can go wrong, your life becomes less about living and more about waiting.

Author: David Eagleman,  Sum: Forty Tales from the Afterlives
Quote: There are three deaths. The first is when the body ceases to function. The second is when the body is consigned to the grave. The third is that moment, sometime in the future, when your name is spoken for the last time.

Author: Simone de Beauvoir
Quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.

Author: Stephen Hawking
Quote: I think computer viruses should count as life ... I think it says something about human nature that the only form of life we have created so far is purely destructive. We've created life in our own image.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quote: I have looked in the mirror every morning and asked myself: "If today were the last day of my life, would I want to do what I am about to do today?"And whenever the answer has been "No"for too many days in a row, I know I need to change something.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: It's a black and white issue: gray is grey, and there's no two ways about it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ve got a nice racket going. I make tennis ball swatters. My favorite score is love all. That’s also how I live my life.

Author: Cecelia Ahern,  P.S. I Love You
Quote: She had been given a wonderful gift: life. Sometimes it was cruelly taken away too soon, but it's what you did with it that counted, not how long it lasted.

Author: Lewis Carroll,  Alice's Adventures in Wonderland & Through the Looking-Glass
Quote: Alice had got so much into the way of expecting nothing but out-of-the-way things to happen, that it seemed quite dull and stupid for life to go on in the common way.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: An attitude of positive expectation is the mark of the superior personality.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I told the joke, but someone else got the high five. That’s like me drinking a cup of coffee and a guy in a coma waking up. Go back to bed, buddy.

Author: J.M. Barrie,  The Little Minister
Quote: Life is a long lesson in humility.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: When forever becomes a place...when forever ceases to be just a word… when it ceases to be just a measurement of time…but instead becomes a place where soul mates can dance to the song in their hearts... that is a reflection of true love.

Author: Lisa Kleypas,  Sugar Daddy
Quote: Opening up to the wrong person is like putting ammo in their hands.

Author: Jack Kerouac,  The Dharma Bums
Quote: Pain or love or danger makes you real again....

Author: Oscar Wilde,  The Importance of Being Earnest
Quote: I really don't see anything romantic in proposing. It is very romantic to be in love. But there is nothing romantic about a definite proposal. Why, one may be accepted. One usually is, I believe. Then the excitement is all over. The very essence of romance is uncertainty. If ever I get married, I'll certainly try to forget the fact.

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  War and Peace
Quote: If we admit that human life can be ruled by reason, then all possibility of life is destroyed.

Author: Chuck Palahniuk
Quote: You know how both life and porno movies end. The only difference is life starts with the orgasm.

Author: Kahlil Gibran
Quote: I slept and I dreamed that life is all joy. I woke and I saw that life is all service. I served and I saw that service is joy.

Author: Jandy Nelson,  The Sky Is Everywhere
Quote: Remember how it was when we kissed? Armfuls and armfuls of light thrown right at us. A rope dropping down from the sky. How can the word love and the word life even fit in the mouth?

Author: Chad Sugg
Quote: Love the trees until their leaves fall off, then encourage them to try again next year.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When people say they don’t understand my generation, I like to point out that it’s not “my” generation. I’m only co-owner with a 50% stake.

Author: Fernando Pessoa,  The Book of Disquiet
Quote: I suffer from life and from other people. I can’t look at reality face to face. Even the sun discourages and depresses me. Only at night and all alone, withdrawn, forgotten and lost, with no connection to anything real or useful — only then do I find myself and feel comforted.

Author: James E. Faust
Quote: In this life, we have to make many choices. Some are very important choices. Some are not. Many of our choices are between good and evil. The choices we make, however, determine to a large extent our happiness or our unhappiness, because we have to live with the consequences of our choices.

Author: Franz Kafka
Quote: L'éternité, c'est long ... surtout vers la fin.

Author: Irvin D. Yalom,  When Nietzsche Wept
Quote: Despair is the price one pays for self-awareness. Look deeply into life, and you'll always find despair.

Author: Anne Bradstreet,  The Works of Anne Bradstreet
Quote: If we had no winter, the spring would not be so pleasant: if we did not sometimes taste of adversity, prosperity would not be so welcome."[Meditations Divine and Moral]

Author: Nisargadatta Maharaj
Quote: Wisdom is knowing I am nothing,Love is knowing I am everything,and between the two my life moves.

Author: Ransom Riggs,  Hollow City
Quote: Strange, I thought, how you can be living your dreams and your nightmares at the very same time.

Author: Paulo Coelho,  By the River Piedra I Sat Down and Wept
Quote: In fairy tales, the princesses kiss the frogs, and the frogs become princes. In real life, the pricesses kiss princes, and the princes turn into frogs.

Author: E.M. Forster,  A Room with a View
Quote: We cast a shadow on something wherever we stand, and it is no good moving from place to place to save things; because the shadow always follows. Choose a place where you won't do harm - yes, choose a place where you won't do very much harm, and stand in it for all you are worth, facing the sunshine.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If you need me I’ll be sitting over there, on the ground, next to the empty chair. The emptiness always reminds me of your love.

Author: Tom Robbins
Quote: In the haunted house of life, art is the only stair that doesn't creak.

Author: Jimmy Carter
Quote: We should live our lives as though Christ was coming this afternoon.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My heartbeat is a pulse, and it pumps out sonic vibrations that resonate with her mind as she lays her head on my chest. Listen silently and you can hear the frequency of love.

Author: Eric Idle
Quote: Life doesn't make any sense, and we all pretend it does. Comedy's job is to point out that it doesn't make sense, and that it doesn't make much difference anyway.

Author: Orson Welles
Quote: I don't pray really, because I don't want to bore God.

Author: Nikki Giovanni
Quote: the world is not a pleasant place to be without someone to hold and be held by.

Author: Nick Hornby,  How to Be Good
Quote: You don't ask people with knives in their stomachs what would make them happy; happiness is no longer the point. It's all about survival; it's all about whether you pull the knife out and bleed to death or keep it in...

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I count as blessings things I could have benefited from, even if I neglected to utilize them. A gift is still a gift, even if left wrapped and unopened.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: You can never be too early to stand around and wait. You can have a seat in this chair, after I cinch the noose around my neck and you kick it out from under my legs.

Author: Stephen Hawking
Quote: However difficult life may seem, there is always something you can do and succeed at.

Author: Gena Showalter,  Oh My Goth
Quote: There’s a really stupid saying: When life hands you a lemon, make lemonade. Well, I have a better saying: When life hands you a lemon, shove that lemon up its stupid butt.

Author: Albert Camus
Quote: A man's work is nothing but this slow trek to rediscover, through the detours of art, those two or three great and simple images in whose presence his heart first opened.

Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote: It's not worth our while to let our imperfections disturb us always.

Author: Markus Zusak,  The Book Thief
Quote: Can a person steal happiness? Or is just another internal, infernal human trick?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Has No Title
Quote: I just bought a small condo overlooking the water. The water is in a cup, one floor below my unit.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ve changed, and she’s changed, but we haven’t changed together. We were in separate dressing rooms the whole time we dated.

Author: Jason Mraz
Quote: Here’s to freedom, cheers to art. Here’s to having an excellent adventure and may the stopping never start.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I can’t use my intellect to figure out how to bypass my intellect. Love lies through the spirit, not the mind, and love never lies.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A squeegee is a sponge on a stick, and if there is a tangible item that’s more romantic, I don’t know what it is. Never go on a first date without one.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Just an observation: it is impossible to be both grateful and depressed. Those with a grateful mindset tend to see the message in the mess. And even though life may knock them down, the grateful find reasons, if even small ones, to get up.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The harmonica has musical wind, and is the breath of soul. It’s like a sad, lonely I love you lost in the breeze.

Author: Baltasar Gracián
Quote: Never compete with someone who has nothing to lose.

Author: Amy Poehler
Quote: As you navigate through the rest of your life, be open to collaboration. Other people and other people's ideas are often better than your own. Find a group of people who challenge and inspire you, spend a lot of time with them, and it will change your life.

Author: Gena Showalter,  Oh My Goth
Quote: People are the most difficult thing in the world to change

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I bleed ink for her, because her name is written on my heart. She’s the author of all the love I have to give.

Author: Ally Condie,  Crossed
Quote: Love changes what is probable and makes unlikely things possible.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I dance so fluid you’d think I’m a fish. I don’t need to drink to be able to dance—I am the drink. Have a sip and find out for yourself.

Author: Mark Twain,  Life on the Mississippi
Quote: Now and then we had a hope that if we lived and were good, God would permit us to be pirates.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I don’t like my circle of friends, so I’m changing them to a square. Love shapes our lives, so why not shape who we love?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I used the boos, and not the booze, as motivation. That led to applause, which I drank up like an alcoholic. I need a refill.

Author: W. Somerset Maugham,  The Painted Veil
Quote: I have an idea that the only thing which makes it possible to regard this world we live in without disgust is the beauty which now and then men create out of the chaos. The pictures they paint, the music they compose, the books they write, and the lives they lead. Of all these the richest in beauty is the beautiful life. That is the perfect work of art.

Author: John Irving,  The Hotel New Hampshire
Quote: It is hard work and great art to make life not so serious.

Author: Kate Atkinson,  Case Histories
Quote: She should have done science, not spent all her time with her head in novels. Novels gave you a completely false idea about life, they told lies and they implied there were endings when in reality there were no endings, everything just went on and on and on.

Author: Confucius
Quote: Forget injuries, never forget kindnesses.

Author: Barbara Kingsolver,  Animal Dreams
Quote: What I want is so simple I almost can't say it: elementary kindness.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Anything disguised as anything is chameleon. A ghost disguised as an unobservable and invisible object is a great example. Still, that’s easier to see than the love my ex wife had for me.

Author: Voltaire
Quote: We never live; we are always in the expectation of living.

Author: Jean Racine
Quote: Life is a comedy to those who think, a tragedy to those who feel.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Now that I’m 33.3 years old, the days of blue and green are behind me. I have left the earthy and entered into the purple phase of my life.

Author: Virginia Euwer Wolff
Quote: Rise to the occassion which is life!

Author: Zelda Fitzgerald
Quote: I love you, even if there isn’t any me, or any love, or even any life. I love you.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Kafka on the Shore
Quote: The sense of tragedy - according to Aristotle - comes, ironically enough, not from the protagonist's weak points but from his good qualities. Do you know what I'm getting at? People are drawn deeper into tragedy not by their defects but by their virtues....[But] we accept irony through a device called metaphor. And through that we grow and become deeper human beings.

Author: Lao Tzu,  Tao Te Ching
Quote: If you try to change it, you will ruin it. Try to hold it, and you will lose it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: He rose like heroes, and I rose like rows of red roses. Love grows wherever you plant it, so I try to farm it wherever I go.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She said love her or be tortured by her. I replied, "Torture would be less painful."She didn't realize that I'm a true romantic.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I just sprayed cologne on my hand and then pet the back of my cat's head while he slept, and he woke up so confused, trying to sniff behind his neck and all around wondering what sweet attack he was under.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Networking is drinking the nectar of interconnectedness. And I’ve been drinking since noon, so I may need @ryanlilly to drive me home.

Author: Rick Warren
Quote: The best use of life is love. The best expression of love is time. The best time to love is now.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A can’t in a can—it’s carbonated failure that’s ready to drink. It tastes like the back half of love.

Author: Marcel Proust
Quote: People do not die for us immediately, but remain bathed in a sort of aura oflife which bears no relation to true immortality but through which theycontinue to occupy our thoughts in the same way as when they were alive. Itis as though they were traveling abroad.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I need to be gentler, I said definitively to myself, as I clenched my fist and shook it in the air. Love takes flight like two powerful wings, but hits like a collection of feathers.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Nostalgia is being blind to the bad and only remembering the good. Thinking about all the love I had for her is a positively Helen-Kelleresque experience.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If you’re going to hang around and watch me write, you might as well have a noose around your neck. Would you mind if I kicked the chair out from under your feet? You’re standing on my only place to sit.

Author: Helen Keller
Quote: Happiness does not come from without, it comes from within

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If my legs get blown off in war, I’d like to have them replaced with a coffee table. Half man/half furniture, I’ll be in the living room if you need me.

Author: Dorothy Height
Quote: Without community service, we would not have a strong quality of life. It's important to the person who serves as well as the recipient. It's the way in which we ourselves grow and develop.

Author: Helen Keller
Quote: A bend in the road is not the end of the road…Unless you fail to make the turn.

Author: Morgan Matson,  Amy and Roger's Epic Detour
Quote: I'd found out that if you pushed people away hard enough, they tended to go.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: You haven’t seen nothing until you’ve seen zero. You also haven’t seen nothing until you’ve seen all the love I have for politicians.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Before the NSA there was the Catholic Church. What is confessional if not a place to gather secrets? No wonder the church had all the power.

Author: S.E. Hinton,  The Outsiders
Quote: It's okay. We aren't in the same class. Just don't forget that some of us watch the sunset too.

Author: Jandy Nelson,  I'll Give You the Sun
Quote: People die, I think, but your relationship with them doesn't. It continues and is ever-changing.

Author: Albert Einstein
Quote: Dancers are the athletes of God.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I think I’m mouth blind and that’s why all food tastes bland. The only things that have any flavor are the words I love you.

Author: Eric Berne
Quote: The moment a little boy is concerned with which is a jay and which is a sparrow, he can no longer see the birds or hear them sing.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Behold, the number five is at hand. Grab it and shake and harness the power of networking.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Politically, I feel out of touch, like I’m wearing gloves—boxing gloves. We need to go bareknuckle to beat back the entrenched establishment.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Telephone pole wires get in the way of great photos. Communication always gets in the way of communication.

Author: K-Ske Hasegawa,  Ballad of a Shinigami, Vol. 1
Quote: Crap.It's all crap.Living is crap.Life has no meaning.None. Nowhere to be found.Crap.Why doesn't anybody realize this?

Author: Lemony Snicket
Quote: In love, as in life, one misheard word can be tremendously important. If you tell someone you love them, for instance, you must be absolutely certain that they have replied "I love you back"and not "I love your back"before you continue the conversation.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I can hold my alcohol, just like I’m a wine bottle. I dance as fluid as glass, and my heart shatters just as easily.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: An empty coffee cup is full of hope. Now there’s something worth voting for.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  Catching Fire
Quote: Because I'm selfish. I'm a coward. I'm the kind of girl who, when she might actually be of use, would run to stay alive and leave those who couldn't follow to suffer and die.

Author: Edmund Burke
Quote: Nobody made a greater mistake than he who did nothing because he could do only a little.

Author: Woody Allen,  Annie Hall: Screenplay
Quote: There's an old joke - um... two elderly women are at a Catskill mountain resort, and one of 'em says, "Boy, the food at this place is really terrible."The other one says, "Yeah, I know; and such small portions."Well, that's essentially how I feel about life - full of loneliness, and misery, and suffering, and unhappiness, and it's all over much too quickly.

Author: John Green,  Looking for Alaska
Quote: I came here looking for a Great Perhaps, for real friends and a more-than-minor life..

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Ah, but that's life, no?
Quote: If I offer you a glass of water, and bring back a cup of ice, I’m trying to teach you patience. And also that sometimes you get ice with no water, and later you’ll get water with no ice. Ah, but that’s life, no?

Author: George R.R. Martin,  A Game of Thrones
Quote: A craven can be as brave as any man, when there is nothing to fear. And we all do our duty, when there is no cost to it. How easy it seems then, to walk the path of honor. Yet soon or late in every man's life comes a day when it is not easy, a day when he must choose. (Maester Aemon)

Author: C.J. Redwine,  Defiance
Quote: It’s probably my job to tell you life isn’t fair, but I figure you already know that. So instead, I’ll tell you that hope is precious, and you’re right not to give up.

Author: Kristin Armstrong
Quote: Life is too sweet and too short to express our affection with just our thumbs. Touch is meant for more than a keyboard.

Author: Jim Butcher,  Death Masks
Quote: Life would be unbearably dull if we had answers to all our questions.

Author: J.M. Darhower,  Sempre
Quote: Go for it, while you can. I know you have it in you. And I can't promise you'll get everything you want, but I can promise nothing will change if you don't try.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Why pay for an undesirable outcome with someone else? For the same money, you could have paid me to stay at home and do nothing.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Free yourself from the complexities and drama of your life. Simplify. Look within. Within ourselves we all have the gifts and talents we need to fulfill the purpose we've been blessed with.

Author: Ilona Andrews,  Magic Bleeds
Quote: you might want to decide fast. We live in a dangerous world. If you see a chance to be happy, you have to fight for it, so later you have no regrets.

Author: Angela Schwindt
Quote: While we try to teach our children all about life, our children teach us what life is all about.

Author: Daniel Keyes,  Flowers for Algernon
Quote: I am afraid. Not of life, or death, or nothingness, but of wasting it as if I had never been.

Author: Sue Monk Kidd,  The Secret Life of Bees:
Quote: The world will give you that once in awhile, a brief timeout; the boxing bell rings and you go to your corner, where somebody dabs mercy on your beat-up life.

Author: Albert Camus
Quote: Nothing in life is worth,turning your back on,if you love it.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: I love you. I hate you. I like you. I hate you. I love you. I think you’re stupid. I think you’re a loser. I think you’re wonderful. I want to be with you. I don’t want to be with you. I would never date you. I hate you. I love you…..I think the madness started the moment we met and you shook my hand. Did you have a disease or something?

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: If you have a goal, write it down. If you do not write it down, you do not have a goal - you have a wish.

Author: James Russell Lowell
Quote: Fate loves the fearless.

Author: Mitch Albom,  For One More Day
Quote: It's such a shame to waste time. We always think we have so much of it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ve only been in love one time, I said as I held up my pinky finger. I could have held up my index finger, but I wasn’t in love that long.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Trees shaped like deer should not be ridden like benches if they get stuck up in other trees. No hunting farming allowed. Fishing only.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: To show you I love you, I bought you an antique watch. You can tell it's old because it doesn't even work. I got a great deal on it.

Author: André Gide
Quote: The true hypocrite is the one who ceases to perceive his deception, the one who lies with sincerity.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Be mindful and heartempty, because you've got no love left in it due to you having given it all away.

Author: Meher Baba
Quote: Don't Worry Be Happy

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Hard at work? I’ll give you a hand—my right hand. It’s a handshake, for networking and encouragement purposes. Keep it up!

Author: Mitch Albom,  The Time Keeper
Quote: When you are measuring life, you are not living it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I just developed a gun that shoots mustaches. Sometimes a disguise can be deadly, especially if it’s your love you’re trying to camouflage.

Author: Anatole France
Quote: All changes, even the most longed for, have their melancholy; for what we leave behind us is a part of ourselves; we must die to one life before we can enter another.

Author: Tyler Perry
Quote: My biggest success is getting over the things that have tried to destroy and take me out of this life. Those are my biggest successes. It has nothing to do with work.

Author: Kiefer Sutherland
Quote: I've had some amazing people in my life. Look at my father - he came from a small fishing village of five hundred people and at six foot four with giant ears and a kind of very odd expression, thought he could be a movie star. So go figure, you know?

Author: Helen Exley
Quote: Books can be dangerous. The best ones should be labeled "This could change your life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When you give everything and expect nothing in return, only then will you be in a position to gain anything. When you love loving, you give because giving is getting. Giving is a gift unto itself, and when you realize this you understand that you can’t network if you can’t love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Tennis is the only sport with love in the score, and that makes it the most romantic. I would be a player, but I wisely use the net to go fishing instead.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: An empty ketchup bottle full of romantic quotes is just what I need to turn my cheeseburger into the perfect lover. Now you can get more romantic for an upcharge of just 69 cents.

Author: Alan W. Watts
Quote: The art of living... is neither careless drifting on the one hand nor fearful clinging to the past on the other. It consists in being sensitive to each moment, in regarding it as utterly new and unique, in having the mind open and wholly receptive.

Author: Jim Butcher,  Dead Beat
Quote: Son. Everyone dies alone. That's what it is. It's a door. It's one person wide. When you go through it, you do it alone. But it doesn't mean you've got to be alone before you go through the door. And believe me, you aren't alone on the other side.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The love of my life has made me the happiest man ever. This ever-smiling man/mannequin is so happy because he’s got no brain, and in this way is identical to anyone who still rah-rahs for either a Republican or a Democrat.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: During my darkest hour, life threw me some curves. Thankfully they were in the shape of a woman’s body.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The best part about being a writer is being able to communicate with people without moving my lips. The mouth is better used for kissing.

Author: Orson Scott Card,  Shadow of the Giant
Quote: Life is full of grief, to exactly the degree we allow ourselves to love other people.

Author: Ashly Lorenzana
Quote: Never try to do anything that is outside of who you are. A forced smile is a sign of what feels wrong in your heart, so recognize it when it happens. Living a lie will reduce you to one.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: There is great change to be experienced once you learn the power of letting go. Stop allowing anyone or anything to control, limit, repress, or discourage you from being your true self! Today is YOURS to shape - own it - break free from people and things that poison or dilute your spirit.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The Book of Life, I’m still writing it—both literally and literarily. So far I’ve written the Table of Contents. Right now it’s more of a coffee table.

Author: Melina Marchetta,  On the Jellicoe Road
Quote: When it was over, she gathered him in her arms. And told him the terrible irony of her life.That she had wanted to be dead all those years while her brother had been alive. That had been her sin.And this was her penance.Wanting to live when everyone else seemed dead.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’m passionate about being compassionate. It takes a lot to give of yourself, and that’s why it’s such a gift—for both the recipient and the giver.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My reality is it’s nighttime. The truth is I’m just blindfolded. How many people live like me, in self-deluded darkness?

Author: Dora J. Arod,  Love quotes for the ages. And the ageless sages.
Quote: I’m a fake fact factory. The things I make are the things I make up. Also, as a side business, I make love. Actually, I just made that up.

Author: Albert Einstein
Quote: Life isn't worth living, unless it is lived for someone else.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: In the long run, even a marathon looks like a sprint. This is how I can love with such Roger Bannisteresque intensity.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Entrepreneurs adopt the ways of the adept and adapt to a changing environment. Actually, entrepreneurs are more enterpreneurs, because they are forever entering into new territory.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  The Titanic would never have sunk if it were made out of a sink.
Quote: 33 old people went into a nursing home, and only 34 people came out alive. One old woman died while giving birth to twins.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: I consider myself a stained-glass window. And this is how I live my life. Closing no doors and covering no windows; I am the multi-colored glass with light filtering through me, in many different shades. Allowing light to shed and fall into many many hues. My job is not to direct anything, but only to filter into many colors. My answer is destiny and my guide is joy. And there you have me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: All my failures as a human being I blame on my father. Life is about accepting responsibility, and it’s time my father started being held accountable for my deficiencies.

Author: Alexandra Adornetto,  Halo
Quote: Sometimes it's better to stop trying to make sense of things. Life isn't clear cut, there are always gray areas.

Author: Joseph Brodsky
Quote: Life—the way it really is—is a battle not between good and bad, but between bad and worse

Author: Bill Watterson,  The Authoritative Calvin And Hobbes
Quote: If you can't control your peanut butter, you can't expect to control your life.

Author: Ian McEwan,  Atonement
Quote: And though you think the world is at your feet, it can rise up and tread on you.

Author: Jim Butcher,  White Night
Quote: But the only way never to do the wrong thing is never to do anything.

Author: Steve Martin
Quote: Be so good they can't ignore you.

Author: Robert W. Service
Quote: There's a race of men that don't fit in, A race that can't sit still;So they break the hearts of kith and kin, And they roam the world at will.They range the field and rove the flood, And they climb the mountain's crest; Their's is the curse of the gypsy blood, And they don't know how to rest.

Author: Diane Von Furstenberg
Quote: The most important relationship in your life is the relationship you have with yourself. Because no matter what happens, you will always be with yourself.

Author: Ann Brashares,  Girls In Pants: The Third Summer of the Sisterhood
Quote: You couldn't erase the past. You couldn't even change it. But sometimes life offered you the opportunity to put it right.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: Never do a single thing in the anticipation to prove something to someone who has hurt you. If someone has hurt or offended you (whoever that person may be), never perform anything or strive for anything in your life with the mind of proving something to that someone/ to those people. May nothing that you do be done with any thought of them in mind. There is nothing that needs to be proven.

Author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.
Quote: Our love was a two-person game. At least until one of us died, and the other became a murderer.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Every morning I push through the pain—and force myself to keep sleeping, despite my aching body’s cries to quit. I am a champion.

Author: George Orwell
Quote: At 50, everyone has the face he deserves.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I make love like I make coffee. Tuesdays and Thursdays I offer free refills.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  The Truth About Forever
Quote: I knew that in the silence that followed, that anything could happen here. It might be too late again. I might have missed my chance. But I would at least know I tried, that I took my heart and extended my hand, whatever the outcome.

Author: Gustave Flaubert
Quote: The most glorious moments in your life are not the so-called days of success, but rather those days when out of dejection and despair you feel rise in you a challenge to life, and the promise of future accomplishments.

Author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.
