Quote: You must take action now that will move you towards your goals. Develop a sense of urgency in your life.

Author: Rabindranath Tagore
Quote: Let your life lightly dance on the edges of Time like dew on the tip of a leaf.

Author: Suzanne Collins,  Catching Fire
Quote: Sometimes things happen to people and they're not equipped to deal with them.

Author: Robert A. Heinlein
Quote: May you live as long as you wish and love as long as you live.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ll cut jewels in the shape of crumpled-up pieces of paper. Her wedding ring may look like my 33rd attempt at my marriage vows.

Author: Michel Houellebecq
Quote: The absence of the will to live is, alas, not sufficient to make one want to die.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’m 33, and an 18-year-old girl called me old. I said, “You may be temporarily young, but you’ll forever be childish.” Then I put gum in her hair.

Author: Albert Einstein,  Out of My Later Years: The Scientist, Philosopher, and Man Portrayed Through His Own Words
Quote: All religions, arts and sciences are branches of the same tree. All these aspirations are directed toward ennobling man's life, lifting it from the sphere of mere physical existence and leading the individual towards freedom."[Moral Decay (first published 1937)]

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: Destiny is real. And she's not mild-mannered. She will come around and hit you in the face and knock you over and before you know what hit you, you're naked- stripped of everything you thought you knew and everything you thought you didn't know- and there you are! A bloody nose, bruises all over you, and naked. And it's the most beautiful thing.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My advice to aspiring writers is to read more, write more, and network more. More, more, and more. Then, after you've done all that, do it some more.

Author: John Green,  An Abundance of Katherines
Quote: Do you ever wonder whether people would like you more or less if they could see inside you? But I always wonder about that. If people could see me the way I see myself—if they could live in my memories—would anyone, anyone, love me?

Author: Alice Bag,  Violence Girl: East L.A. Rage to Hollywood Stage, a Chicana Punk Story
Quote: What a waste my life would be without all the beautiful mistakes I've made.

Author: Anais Nin
Quote: Dreams are necessary to life.

Author: أحمد خيري العمري,  إدرينالين
Quote: من قال لك أن درب الجنة معبد بالورود؟

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: He’s right-handed, so I told him to draw his self-portrait with his left hand, because it’d look so ugly it’d look realistic. Since he’s a DC politician, I figured a little reality was needed in his life.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  New Order
Quote: I suppose it’s not a social norm, and not a manly thing to do — to feel, discuss feelings. So that’s what I’m giving the finger to. Social norms and stuff…what good are social norms, really? I think all they do is project a limited and harmful image of people. It thus impedes a broader social acceptance of what someone, or a group of people, might actually be like.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: I've found that luck is quite predictable. If you want more luck, take more chances, Be more active, Show up more often.

Author: Lana Del Rey
Quote: We have nothing to lose, nothing to gain, nothing we desired anymore- except to make our lives into a work of art.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I don’t want to develop—I want to evelop, because it’s more positive. Similarly, would you rather your love evolve or devolve? That’s why if you need me, I’ll be on the sofa trying to evelop myself as a person.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’d row a gondola like a column is not a row. My coffee may be cold, but my love is warm. When are you going to wake up and drink it?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Today we’re living in an anti-Waldo world, where you don’t want to blend in and have people struggle to find you. You want your personal brand to stand out like you’re wearing a red and white sweater, and everyone else has on black.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When tragedy hits close to home, like your neighbor’s house, it really makes you stop and think. And while you’re thinking, I’ll be speeding off in the getaway car.

Author: Helen Keller
Quote: Everything has its wonders, even darkness and silence, and I learn, whatever state I may be in, therein to be content

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I am a fisherman among farmers, and as a farmer what I grow is tired of waiting for her to love me.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Kafka on the Shore
Quote: When you come out of the storm, you won’t be the same person who walked in. That’s what this storm’s all about.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Just when you thought you’d considered all the angles, life goes from a square to a cube. Love should also be 3D.

Author: J.R.R. Tolkien,  The Return of the King
Quote: Your time may come. Do not be too sad, Sam. You cannot be always torn in two. You will have to be one and whole, for many years. You have so much to enjoy and to be, and to do.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: On a scale of 1 to extroverted, I’m a 3.14159. So is pi. I network like “the ratio of a circle's circumference to its diameter.” Thanks, Wikipedia!

Author: David Archuleta,  Chords of Strength: A Memoir of Soul, Song and the Power of Perseverance
Quote: I like to believe that you don't need to reach a certain goal to be happy. I prefer to think that happiness is always there, and that when things don't go the way we might like them to, it's a sign from above that something even better is right around the corner.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I need more frugality. I wonder where I can buy some.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My cat is ignorant of the law. But then so am I. That means I am not his master, because we are both slaves.

Author: Omar N. Bradley
Quote: This is as true in everyday life as it is in battle: we are given one life and the decision is ours whether to wait for circumstances to make up our mind, or whether to act, and in acting, to live.

Author: Richard Brautigan
Quote: all of us have a place in history. mine is clouds.

Author: Laura Hillenbrand,  Unbroken: A World War II Story of Survival, Resilience, and Redemption
Quote: Dignity is as essential to human life as water, food, and oxygen. The stubborn retention of it, even in the face of extreme physical hardship, can hold a man's soul in his body long past the point at which the body should have surrendered it.

Author: André Breton,  Anthology of Black Humor
Quote: Life’s greatest gift is the freedom it leaves you to step out of it whenever you choose.

Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  All the Sad Young Men
Quote: So he tasted the deep pain that is reserved only for the strong, just as he had tasted for a little while the deep happiness.

Author: Marjorie Pay Hinckley
Quote: The trick is to enjoy life. Don't wish away your days, waiting for better ones ahead.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Ashes
Quote: Everything changes in my life, and the world stays the same.

Author: Charlotte Brontë,  Jane Eyre
Quote: It is in vain to say human beings ought to be satisfied with tranquility: they must have action; and they will make it if they cannot find it.

Author: Ray Bradbury
Quote: Self-consciousness is the enemy of all art, be it acting, writing, painting, or living itself, which is the greatest art of all.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  Clockwork Angel
Quote: Pulvis et umbra sumus. It's a line from Horace. 'We are dust and shadows'. Appropriate, don't you think?"Will said. "It's not a long life, killing demons; one tends to die young, and then they burn your body - dust to dust, in the literal sense. And then we vanish into the shadows of history, nary a mark on the page of a mundane book to remind the world that once we existed at all.

Author: Bill Watterson
Quote: To invent your own life's meaning is not easy, but it's still allowed, and I think you'll be happier for the trouble.

Author: Kim Kardashian
Quote: You make mistakes, but I don't have any regrets. I'm the kind of person who takes responsibility for it and deals with it. I learn from everything I do. I work very hard, I have so many things going on in my life. Get to know me and see who I am.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I arose like a rose, and this is how I knew I was in love. In the garden of life, I’m better off in your neighbor’s yard.

Author: George Eliot,  The Mill on the Floss
Quote: Life seems to go on without effort when I am filled with music.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Macbeth
Quote: Out, out, brief candle! Life's but a walking shadow, a poor player that struts and frets his hour upon the stage and is heard no more. It is a tale told by an idiot, full of sound and fury, signifying nothing.

Author: Lao Tzu
Quote: In dwelling, live close to the ground. In thinking, keep to the simple. In conflict, be fair and generous. In governing, don't try to control. In work, do what you enjoy. In family life, be completely present.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: One butterfly wing reflected wholly in a mirror won’t give flight. Let this be a lesson in love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The last 33 years of my life have been a blur, like a hummingbird’s beating wings. Time flies, but not backwards, like a hummingbird can.

Author: Deb Caletti,  Stay
Quote: I've heard that people stand in bad situations because a relationship like that gets turned up by degrees. It is said that a frog will jump out of a pot of boiling water. Place him in a pot and turn it up a little at a time, and he will stay until he is boiled to death. Us frogs understand this.

Author: Kobayashi Issa
Quote: Never forget:we walk on hell,gazing at flowers.

Author: Frank Herbert,  Dune
Quote: There is no escape—we pay for the violence of our ancestors.

Author: Jojo Moyes,  Me Before You
Quote: ...I told him a story of two people. Two people who shouldn't have met, and who didn't like each other much when they did, but who found they were the only two people in the world who could possibly have understood each other.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Has No Title
Quote: Early on I set out to write the next Great American Novel, and then later on I set out the silverware and enjoyed my dinner in silence.

Author: W. Somerset Maugham,  The Painted Veil
Quote: One can be very much in love with a woman without wishing to spend the rest of one's life with her.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Be happy with who you are and what you do, and you can do anything you want.

Author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer,  The Cost of Discipleship
Quote: When all is said and done, the life of faith is nothing if not an unending struggle of the spirit with every available weapon against the flesh.

Author: Bob Ong,  ABNKKBSNPLAKo?!
Quote: Nakalimutan na ng tao ang kabanalan n'ya, na mas marami pa s'yang alam kesa sa nakasulat sa Transcript of Records n'ya, mas marami pa s'yang kayang gawin kesa sa nakalista sa resume n'ya, at mas mataas ang halaga n'ya kesa sa presyong nakasulat sa payslip n'ya tuwing sweldo.

Author: Chris Rock
Quote: I don't get high, but sometimes I wish I did. That way, when I messed up in life I would have an excuse. But right now there's no rehab for stupidity.

Author: Nas
Quote: I just enjoy life now. I just enjoy every morning I get to wake up.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If there’s gold in it, then the mine is mine. And if there’s no coffee in it, then the cup is yours.

Author: Katie McGarry,  Pushing the Limits
Quote: Sometimes life happens.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If I waste all my charity, all I’ll wind up with in the end is the wind. Still, I think I want to be the Dandelion of Love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I wouldn’t feel great if you left me alone, but I wouldn’t feel bad either. I’d feel good, like I always do, which has nothing to do with you, even if you’ll have nothing to do with me.

Author: Charles Baudelaire
Quote: What strange phenomena we find in a great city, all we need do is stroll about with our eyes open. Life swarms with innocent monsters.

Author: George Moore,  The Brook Kerith
Quote: A man travels the world over in search of what he needs and returns home to find it.

Author: Cesare Pavese
Quote: We do not remember days, we remember moments.

Author: Rob Sheffield,  Love Is a Mix Tape
Quote: The times you lived through, the people you shared those times with — nothing brings it all to life like an old mix tape. It does a better job of storing up memories than actual brain tissue can do. Every mix tape tells a story. Put them together, and they can add up to the story of a life.

Author: David Levithan,  Every You, Every Me
Quote: You don't know me. You know one me, just like I know one you. And you can't know every me, and I can't know every you.

Author: Roman Payne,  The Wanderess
Quote: I was an adventurer, but she was not an adventuress. She was a 'wanderess.' Thus, she didn’t care about money, only experiences - whether they came from wealth or from poverty, it was all the same to her.

Author: E.A. Bucchianeri,  Brushstrokes of a Gadfly
Quote: Love, like everything else in life, should be a discovery, an adventure, and like most adventures, you don’t know you’re having one until you’re right in the middle of it.

Author: Lois Lowry,  The Giver
Quote: The life where nothing was ever unexpected. Or inconvenient. Or unusual. The life without colour, pain or past.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  How to construct a coffin with six karate chops
Quote: Who needs a large vocabulary when you can just make up any word at any time? It makes life a whole lot more emeaglibop.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. Specifically ages 18-81.
Quote: I’d rather have 100% of 5 than 50% of 10—especially with love.

Author: Isobelle Carmody,  Alyzon Whitestarr
Quote: The deepest wounds aren't the ones we get from other people hurting us. They are the wounds we give ourselves when we hurt other people.

Author: Jessica Sorensen,  The Coincidence of Callie & Kayden
Quote: Life is full of luck, like getting dealt a good hand, or simply by being in the right place at the right time. Some people get luck handed to them, a second chance, a save. It can happen heroically, or by a simple coincidence , but there are those who don’t get luck on a shiny platter, who end up in the wrong place at the wrong time, who don’t get saved.

Author: William Shakespeare
Quote: And this, our life, exempt from public haunt, finds tongues in trees, books in the running brooks, sermons in stones, and good in everything.

Author: F. Scott Fitzgerald,  Tender is the Night & The Last Tycoon
Quote: If you spend your life sparing people’s feelings and feeding their vanity, you get so you can’t distinguish what should be respected in them.

Author: Marvin Gaye
Quote: If you cannot find peace within yourself, you will never find it anywhere else.

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: Today is a new day. Don't let your history interfere with your destiny! Let today be the day you stop being a victim of your circumstances and start taking action towards the life you want. You have the power and the time to shape your life. Break free from the poisonous victim mentality and embrace the truth of your greatness. You were not meant for a mundane or mediocre life!

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I kissed a mystery, and it tasted like a woman. Lips are always full of delicious secrets.

Author: pleasefindthis,  I Wrote This For You
Quote: After you're gone, people will forget your name, no matter how important it was, and your face, no matter how pretty it was, and what you said, no matter how clever any of it sounded.The things you've done will crumble and fade and the places you once loved, will change and be given new names.You are only here for one moment and it lasts exactly one lifetime.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I drink coffee like steam is the ghost of dead water. Ever tried inhaling the afterlife?

Author: Rainbow Rowell,  Fangirl
Quote: I don't want to do anything. I don't even want to start this day because then I'll just be expected to finish it.

Author: Mitch Albom,  The Five People You Meet in Heaven
Quote: There are five people you meet in heaven. Each of us was in your life for a reason. You may not have known the reason at the time, and that is what heaven is for. For understanding your life on earth. This is the greatest gift God can give you: to understand what happened in your life. To have it explained. It is the peace you have been searching for.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Silver is an investment. It’s like a second-place future. Makes me want to create Michael Phelps-flavored ice cream and eat a whole tub.

Author: Hilary Duff
Quote: People are going to say what they want to say and think what they want to think, and I can't change their minds.

Author: Douglas Adams,  So Long, and Thanks for All the Fish
Quote: Life... is like a grapefruit. Well, it's sort of orangey-yellow and dimpled on the outside, wet and squidgy in the middle. It's got pips inside, too. Oh, and some people have half a one for breakfast.

Author: أحلام مستغانمي
Quote: ماعاد تعريف الحب اليوم إثنان ينظران بالإتجاه نفسه، بل إثنان ينظران إلى الجهاز نفسه! ولا صارت فرحتنا في أن نلتقي من نحب، بل في تلقّي رسالة هاتفية منه!ماتت الأحاسيس العاطفية الكبيرة بسبب تلك الأفراح التكنولوجية الصغيرة، التي تأتي وتختفي بزرّ منذ سلمنا مصيرنا العاطفي للآلات!

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Instead of sidewalks, why not sideruns? After all, the pace of life is faster than it has ever been, so I think our infrastructure’s nomenclature should reflect that.

Author: Jonathan Safran Foer,  Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close
Quote: There's nothing wrong with not understanding yourself.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Relax. Just be. And be just.

Author: Jean Anouilh
Quote: There is love of course. And then there's life, its enemy.

Author: James Frey,  A Million Little Pieces
Quote: The Young Man came to the Old Man seeking counsel.I broke something, Old Man.How badly is it broken?It's in a million little pieces.I'm afraid I can't help you.Why?There's nothing you can do.Why?It can't be fixed.Why?It's broken beyond repair. It's in a million little pieces.

Author: Jennifer Niven,  All the Bright Places
Quote: What if life could be this way? Only the happy parts, none of the terrible, not even the mildly unpleasant. What if we could just cut out the bad and keep the good? This is what I want to do with Violet - give her only the good, keep away the bad, so that good is all we ever have around us.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Kafka on the Shore
Quote: That’s how stories happen — with a turning point, an unexpected twist. There’s only one kind of happiness, but misfortune comes in all shapes and sizes. It’s like Tolstoy said. Happiness is an allegory, unhappiness a story.

Author: Jeannette Walls,  The Glass Castle
Quote: Life is a drama full of tragedy and comedy. You should learn to enjoy the comic episodes a little more.

Author: Anais Nin
Quote: Life is truly known only to those who suffer, lose, endure adversity and stumble from defeat to defeat.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I don’t remember my birth. I guess I got dementia at a young age.

Author: Ellen Goodman
Quote: Normal is getting dressed in clothes that you buy for work and driving through traffic in a car that you are still paying for - in order to get to the job you need to pay for the clothes and the car, and the house you leave vacant all day so you can afford to live in it.

Author: Margaret Atwood,  Cat's Eye
Quote: Potential has a shelf life.

Author: Michael Jackson
Quote: To live is to be musical, starting with the blood dancing in your veins. Everything living has a rhythm. Do you feel your music?

Author: Lois Lowry,  The Giver
Quote: I feel sorry for anyone who is in a place where he feels strange and stupid.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I just bought a bag of potato-chip-flavored air. I also bought a bed, but sleep wasn’t included. Thank God a cup of coffee is full of wakefulness.

Author: Leila Sales,  This Song Will Save Your Life
Quote: That's the problem with life. You never get enough time to stare at your ceiling and try to figure out what's going on.

Author: Tehyi Hsieh
Quote: Life is partly what we make it, and partly what it is made by the friends we choose.

Author: محمد المخزنجي,  البستان
Quote: إن السعادة هي أن أشرب كوب شاي.. مع صديق.. في لحظة رضا.

Author: Tennessee Williams
Quote: You can be young without money, but you can't be old without it.

Author: Deb Caletti,  The Queen of Everything
Quote: It's good to let God pick a man for you. We don't do so well when we pick them ourselves. They end up lipsticks in a drawer, all those wrong colors you thought looked so good in the package.

Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote: We live in a dark and romantic and quite tragic world.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Perfect Match
Quote: Envy, after all, comes from wanting something that isn't yours. But grief comes from losing something you've already had.

Author: Susan Gordon Lydon,  The Knitting Sutra: Craft as a Spiritual Practice
Quote: Letting go is the lesson. Letting go is always the lesson. Have you ever noticed how much of our agony is all tied up with craving and loss?

Author: Gertrude Stein,  Three Lives
Quote: You look ridiculous if you danceYou look ridiculous if you don't danceSo you might as welldance.

Author: G.K. Chesterton,  What I Saw in America
Quote: I wish we could sometimes love the characters in real life as we love the characters in romances. There are a great many human souls whom we should accept more kindly, and even appreciate more clearly, if we simply thought of them as people in a story.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Relationships are like water. If you grab tight, clamping and clenching to gain control, you’ll lose it all. Instead, cup your hand gently, so she feels free to drink until her thirst is quenched.

Author: Jay Asher,  Thirteen Reasons Why
Quote: I can't. You can't rewrite the past.

Author: Morrissey
Quote: Disappointment came to me,and booted me,and bruised and hurt me,but that's how people grow up.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Whenever You're Gone, I'm Here For You
Quote: It’s easier to hide your smoking habit on a foggy day. Let that be a lesson for you and your secret lover.

Author: George Eliot,  Middlemarch
Quote: But the effect of her being on those around her was incalculably diffusive: for the growing good of the world is partly dependent on unhistoric acts; and that things are not so ill with you and me as they might have been, is half owing to the number who lived faithfully a hidden life, and rest in unvisited tombs.

Author: Albert Camus
Quote: There is but one truly serious philosophical problem and that is suicide. Judging whether life is or is not worth living amounts to answering the fundamental question of philosophy. All the rest — whether or not the world has three dimensions, whether the mind has nine or twelve categories — comes afterwards. These are games; one must first answer.

Author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross
Quote: It is important to feel the anger without judging it, without attempting to find meaning in it. It may take many forms: anger at the health-care system, at life, at your loved one for leaving. Life is unfair. Death is unfair. Anger is a natural reaction to the unfairness of loss.

Author: Neil Gaiman
Quote: Normally, in anything I do, I'm fairly miserable. I do it, and I get grumpy because there is a huge, vast gulf, this aching disparity, between the platonic ideal of the project that was living in my head, and the small, sad, wizened, shaking, squeaking thing that I actually produce.

Author: Leigh Bardugo,  Ruin and Rising
Quote: They had an ordinary life, full of ordinary things-if love can ever be called that.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’m an only child, and therefore I gave birth to my parents, because if it weren’t for me, they wouldn’t even be parents.

Author: Zayn Malik
Quote: No matter how hard life is, don't lose hope

Author: Joseph Conrad,  Heart of Darkness
Quote: Droll thing life is -- that mysterious arrangement of merciless logic for a futile purpose. The most you can hope from it is some knowledge of yourself -- that comes too late -- a crop of inextinguishable regrets.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: When you say "I"and "my"too much, you lose the capacity to understand the "we"and "our".

Author: Jodi Picoult,  My Sister's Keeper
Quote: See, as much as you want to hold on to the bitter sore memory that someone has left this world, you are still in it. And the very act of living is a tide: at first it seems to make no difference at all, and then one day you look down and see how much pain has eroded.

Author: Kathryn Stockett,  The Help
Quote: That's what I love about Aibileen, she can take the most complicated things in life and wrap them up so small and simple, they'll fit right in your pocket.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Only a fool would say they’re not a fool. Well, I am not a fool, which is why I say I am a fool.

Author: Ramon Bautista,  Bakit Hindi Ka Crush ng Crush Mo?
Quote: There's more to life than love.

Author: Ana Monnar
Quote: Whatever is going to happen will happen, whether we worry or not.

Author: Tana French,  In the Woods
Quote: I am not good at noticing when I'm happy, except in retrospect.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A follow-up letter is best when not written on the back of a suicide note. Remember this next time you’re at a networking event, unless your new connection is a mortician.

Author: Nick Vujicic
Quote: If we went by the world's definition of who I'm supposed to be because I look weird... 'Well, surely, this guy can't have a productive life, surely, he doesn't have a sense of humor. Surely, he can't love life.' We stereotype people in this world. And so... if the world thinks you're not good enough, it's a lie, you know. Get a second opinion.

Author: John Updike,  A Month Of Sundays
Quote: Suspect each moment, for it is a thief, tiptoeing away with more than it brings.

Author: Robert Frost
Quote: And were an epitaph to be my story I'd have a short one ready for my own. I would have written of me on my stone: I had a lover's quarrel with the world.

Author: Brené Brown,  The Gifts of Imperfection: Let Go of Who You Think You're Supposed to Be and Embrace Who You Are
Quote: Understanding the difference between healthy striving and perfectionism is critical to laying down the shield and picking up your life. Research shows that perfectionism hampers success. In fact, it's often the path to depression, anxiety, addiction, and life paralysis.

Author: Clarissa Pinkola Estés,  Women Who Run With the Wolves: Myths and Stories of the Wild Woman Archetype
Quote: I hope you will go out and let stories, that is life, happen to you, and that you will work with these stories... water them with your blood and tears and your laughter till they bloom, till you yourself burst into bloom.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I meet people to know I’m not alone. I network like an astronaut on the moon.

Author: Andrew Clements,  Things Not Seen
Quote: Two wrongs don't make a right, but don't three lefts make a right? Two wrongs don't make a right, but don't two negatives make a positive?

Author: Lisa See,  Snow Flower and the Secret Fan
Quote: I am old enough to know only too well my good and bad qualities, which were often one in the same.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: A kiss may ruin a human life

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: Sorrow looks back, Worry looks around, Faith looks up

Author: Henrik Ibsen
Quote: To live is to war with trolls.

Author: Khaled Hosseini,  The Kite Runner
Quote: The problem, of course, was that [he] saw the world in black and white. And he got to decide what was black and what was white. You can't love a person who lives that way without fearing him too. Maybe even hating him a little.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Networking is more quality, and less quantity. It’s better to form a solid connection with one new person, than a liquid connection with ten. You don’t want people to think you drink too much.

Author: Douglas Coupland,  Life After God
Quote: Time ticks by; we grow older. Before we know it, too much time has passed and we've missed the chance to have had other people hurt us. To a younger me this sounded like luck; to an older me this sounds like a quiet tragedy.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  The Intern
Quote: Please, touch me, I pray.

Author: Stephen Hawking
Quote: I have noticed that even those who assert that everything is predestined and that we can change nothing about it still look both ways before they cross the street

Author: John Rhys-Davies
Quote: In the film world, we can all be heroes. In the real world, where heroism can cost you your life or the life of the ones you love, people aren't so willing to make those sacrifices. When they do, they are set apart from the rest of us.

Author: Mitch Albom,  The Five People You Meet in Heaven
Quote: In order to move on, you must understand why you felt what you did and why you no longer need to feel it.

Author: Rick Riordan,  The Son of Neptune
Quote: Life is only precious because it ends, kid. Take it from a god. You mortals don't know how lucky you are

Author: Samuel Beckett,  Endgame
Quote: The end is in the beginning and yet you go on.

Author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass
Quote: Single is no longer a lack of options – but a choice. A choice to refuse to let your life be defined by your relationship status but to live every day Happily and let your Ever After work itself out.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: It’s not who you know that matters—it’s who knows you that’s important. Personal branding builds up your reputation to the point where you have a presence even in your absence.

Author: Dr. Seuss,  Oh, The Places You'll Go!
Quote: Fame you'll be famous, as famous as can be, with everyone watching you win on TV, Except when they don't because sometimes they won't..

Author: Ayn Rand,  Atlas Shrugged
Quote: Live and act within the limit of your knowledge and keep expanding it to the limit of your life.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: If you are not the hero of your own story, then you're missing the whole point of your humanity.

Author: Toni Morrison,  The Bluest Eye
Quote: Along with the idea of romantic love, she was introduced to another--physical beauty. Probably the most destructive ideas in the history of human thought. Both originated in envy, thrived in insecurity, and ended in disillusion.

Author: Ali Shaw,  The Girl With Glass Feet
Quote: Have you ever hoped for something? And held out for it against all the odds? Until everything you did was ridiculous?

Author: Lily Tomlin
Quote: I said "Somebody should do something about that."Then I realized I am somebody.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: You are not your body. You are the sum of all your actions, and they live on after your body dies. You may be mortal, but your brand is eternal.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Leadership is being the first to put others second. Wait, that’s not right. That’s politics.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: #Networking is people looking for people looking for people. As for me, I’m more of a birdwatcher.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Personal branding is important to me as a person. It’s also important to me as a non-person. I am a rock.

Author: مصطفى محمود,  رحلتي من الشك إلى الإيمان
Quote: إذا خفيت عنا الحكمة في العذاب أحيانا.. فلأننا لا ندرك كل شيء ولا نعرف كل شيء، ولا ندرك من القصة إلا تلك المرحلة المحدودة بين قوسين اسمها الدنيا.. أما ما قبل ذلك ومابعد ذلك فهو بالنسبة لنا غيب محجوب.. ولذا يجب أن نصمت في احترام ولانطلق الأحكام..

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Most people go to networking events to gain visibility. But in a crowded room, I’m trying to figure out how to become invisible. I network like the ghost of a chameleon.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Last weekend I went out of my comfort zone to go hang out with people I’d only heard about, and I met one new person who turned out to be a very valuable contact. I should try networking at my family reunions more often, because that’s how I finally met my dad.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I must be a great leader because many people follow me. Most of the people are police officers, if that gives you any indication of my character.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My handshake is as firm as cooked spaghetti. So, do you prefer your introductions with Alfredo or marinara sauce?

Author: Brad Meltzer
Quote: We are all ordinary. We are all boring. We are all spectacular. We are all shy. We are all bold. We are all heroes. We are all helpless. It just depends on the day.

Author: Danny Meyer
Quote: Life is a series of waves to be embraced and overcome.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Life is about having an attitude of gratitude. And grabitude. Seriously, you’ve got to take stuff. What, do you think someone’s just going to hand you what you want?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Personal branding is sales, because you’re selling an image of yourself, a mirage, and you are the product.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’m so shy that if you played “Guess The Mannequin” with me and two mannequins, you’d pick me, because I’m the quiet one. Still, it’s important for me to get out and meet people, even if that means hanging around department stores wearing the latest fashions.

Author: Lauren Oliver,  Requiem
Quote: Live free or die.

Author: Charles Dickens,  Great Expectations
Quote: That was a memorable day to me, for it made great changes in me. But it is the same with any life. Imagine one selected day struck out of it, and think how different its course would have been. Pause you who read this, and think for a moment of the long chain of iron or gold, of thorns or flowers, that would never have bound you, but for the formation of the first link on one memorable day.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When you’re embarrassed, you turn red. When I blush, I turn plaid. I network at kilt conventions, so even if I say something awkward I still look cool.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The business of business is people, not products or services. Take care of the people, and the people will take care of you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If what you wear says more about who you are then what you say when you speak, then my advice is to keep quiet and wear loud clothing.

Author: Karen Marie Moning,  Shadowfever
Quote: Desire makes life happen. Makes it matter. Makes everything worth it. Desire is life. Hunger to see the next sunrise or sunset, to touch the one you love, to try again. “Hell would be waking up and wanting nothing,” he agrees.

Author: Rick Riordan,  The Blood of Olympus
Quote: You will suffer, son of Hades!’ What else is new? Nico thought.

Author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Stranger than Fiction
Quote: Everything is funnier in retrospect, funnier and prettier and cooler. You can laugh at anything from far enough away.

Author: Junot Díaz,  The Brief Wondrous Life of Oscar Wao
Quote: That’s life for you. All the happiness you gather to yourself, it will sweep away like it’s nothing. If you ask me I don’t think there are any such things as curses. I think there is only life. That’s enough.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: What makes a good leader? I ask myself this every day, and then as I begin to list off characteristics I realize I’m describing myself. Am I the ideal leader? Let’s just say that if I were running for political office, I know who I’d vote for—twice.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Money is not equal for all people. A strong personal brand adds more lift and leverage. One dollar from me may buy a soda from a car dealership, but one dollar from Justin Bieber may get him a Ferrari. And they'd pay him to drive away.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Lightning doesn’t thunder twice. Let that be a lesson in love.

Author: Alexandre Dumas,  The Count of Monte Cristo
Quote: Those born to wealth, and who have the means of gratifying every wish, know not what is the real happiness of life, just as those who have been tossed on the stormy waters of the ocean on a few frail planks can alone realize the blessings of fair weather.

Author: Terry Pratchett,  Reaper Man
Quote: YOU FEAR TO DIE?"It's not that I don't want... I mean, I've always...it's just that life is a habit that's hard to break...

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Silence
Quote: Right now, I had everything I could ask for. It wasn't a long list, but it was a very satisfying one, starting with the love of my life back in my arms.

Author: Wendelin Van Draanen,  Flipped
Quote: It's easy to look back and see it, and it's easy to give the advice. But the sad fact is, most people don't look beneath the surface until it's too late.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If you want to steal my heart, you must realize it's not a one-time heist. This theft will take every minute of the rest of your life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: With any new business deal, don’t think about how much you can afford to get—think about how much you can afford to give. A spirit of giving will allow you to get.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Whenever You're Gone, I'm Here For You
Quote: I don’t mind waiting rooms. I’m waiting on the love of my life, so I may as well have a seat, right?

Author: Sue Monk Kidd
Quote: People, in general, would rather die than forgive. It's that hard.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Wherever there’s a gathering of people, there is networking going on. My favorite place to network is the cemetery.

Author: Eckhart Tolle
Quote: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you will ever have.

Author: Charles Saatchi
Quote: My aim in life isn't so much the pursuit of happiness as the happiness of pursuit.

Author: Audrey Hepburn
Quote: My life isn’t theories and formulae. It’s part instinct, part common sense. Logic is as good a word as any, and I’ve absorbed what logic I have from everything and everyone… from my mother, from training as a ballet dancer, from Vogue magazine, from the laws of life and health and nature.

Author: Roman Payne,  Hope and Despair
Quote: It’s not that we have to quit this life one day, it’s how many things we have to quit all at once: holding hands, hotel rooms, music, the physics of falling leaves, vanilla and jasmine, poppies, smiling, anthills, the color of the sky, coffee and cashmere, literature, sparks and subway trains... If only one could leave this life slowly!

Author: Evanescence
Quote: If people make fun of you, that probably means you're doing something right.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Networking is like fishing. Just give some beer and a boat and I’ll be in business.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I network like a salmon in a bear costume. Why swim upstream when the honeybee has all the flowers? Is anything more romantic than roses on a grave?

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: I'm not crying because of you; you're not worth it. I'm crying because my delusion of who you were was shattered by the truth of who you are.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: The act of taking the first step is what separates the winners from the losers.

Author: Cormac McCarthy,  All the Pretty Horses
Quote: He stood at the window of the empty cafe and watched the activites in the square and he said that it was good that God kept the truths of life from the young as they were starting out or else they'd have no heart to start at all.

Author: Robin Hood
Quote: Rise and rise again until lambs become lions

Author: John Boyne,  The Boy in the Striped Pajamas
Quote: ...Despite the mayhem that followed, Bruno found that he was still holding Shmuel's hand in his own and nothing in the world would have persuaded him to let go.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Networking isn’t synonymous with partying. If you’re doing it right, partying seems libraryesque in comparison.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I network like a Spanish Inquisitor. I am very good at extracting relevant information. And if you resist, you’ll only confirm your heresy.

Author: David Archuleta,  Chords of Strength: A Memoir of Soul, Song and the Power of Perseverance
Quote: I made up my mind not to care so much about the destination, and simply enjoy the journey.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: Everything you do is triggered by an emotion of either desire or fear.

Author: Rumi
Quote: Gamble everything for love, if you're a true human being.

Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote: We can't become what we need to be by remaining what we are.

Author: Abraham Verghese,  Cutting for Stone
Quote: You live it forward, but understand it backward.

Author: Julie Kagawa,  The Immortal Rules
Quote: You don't dwell on what you've lost, you just move on."-Allison

Author: Dark Jar Tin Zoo,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you. We installed Dr. Robert Jarvik’s artificial heart in a mannequin and brought it to life, only to later kill it because a creature that’s all fake heart and no brain is what’s commonly called a “politician,” and must be destroyed.

Author: Ida Scott Taylor
Quote: Do not look back and grieve over the past, for it is gone; and do not be troubled about the future, for it has yet to come. Live in the present, and make it so beautiful that it will be worth remembering

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: Life is a series of surprises and would not be worth taking or keeping if it were not.

Author: Oscar Wilde,  De Profundis
Quote: To regret one’s own experiences is to arrest one’s own development. To deny one’s own experiences is to put a lie into the lips of one’s own life. It is no less than a denial of the soul.

Author: Jim Valvano
Quote: I just got one last thing, I urge all of you, all of you, to enjoy your life, the precious moments you have. To spend each day with some laughter and some thought, to get you're emotions going.

Author: Emil Cioran
Quote: Man starts over again everyday, in spite of all he knows, against all he knows.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Whenever You're Gone, I'm Here For You
Quote: To me, impulsive means foolish. But if a person’s not a little impulsive, they don’t have a pulse.

Author: Mindy Kaling,  Is Everyone Hanging Out Without Me?
Quote: I simply regard romantic comedies as a subgenre of sci-fi, in which the world created therein has different rules than my regular human world.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Glue holds stuff together pretty well. But why not try using guitar music as an adhesive? After all, it’s held many bands together.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: How would your life be different if…You approached all relationships with authenticity and honesty? Let today be the day…You dedicate yourself to building relationships on the solid foundation of truth and authenticity.

Author: Tony DeLiso,  Legacy: The Power Within
Quote: Happiness is part of who we are. Joy is the feeling

Author: Dora J. Arod,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you. You were an escalator, and I was a flight of stairs. You thought I was a Luddite, and I thought I was as ostrich, because I hadn’t figured out how to put the fly in flight. One day you broke down, and then you saw that you and I weren’t so different after all.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Losing your mind is preferable to losing your woman, because if you lose your woman you will also lose your mind, and then you’re left with nothing.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I spoke like a spoke on a wheel, as I went around and around without actually saying what I wanted to say. I was love flustered.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: Love only grows by sharing. You can only have more for yourself by giving it away to others.

Author: Susan Beth Pfeffer,  Life As We Knew It
Quote: I wonder if I'll ever have to decide which is worse, life as we're living or no life at all.

Author: Jennifer Niven,  All the Bright Places
Quote: People rarely bring flowers to a suicide.

Author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S
Quote: Do not let your difficulties fill you with anxiety, after all it is only in the darkest nights that stars shine more brightly.

Author: Mitch Albom,  Tuesdays with Morrie
Quote: Because if you've found meaning in your life, you don't want to go back. You want to go forward.

Author: Roald Dahl,  My Uncle Oswald
Quote: Life is more fun if you play games.

Author: Albert Camus,  L'Étranger
Quote: Mostly, I could tell, I made him feel uncomfortable. He didn't understand me, and he was sort of holding it against me. I felt the urge to reassure him that I was like everybody else, just like everybody else. But really there wasn't much point, and I gave up the idea out of laziness.

Author: Jacqueline Carey,  Kushiel's Chosen
Quote: All paths are present, always... and we can but choose among them.

Author: Santosh Kalwar,  Quote Me Everyday
Quote: A heart has problems which mind cannot understand.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: There are two things we should always be 1. raw and 2. ready. When you are raw, you are always ready and when you are ready you usually realize that you are raw. Waiting for perfection is not an answer, one cannot say "I will be ready when I am perfect"because then you will never be ready, rather one must say "I am raw and I am ready just like this right now, how and who I am.

Author: George Orwell,  Animal Farm
Quote: This work was strictly voluntary, but any animal who absented himself from it would have his rations reduced by half.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  A Zebra is the Piano of the Animal Kingdom
Quote: How many seconds does it take to win second? As many as it takes to win first—if you don’t use them properly.

Author: Margaret Atwood,  The Tent
Quote: A home filled with nothing but yourself. It's heavy, that lightness. It's crushing, that emptiness.

Author: Anita Shreve,  The Pilot's Wife
Quote: To leave, after all, was not the same as being left.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  If you bring the booze and food, I'll bring the thirst and hunger
Quote: Word of mouth—it's more powerful, more convincing, and more audible than word of hand. If you need me, I’ll be in the audience clapping.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Everyone is a salesman, and the product is each person. Personal branding is being conscious to the continual nature of selling yourself.

Author: Martha Graham
Quote: There is a vitality, a life force, an energy, a quickening, that is translated through you into action, and because there is only one of you in all time, this expression is unique.

Author: Jay-Z
Quote: I collect art, and I drink wine... things that I like that I had never been exposed to. But I never said, 'I'm going to buy art to impress this crowd.' That's just ridiculous to me. I don't live my life like that, because how could you be happy with yourself?

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: Good works is giving to the poor and the helpless, but divine works is showing them their worth to the One who matters.

Author: A.W. Tozer
Quote: Sometimes I go to God and say, "God, if Thou dost never answer another prayer while I live on this earth, I will still worship Thee as long as I live and in the ages to come for what Thou hast done already. God’s already put me so far in debt that if I were to live one million millenniums I couldn’t pay Him for what He’s done for me.

Author: Santosh Kalwar,  Quote Me Everyday
Quote: Do not become someone else just because you are hurt. Be who you are & smile, it may solve, all problems you have got.

Author: Gabriel Garcí­a Márquez
Quote: Never stop smiling not even when you're sad, someone might fall in love with your smile.

Author: Anthony Doerr,  All the Light We Cannot See
Quote: When I lost my sight, Werner, people said I was brave. When my father left, people said I was brave. But it is not bravery; I have no choice. I wake up and live my life. Don't you do the same?

Author: Vladimir Nabokov,  Lolita
Quote: We all have such fateful objects -- it may be a recurrent landscape in one case, a number in another -- carefully chosen by the gods to attract events of specific significance for us: here shall John always stumble; there shall Jane's heart always break.

Author: Masashi Kishimoto
Quote: Being hurt inevitably breeds feelings of hatred towards your attacker. But when we hurt others, we have to deal with their hatred for us, and our own feelings of guilt. Knowing what it feels like to be hurt is exactly why we try to be kind to others. That’s what makes us humans.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Wisdom is knowing when you are being patient, and when you are wasting time by waiting.

Author: Jim Henson
Quote: My hope still is to leave the world a bit better than when I got here.

Author: Sue Monk Kidd,  The Secret Life of Bees
Quote: There is nothing perfect...only life.

Author: Gena Showalter,  Oh My Goth
Quote: I’m not a bad person. I haven’t killed anyone. I (rarely) lie. I don’t kick little puppies. So why do people look at me as if the world would be a better place without me?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I'm about to get my grind on. My coffee grind. Like a true hustler.

Author: Toba Beta,  Betelgeuse Incident: Insiden Bait Al-Jauza
Quote: I don't judge people. It blurs out the center of my attention,my focus, myself.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She plants love, and she grows roses. The fragrance of romance comes from the blossom that blooms in the heart.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The strands of DNA are like strings, and it’s as if I am a walking guitar, a musical being whose vibration can be heard as love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My cup is full of air. I should empty it and fill it with love. Or coffee, as the two are synonymous to me.

Author: Immanuel Kant
Quote: One who makes himself a worm cannot complain afterwards if people step on him.

Author: Douglas Adams,  The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
Quote: Exactly!"said Deep Thought. "So once you do know what the question actually is, you'll know what the answer means.

Author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower
Quote: It’s strange how things can change back as suddenly as they changed originally. When one thing happens and suddenly, things are back to normal.

Author: Gilbert K. Chesterton
Quote: When it comes to life the critical thing is whether you take things for granted or take them with gratitude.

Author: Glen Cook,  Shadow Games
Quote: Every ounce of my cynicism is supported by historical precedent.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The roses of romance grow when you water your relationship with gratitude. Love will bloom and blossom when you recognize the awesome.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love may make you feel blue, love may make you feel green, and sometimes love may even make you feel turquoise or teal. Depression and envy get all the pretty shades of description, and I love that, but in a pink/purple kind of way.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The word long is short, and so is the word short, but why is the word love as long as long? Shouldn’t it be longer?

Author: Banana Yoshimoto,  Goodbye Tsugumi
Quote: No matter where you are, you're always a bit on your own, always an outsider.

Author: A.W. Tozer
Quote: Perhaps it takes a purer faith to praise God for unrealized blessings than for those we once enjoyed or those we enjoy now.

Author: Marcus Aurelius,  Meditations
Quote: Do every act of your life as though it were the very last act of your life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Ink is drinkable and printable. The words “I love you” don’t take up much space, but they can quench your thirst forever.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The going rate for love is going away. And the more you go away, the more expensive it gets.

Author: Charles Baudelaire
Quote: Life has but one true charm: the charm of the game. But what if we’re indifferent to whether we win or lose?

Author: Viktor E. Frankl,  Man's Search for Meaning
Quote: I do not forget any good deed done to me & I do not carry a grudge for a bad one.

Author: Yoko Ono
Quote: Each time we don't say what we wanna say, we're dying.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Sleepwalking is restercise
Quote: Quarterbacks shouldn’t leave the pocket, because that’s where the money is. Every politician knows this.

Author: James Patterson,  Suzanne's Diary for Nicholas
Quote: Good memories are like charms...Each is special. You collect them, one by one, until one day you look back and discover they make a long, colorful bracelet.

Author: H.P. Lovecraft
Quote: I never ask a man what his business is, for it never interests me. What I ask him about are his thoughts and dreams.

Author: Victoria Schwab,  The Archived
Quote: What if I mess up?""Oh, you will. You'll mess up, you'll make mistakes, you'll break things. Some you'll be able to piece together, and others you'll lose. That's all a given. But there's only one thing you have to do for me.""What's that?""Stay alive long enough to mess up again.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My heart is locked away in a cage surrounded by ribs. That’s to protect it, and to keep the world safe. It’s currently serving a life sentence.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: Water can be as hard as ice and as soft as fog, which is why my love is so drinkable, because it is fluid and forgiving. It's easy to love until there's nothing left. Eventually, the water runs out, the ice melts, and the fog fades into an abyss.-Jarod Kintz and Karen Quan

Author: Hilary Duff
Quote: I can’t really act the way I want to act, or say what I want to say all the time. And a lot of times, I cover that up with a smile.

Author: Ann Voskamp,  One Thousand Gifts: A Dare to Live Fully Right Where You Are
Quote: I want to see beauty. In the ugly, in the sink, in the suffering, in the daily, in all the days before I die, the moments before I sleep.

Author: D.H. Lawrence,  Women in Love
Quote: I should feel the air move against me, and feel the things I touched, instead of having only to look at them. I'm sure life is all wrong because it has become much too visual - we can neither hear nor feel nor understand, we can only see. I'm sure that is entirely wrong.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My love is powdered sunshine. Just add water. (Warning: Do NOT attempt to snort it or distribute as a healthy cocaine substitute.)

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She wants to teach me to dance, but how do you instruct water to flow? I'm so fluid all you can do is swim in my moves and drink my essence.

Author: Princess Diana
Quote: If you find someone you love in your life, then hang on to that love.

Author: Madonna
Quote: Sometimes you have to be a bitch to get things done.

Author: Jason Mraz
Quote: Because I trust in the ever-changing climate of the heart. (At least, today I feel that way.) I think it is necessary to have many experiences for the sake of feeling something; for the sake of being challenged, and for the sake of being expressive, to offer something to someone else, to learn what we are capable of.

Author: Stephenie Meyer,  The Host
Quote: What am I dying for?

Author: Carrie Ryan,  The Dead-Tossed Waves
Quote: You stay safe, You love. You survive. You laugh and cry and struggle and sometimes you fail and sometimes you succeed. You Push.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My love for you grows daily, and all it takes is exposure to your sunny disposition, coupled with watering it with coffee.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I sell soap. Buy two bars and get a FREE shower. (Water not included.) Act within the next 15 minutes and I’ll even throw in the towel. I quit!

Author: Hermann Hesse,  Demian: Die Geschichte von Emil Sinclairs Jugend
Quote: You've never lived what you are thinking, and that isn't good. Only the ideas we actually live are of any value.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My acquaintances aren’t worth the aqua I drink after they leave me thirsting for something more meaningful. I don’t want refillable relationships—I want connections so deep they are black abysses.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My life is but a firefly’s flicker, so I’d better use my brief moment to light up the darkness that covers her path.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: To be angry is easy, but to forgive is hard. That's why to love is easy, and to love is hard. I try to be so hard that I'm soft, like a liquid rock, fluid and forgiving, but unmovable in my resolve.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Her love was too cold, like an anti-oven. That's called a freezer, and sometimes it burns food. She gave me heartburn, just like coffee, and it really woke me up to the reality of relationships.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Self-growth comes from being nurtured, not tortured. I had to learn this the hard way. On sale now: Iron Maiden. Only used once.

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Silence
Quote: I missed you, Angel. Not one day went by that I didn't feel you missing from my life. You haunted me to the point that I began to believe Hank had gone back on his oath and killed you. I couldn't escape you and I didn't want to. You tortured me, but it was better than losing you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Water is translucent, but not invisible. But a glass half full is half translucent, half invisible, and you cannot drink what you cannot see, which may be why I am so thirsty for her love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: What reading level is the word love? It’s a four-letter word everybody knows the meaning of, but nobody can define it.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Wisdom equals knowledge plus courage. You have to not only know what to do and when to do it, but you have to also be brave enough to follow through.

Author: Jim Butcher,  Death Masks
Quote: There are things you can't walk away from. Not if you want to live with yourself afterward.

Author: Anirban Bose,  Bombay Rains, Bombay Girls
Quote: The desire to love someone always exceeds the desire to be loved by someone & that's exactly why we end up loving the person who doesn't deserve that LOVE.

Author: Bono
Quote: Stop asking God to bless what you're doing. Find out what God's doing. It's already blessed.

Author: John Oates
Quote: I have a great family, I live an amazing life.

Author: Michael Jackson
Quote: Hope is such a beautiful word, but it often seems very fragile. Life is still being needlessly hurt and destroyed.

Author: André Gide,  Prometheus Illbound
Quote: I do not love men: I love what devours them.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If you find yourself thirsting for my love, don’t forget that I sell straws in a variety of flavors. What is the price of romance? Good question. Today only it’s on sale for half-off wholesale prices. Everything must go. My entire inventory of straws is being liquidated.

Author: Thomas Merton,  Thoughts in Solitude
Quote: If a man is to live, he must be all alive, body, soul, mind, heart, spirit.

Author: Nora Roberts,  Black Rose
Quote: That woman doesn't have the sense God gave a retarded flea.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A raisin on the ground is full of hope that if it just keeps aging, it will turn into wine and get drunk on its wrinkly self.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Either I will love you, or I will love you if and only if you love me in return. I prefer the former.

Author: Raymond Carver,  Where I'm Calling From: New and Selected Stories
Quote: But I can hardly sit still. I keep fidgeting, crossing one leg and then the other. I feel like I could throw off sparks, or break a window--maybe rearrange all the furniture.

Author: Langston Hughes
Quote: Oh, God of Dust and Rainbows,Help us to seeThat without the dust the rainbowWould not be.

Author: Frederick Buechner,  The Alphabet of Grace
Quote: Life is grace. Sleep is forgiveness. The night absolves. Darkness wipes the slate clean, not spotless to be sure, but clean enough for another day's chalking.

Author: Reba McEntire
Quote: To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone and a funnybone.

Author: Sabrina Ward Harrison,  Spilling Open: The Art of Becoming Yourself
Quote: I am afraid to show you who I really am, because if I show you who I really am, you might not like it--and that's all I got.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love Quotes for the Ages. Specifically Ages 19-91.
Quote: I know I love her, because when I see her my heart beats like a drum. If she played guitar and sang, we could start a band.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I have a doctorate degree from the School of Hard Knocks. I studied door-to-door salesmanship. This was before the doorbell was invented.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Trying to hide my feelings to avoid getting hurt just ends up hurting not only myself—but also the person I am hiding my feelings from.

Author: Jürgen Moltmann,  Theology of Hope
Quote: Totally without hope one cannot live. To live without hope is to cease to live. Hell is hopelessness. It is no accident that above the entrance to Dante's hell is the inscription: "Leave behind all hope, you who enter here.

Author: Dr. Seuss,  Oh, The Places You'll Go!
Quote: You won't lag behind, because you'll have the speed. You'll pass the whole gang and you'll soon take the lead.Wherever you fly, you'll be best of the best.Wherever you go, you will top all the rest.Except when you don't.Because, sometimes, you won't.

Author: Richard Bach
Quote: No matter how qualified or deserving we are, we will never reach a better life until we can imagine it for ourselves and allow ourselves to have it.

Author: Shane Koyczan
Quote: Don't let your luggage define your travels, each life unravels differently.

Author: Thomas S. Monson,  Pathways To Perfection: Discourses Of Thomas S. Monson
Quote: Our most significant opportunities will be found in times of greatest difficulty.

Author: Rebecca Wells,  Divine Secrets of the Ya-Ya Sisterhood
Quote: It’s life. You don’t figure it out. You just climb up on the beast and ride.

Author: Aimee Mullins
Quote: Giving up is conceding that things will never get better, and that is just not true. Ups and downs are a constant in life, and I've been belted into that roller coaster a thousand times.

Author: Michael Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night. The champagne was non-alcoholic. You didn't notice, and laughed at my jokes anyway.

Author: D.H. Lawrence
Quote: Life is ours to be spent, not tobe saved.

Author: Joseph Campbell,  The Hero's Journey: Joseph Campbell on His Life & Work
Quote: You enter the forestat the darkest point,where there is no path.Where there is a way or path,it is someone else's path.You are not on your own path.If you follow someone else's way,you are not going to realizeyour potential.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: The only real limitation on your abilities is the level of your desires. If you want it badly enough, there are no limits on what you can achieve.

Author: Flannery O'Connor
Quote: Where you come from is gone, where you thought you were going to was never there, and where you are is no good unless you can get away from it. Where is there a place for you to be? No place... Nothing outside you can give you any place... In yourself right now is all the place you've got.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: White letters plus white paper equals invisibility. Just because you can’t see my love for you, doesn’t mean I didn’t write about it.

Author: Bill Watterson
Quote: CALVIN:When I grow up I want to be an inventor. First I will invent a time machine. Then I'll come back to yesterday and take myself to tomorrow and skip this dumb assignment.

Author: Tim Burton,  The Melancholy Death of Oyster Boy and Other Stories
Quote: Son, are you happy? I don't mean to pry,but do you dream of Heaven?Have you ever wanted to die?

Author: Shaun Hick
Quote: You need to spend time crawling alone through shadows to truly appreciate what it is to stand in the sun.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Happiness is not the absence of problems; it's the ability to deal with them.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Do not let another day go by where your dedication to other people's opinions is greater than your dedication to your own emotions!

Author: Ellen Hopkins,  Burned
Quote: in a woman's womb.another chance.to make the world better.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: If you believe you can, you might. If you know you can, you will.

Author: Carl Sagan,  Cosmos
Quote: The Cosmos is all that is or was or ever will be. Our feeblest contemplations of the Cosmos stir us -- there is a tingling in the spine, a catch in the voice, a faint sensation, as if a distant memory, of falling from a height. We know we are approaching the greatest of mysteries.

Author: Rachel Carson,  The Sea Around Us
Quote: It is a curious situation that the sea, from which life first arose should now be threatened by the activities of one form of that life. But the sea, though changed in a sinister way, will continue to exist; the threat is rather to life itself.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Let me just pause a minute and drink in this moment. And if you film it, I’ll be able to get free refills for life.

Author: Karen Quan,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: She was stuck in between two worlds while her heart was pulling them both together. In a perfect world, she'd have both, or none at all. The symbol for love is two circles trying to merge in a Venn diagram that comes to a point down below, and only mostly separate are the two orbs one whole heart.-Karen Quan and Jarod Kintz

Author: Paulo Coelho,  The Alchemist
Quote: My heart is afraid that it will have to suffer.

Author: Rick Astley
Quote: My success set me up for life, and it meant that I could retire from the music industry at 27 to spend time with my newborn daughter and my wife. My time away from the spotlight allowed me to rediscover my love for music, and I'm doing it for me now and no one else.

Author: Erik Erikson
Quote: Life doesn't make any sense without interdependence. We need each other, and the sooner we learn that, the better for us all.

Author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky,  Crime and Punishment
Quote: The fear of appearances is the first symptom of impotence.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My goal is to be as forgiving as a man with amnesia, but love as if I remember and cherish all the things you do that make me smile.

Author: Carrie Jones,  Entice
Quote: You know, life fractures us all into little pieces. It harms us, but it's how we glue those fractures back together that make us stronger.

Author: Marilynne Robinson,  Gilead
Quote: Memory can make a thing seem to have been much more than it was.

Author: Jim Rohn
Quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment

Author: Brian Andreas
Quote: I'm not sure if there's one right place I'm supposed to be, he said, but I know a couple of wrong places I'd give a second try in a heartbeat.

Author: Conan O'Brien
Quote: When all else fails, there's always delusion.

Author: Henry David Thoreau,  Walden
Quote: I went to the woods because I wished to live deliberately, to front only the essential facts of life, and see if I could not learn what it had to teach, and not, when I came to die, discover that I had not lived.

Author: David McCullough
Quote: To me, history ought to be a source of pleasure. It isn't just part of our civic responsibility. To me, it's an enlargement of the experience of being alive, just the way literature or art or music is."[The Title Always Comes Last; NEH 2003 Jefferson Lecturer interview profile]

Author: Karen Blixen,  Out of Africa
Quote: You know you are truly alive when you’re living among lions.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If a company won't hire you, why don't you start your own company? Steve Jobs created jobs, he didn't apply for them. #Startup your dreams.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: After soul searching, I found myself. Then I found myself giving of myself to a charity that finds missing children. It's great to be found.

Author: Ava Dellaira,  Love Letters to the Dead
Quote: I know I wrote letters to people with no address on this earth, I know that you are dead. But I hear you. I hear all of you. We were here. Our lives matter.

Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote: Mathematics expresses values that reflect the cosmos, including orderliness, balance, harmony, logic, and abstract beauty.

Author: Morrissey
Quote: I can chase you, and I can catch you,but there is nothing I can do to make you mine.

Author: Maya Angelou
Quote: My life has been one great big joke,A dance that's walked,A song that's spoke,I laugh so hard I almost choke,When I think about myself.

Author: Gordon B. Hinckley
Quote: It is not so much the major events as the small day-to-day decisions that map the course of our living. . . Our lives are, in reality, the sum total of our seemingly unimportant decisions and of our capacity to live by those decisions.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If you fear rejection, you won’t embrace acceptance. But don’t push yourself onto others, because they won’t pull you close.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She cuts me deep with her words, with her withholding of words, and with her knife. I’m not sure which is the most painful.

Author: Amanda Mosher,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: When the world is cold, use bridges for firewood. And for extra warmth, give off an aura of love, and you won't need a bridge, because the other side will come to you.-Amanda Mosher and Jarod Kintz

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The Sacred and The Scared. Which of these two categories does your love fall under? I should write a love poem on a rolled-up scroll so you’d know which one categorizes mine.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: There exists a big circus tent, and the right entrance is named The Republicans, and the left entrance is called The Democrats. People argue over which is the correct path, not realizing everyone inside is a clown.

Author: Ernesto Che Guevara
Quote: Silence is argument carried out by other means.

Author: Anthony Robbins
Quote: The path to success is to take massive, determined action.

Author: Leo Babauta
Quote: The way I define happiness is being the creator of your experience, choosing to take pleasure in what you have, right now, regardless of the circumstances, while being the best you that you can be.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: To get people to notice you, you must be unique. If I were invisible, everybody would see me for who I am as a person.

Author: Derek Bok
Quote: For some students, especially in the sciences, the knowledge gained in college may be directly relevant to graduate study. For almost all students, a liberal arts education works in subtle ways to create a web of knowledge that will illumine problems and enlighten judgment on innumerable occasions in later life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I am so extreme that I do parkour like a caterpillar gyrates. My movements are slow and methodical, but eventually my free running takes flight. I love the same exact way, and my romance has the essence of a butterfly.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: He said he wanted to trade lives with me, saying he wanted what I have. He must want for nothing, because that’s exactly what I have.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Be memorable. Say something unforgettable. Be silent.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Necessity may be the mother of invention, but who is the father? Don’t look at me! I wore a condom.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I can sell you wine and I can sell you flowers, but I can't sell you romance, because that comes from your heart, and it's free.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If you don't think you need to develop your personal brand, my advice for you comes in the wisdom of two road signs: STOP; DEAD END.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A love story in six words: Hello. Goodbye. In between was marriage.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Patience is so valuable I'm willing to wait forever to achieve it. And while I wait, I may as well get busy being short-tempered.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Some men have actually died from laughing. That's so funny I fear for my own life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Poor is the man who thinks money makes him wealthy. Love is the true treasure, and the more you give away, the more you have.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: The true mystery of the world is the visible, not the invisible.

Author: Santosh Kalwar
Quote: I was lost yesterday, I am found today and I will be forgotten tomorrow.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When she tried to seduce me, I got suspicious, thinking she was just after my massive fortune. Then I relaxed, when I remembered I'm poor.

Author: Dolly Parton
Quote: If you don’t like the road you’re walking, start paving another one.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I used to gorge on gorgeous women, but now I look for things that can’t be seen with the eyes, but are only detected by the heart. This is love.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: To wait on love is to tie a weight on your heart and slowly drown. Why sink when you can fly by freely giving love away?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She’s ignoring my texts. Maybe she’s dead. Oh, I certainly hope so. I’d hate to think she’s being deliberately unresponsive.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: People don't care what I wear or don't wear, and even if I don't wear anything people will cover for me if they know that I care about them.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: You can use your mouth to speak the words I love you, or you can use your mouth to kiss me and transport love from your mind to my heart.

Author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower
Quote: I feel like a big faker because I've been putting my life back together, and nobody knows.

Author: Hlovate,  Contengan Jalanan
Quote: Everybody know death is inevitably coming, but it never fails to catch everybody by surprise everytime one is going

Author: Libba Bray,  Going Bovine
Quote: You can never know about about your own destiny: are the people you meet there to play a part on your oun destiny, or do you exist just to play a role in theirs?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Man has two legs and chairs have four, because we were made to stand out, not sit down—or be sat on. You are your brand—you are not a piece of furniture. Well, this applies to everyone except my grandma, but she’s dead, so she really doesn’t mind being used as a coat rack.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My sole possession is my passion, for no one can rob me of it. More fiery than love, it does not depend on another to blaze.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Logos on designer clothes don't make me feel like I've got a strong personal brand. No clothes make the man. Even wearing no clothes I'm still me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My coffee cup is empty. Why don't you pour your love in and wake up my soul?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Love is a process, either growing or shrinking, but never stagnant. My love for you was David, and now it is Goliath. Also, my love for you was Goliath, and now it is David.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When you find yourself in hot water, what else can you do but make a spot of tea? I still have a spot of tea on my shirt from yesterday.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Her love is more aww than awe, and even if were awesome, I want aweall, not merely some awe. I’m greedy for the amazing.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I question the equation like an equestrian, and I realize it’s horseshit. What is the equation? Vote=Change.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I give 110% in love. If that seems absurd, just know that I used presidential voting machines to calculate that number. It's totally legit.

Author: Gregory David Roberts
Quote: If fate doesn't make you laugh, you just don't get the joke.

Author: Bill Watterson
Quote: CALVIN:As usual goodness hardly puts up a fight.

Author: Jim Rohn
Quote: Let others lead small lives, but not you.. Let others argue over small things, but not you.. Let others cry over small hurts, but not you.. Let others leave their future in someone else's hands, but not you.

Author: Azar Nafisi,  Reading Lolita in Tehran
Quote: You don't read Gatsby, I said, to learn whether adultery is good or bad but to learn about how complicated issues such as adultery and fidelity and marriage are. A great novel heightens your senses and sensitivity to the complexities of life and of individuals, and prevents you from the self-righteousness that sees morality in fixed formulas about good and evil.
