Author: Bernard Cornwell,  The Winter King
Quote: But fate, as Merlin always taught us, is inexorable. Life is a jest of the Gods, Merlin liked to claim, and there is no justice. You must learn to laugh, he once told me, or else you'll just weep yourself to death.

Author: Kurt Vonnegut,  The Sirens of Titan
Quote: The worst thing that could possibly happen to anybody would be to not be used for anything by anybody. Thank you for using me, even though I didn't want to be used by anybody.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I think a cool #startup would be a company that makes Finish line tape, for marathons. In the long run, it could be very profitable.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If I could make tea out of your love, would it be hot, or iced? Would it be black, or green? Would it be sweet, or unsweet? Would you offer free refills?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Every guy says he's not like every guy, thus proving he is like every guy. Show me a guy who's different, and I'll tell you to stop pointing at me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I mined my mind, and I found no love. My heart is where excavation yields gold, and if you dig me as much as I dig you, we can both get rich.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I'm here at The Container Store looking for something large enough to hold all my love for her. It's a flood, so I hope they sell Shipping Container Ships.

Author: Neil Gaiman,  The Sandman, Vol. 4: Season of Mists
Quote: I think, well, I've had a shit of a life, all things considered. It wasn't fair. Everyone I've ever loved is dead, and my leg hurts all the bloody time... But I think, any God that can do sunsets like that, a different one every night... 'Strewth, well, you've got to respect the old bastard, haven't you?

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Plain Truth
Quote: If you're afraid of everyone leaving you, what do you do?"Make them stay."And if you can't do that, or don't know how to?"Ellie shrugged. "I don't know."Yes, you do. In fact, you've done it. You leave first,"Coop said, "so you don't have to watch them walk away.

Author: Andy Warhol
Quote: Being born is like being kidnapped. And then sold into slavery.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Glass
Quote: She supposed they were imperfections, those marks, but they didn't feel that way to her; they were a history, cut into his body: the map of a life of endless war.

Author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.,  Life's Little Instruction Book: 511 Suggestions, Observations, and Reminders on How to Live a Happy and Rewarding Life
Quote: Don't forget, a person's greatest emotional need is to feel appreciated.

Author: Gary Zukav
Quote: The more aware of your intentions and your experiences you become, the more you will be able to connect the two, and the more you will be able to create the experiences of your life consciously. This is the development of mastery. It is the creation of authentic power.

Author: Sakyong Mipham
Quote: Like gravity, karma is so basic we often don't even notice it.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Although time seems to fly, it never travels faster than one day at a time. Each day is a new opportunity to live your life to the fullest. In each waking day, you will find scores of blessings and opportunities for positive change. Do not let your TODAY be stolen by the unchangeable past or the indefinite future! Today is a new day!

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Treasure isn’t always gold, silver, and gems. Sometimes it’s furry and purring. Happy Cuddle-with-your-cat Day!

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I see two women, one in a reflection in a window, and the other I see through the window, and it's like I'm looking at both my past and future at the same time.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: To know a species, look at its fears. To know yourself, look at your fears. Fear in itself is not important, but fear stands there and points you in the direction of things that are important. Don't be afraid of your fears, they're not there to scare you; they're there to let you know that something is worth it.

Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote: That I shall love always, I argue theethat love is life,and life hath immortality

Author: Toba Beta,  Betelgeuse Incident: Insiden Bait Al-Jauza
Quote: Risk means 'shit happens' or 'good luck

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If anybody is looking to rent a dancing partner for an evening, I have one left in stock. That one is me, and I am on sale ‘til Tuesday at two.

Author: Ashley Smith
Quote: Life is full of beauty. Notice it. Notice the bumble bee, the small child, and the smiling faces. Smell the rain, and feel the wind. Live your life to the fullest potential, and fight for your dreams.

Author: Tere Liye,  Rembulan Tenggelam Di Wajahmu
Quote: Hanya orang-orang dengan hati damailah yang boleh menerima kejadian buruk dengan lega.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Colorless Tsukuru Tazaki and His Years of Pilgrimage
Quote: As we go through life we gradually discover who we are, but the more we discover, the more we lose ourselves.

Author: Bob Dylan
Quote: It frightens me, the awful truth, of how sweet life can be...

Author: Kiera Cass,  The Selection
Quote: Try patting them on the back or shoulder and telling them everything is going to be fine. Lots of times when girls cry, they don't want you to fix the problem, they just want to be consoled.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Great Listener Seeks Mute Women
Quote: Everything I’ve ever done, ever thought, ever experienced, and ever felt, has led me up to this moment in my life. And after accumulating and culminating it, all I can say is, “Ahhhhh!

Author: John Grogan,  Marley and Me: Life and Love With the World's Worst Dog
Quote: Dogs are great. Bad dogs, if you can really call them that, are perhaps the greatest of them all.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I can't throw away cologne because that is Nostalgia in a Bottle, the scent of yesterday, and it reminds me of her more clearly than her picture.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I have a Rubik’s Cube for a rearview mirror, because the past is the only time puzzle I can solve. My love for her only looks clear there.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I chased the chaste, and they got scared and scurried. Then I stood still and loved where I was at, and all approached without fear of reproach.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When I go off the grid, my main source of light will be fireflies. Oh, and the glow that will come from the epic love poem I am writing for you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Every day I think today could be my last day. My only fear is dying without telling her I love her one more time. All I pray for is one more time.

Author: Amanda Mosher,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: Angels walk amongst those with broken wings. Those with broken wings only need to be given a little love before their hearts can flutter and take flight once again.-Amanda Mosher and Jarod Kintz

Author: Suzanne Collins,  Catching Fire
Quote: Isn't it strange that I know you'd risk your life to save mine, but I don't even know what your favorite color is?

Author: Aravind Adiga,  The White Tiger
Quote: See, the poor dream all their lives of getting enough to eat and looking like the rich. And what do the rich dream of?? Losing weight and looking like the poor.

Author: Tom Bodett
Quote: The difference between school and life? In school, you're taught a lesson and then given a test. In life, you're given a test that teaches you a lesson.

Author: Joyce Brothers
Quote: Being taken for granted can be a compliment. It means that you've become a comfortable, trusted element in another person's life.

Author: Carrie Ryan,  The Dead-Tossed Waves
Quote: I realize that life is risks. It’s acknowledging the past but looking forward. It’s taking a chance that we willmake mistakes but believing that we all deserve to be forgiven.

Author: William Shakespeare,  Timon of Athens
Quote: Like madness is the glory of this life.

Author: Diane Von Furstenberg
Quote: You're always with yourself, so you might as well enjoy the company.

Author: John von Neumann
Quote: If people do not believe that mathematics is simple, it is only because they do not realize how complicated life is.

Author: Terry Pratchett,  Sourcery
Quote: Perhaps it would be simpler if you just did what you're told and didn't try to understand things.

Author: Julian Gough,  Juno & Juliet
Quote: You said you didn't want to get involved with me,that one of us would get hurt and how you couldn't bear it. Well that just isn't good enough..Look what happens to people just living their lives. They get hurt, it's not fair they get hurt but they do, all the time, no matter how careful they are. Somebody can just just come along and hurt them, for no stupid reason..

Author: Masashi Kishimoto
Quote: People live their lives bound by what they accept as correct and true. That’s how they define Reality. But what does it mean to be “correct” or “true”? Merely vague concepts… Their Reality may all be a mirage. Can we consider them to simply be living in their own world, shaped by their beliefs?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A relationship is a sales process, and sometimes you must buy to sell, and when you sell it is to the benefit of both of you.

Author: John Berger
Quote: Autobiography begins with a sense of being alone. It is an orphan form.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Norwegian Wood
Quote: Life doesn't require ideals. It requires standards of action.

Author: Kurt Vonnegut,  The Sirens of Titan
Quote: The bounties of space, of infinite outwardness, were three: empty heroics, low comedy, and pointless death.

Author: Joseph Campbell,  The Power of Myth
Quote: We're so engaged in doing things to achieve purposes of outer value that we forget the inner value, the rapture that is associated with being alive, is what it is all about.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: What is the shape of love? Is it shaped like you? For me it is, but for you maybe it is shaped like me.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She’s twelve hours in the future, and exactly half a world away. No matter how hard I try, I will always be a part of her past.

Author: Peter Stone
Quote: In my many years I have come to a conclusion that one useless man is a shame, two is a law firm, and three or more is a congress.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: It's a fact that men make more money than women. That's why I became a man. Best decision of my life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A kangaroo would jump better if instead of legs, it had a trampoline under its torso. And there would be no depression, because it would bounce right back.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Hoping to win the lottery to escape your existence is like waiting on a unicorn to give you a ride out of town. If you’re interested, I’m selling saddles.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I type on my keyboard like I’m Beethoven on the piano. My words may be silent in the air, but they ring as music in my mind while I write.

Author: Martin Amis,  London Fields
Quote: And meanwhile time goes about its immemorial work of making everyone look and feel like shit.

Author: Arundhati Roy,  The God of Small Things
Quote: It is after all so easy to shatter a story. To break a chain of thought. To ruin a fragment of a dream being carried around carefully like a piece of porcelain. To let it be, to travel with it, as Velutha did, is much the harder thing to do.

Author: Seneca,  On the Shortness of Life
Quote: It is not that we have so little time but that we lose so much. ... The life we receive is not short but we make it so; we are not ill provided but use what we have wastefully.

Author: Susan Ertz
Quote: ... millions long for immortality who don't know what to do with themselves on a rainy Sunday afternoon.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: To fast track your business and become the Roger Bannister of personal branding, be a connector, accumulator, accelerator and facilitator of relationships.

Author: Jasmine Warga,  My Heart and Other Black Holes
Quote: I will be stronger than my sadness.

Author: Helen Keller,  The Open Door
Quote: Security is mostly a superstition. It does not exist in nature, nor do the children of men as a whole experience it. Avoiding danger is no safer in the long run than outright exposure. Life is either a daring adventure, or nothing.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The wealthier I get, the more money I will have to not have, because my goal in getting is giving, and nothing is better than charity.

Author: T. D. Jakes
Quote: I don't think that you can let the storms of life overwhelm you. When you do that, you are no better than the craziness that caused you to be under attack.

Author: Becca Fitzpatrick,  Silence
Quote: I loved you long before you loved me. It's the only thing I have you beat at, and I'll bring it up every chance I get.

Author: George Carlin,  Brain Droppings
Quote: Once you leave out all the bullshit they teach you in school, life gets really simple.

Author: Virginia Woolf,  To the Lighthouse
Quote: She felt... how life, from being made up of little separate incidents which one lived one by one, became curled and whole like a wave which bore one up with it and threw one down with it, there, with a dash on the beach.

Author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass
Quote: Single” is an opportunity to live life on your own terms and not apologize.

Author: Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra
Quote: Demasiada cordura puede ser la peor de las locuras, ver la vida como es y no como debería de ser.Too much sanity may be madness. And maddest of all, to see life as it is and not as it should be.

Author: Stuart Chase
Quote: For those who believe, no proof is necessary. For those who don't believe, no proof is possible.

Author: Leo Babauta
Quote: Instead of focusing on how much you can accomplish, focus on how much you can absolutely love what you’re doing.

Author: Criss Jami,  Venus in Arms
Quote: Find a purpose to serve, not a lifestyle to live.

Author: Audrey Niffenegger,  Her Fearful Symmetry
Quote: There are several ways to react to being lost. One is to panic: this was usually Valentina's first impulse. Another is to abandon yourself to lostness, to allow the fact that you've misplaced yourself to change the way you experience the world.

Author: Ken Levine
Quote: We all make choices, but in the end our choices make us.

Author: Karen Quan,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: I'll sleep forever and meet you in my dreams; it'll hurt less anyway. But the pain of losing you was worth the pleasure of having you, and I rest in bed knowing you'll know for the rest of your life what you are missing.-Karen Quan and Jarod Kintz

Author: Santosh Kalwar
Quote: No human should mislead another by promising them something they know to be untrue.

Author: Travis Barker
Quote: Thank you for life, and all the little ups and downs that make it worth living.

Author: Jean-Paul Sartre,  The Age of Reason
Quote: She smiled and said with an ecstatic air: "It shines like a little diamond","What does?""This moment. It is round, it hangs in empty space like a little diamond; I am eternal.

Author: Lin Yutang
Quote: If you can spend a perfectly useless afternoon in a perfectly useless manner, you have learned how to live

Author: Carl Sandburg
Quote: Life is like an onion; you peel it off one layer at a time, and sometimes you weep.

Author: T.D. Jakes,  Maximize the Moment: God's Action Plan For Your Life
Quote: Each day is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift to Him.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If I could convert books to wine, I’d start with The Grapes of Wrath. I’ve never read it, but maybe tonight I’ll be thirsty enough.

Author: Quentin R. Bufogle
Quote: If you're gonna burn a bridge behind you, make sure you've crossed it first.

Author: Thomas Pynchon,  Gravity's Rainbow
Quote: It's been a prevalent notion. Fallen sparks. Fragments of vessels broken at the Creation. And someday, somehow, before the end, a gathering back to home. A messenger from the Kingdom, arriving at the last moment. But I tell you there is no such message, no such home -- only the millions of last moments . . . nothing more. Our history is an aggregate of last moments.

Author: Karen Quan,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: I'll miss looking through the forest–your green and hazel eyes. I love the way they shimmered and changed shade with your mood, and how I could see the desire in your emerald gaze.-Karen Quan and Jarod Kintz

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’ve spent a lifetime learning to love—the lifetime of a chameleon. But hey, I’ve learned a lot in the last year, though you couldn’t tell because I camouflage my feelings.

Author: Chad Sugg
Quote: Enjoy your youth.You'll never be younger thanyou are at this very moment.

Author: Banana Yoshimoto,  The Lake
Quote: But I have my life, I’m living it. It’s twisted, exhausting, uncertain, and full of guilt, but nonetheless, there’s something there.

Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote: Life moves very fast. It rushes from Heaven to Hell in a matter of seconds.

Author: Chuck Palahniuk,  Choke
Quote: You had to risk your life to get love. You had to get right to the edge of death to ever be saved.

Author: Marcus Tullius Cicero
Quote: While there's life, there's hope.

Author: Gerard Way
Quote: Rock 'n' roll is not red carpets and MySpace friends, rock'n'roll is dangerous and should piss people off

Author: Hermann Hesse,  Verliebt in die verrückte Welt: Betrachtungen, Gedichte, Erzählungen, Briefe
Quote: I believe that I am not responsible for the meaningfulness or meaninglessness of life, but that I am responsible for what I do with the life I've got.

Author: Emil Cioran
Quote: The fact that life has no meaning is a reason to live --moreover, the only one.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: My past is black and my future is blank. My only canvas is the present. The best color to paint with is love.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Ashes
Quote: Hate is nothing when weighed against survival. (Valentine)

Author: Billy Joel
Quote: So I would choose to be with you,That's if the choice were mine to make,But you can make decisions too,And you can have this heart to break

Author: Sarah Dessen,  The Truth About Forever
Quote: But all I could think of was how when nothing made sense and hadn't for ages, you just have to grab onto anything you feel sure of.

Author: Beverly Sills
Quote: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you don’t try.

Author: Patrick Ness,  More Than This
Quote: Real life is only ever just real life. Messy. What it means depends on how you look at it. The only thing you’ve got to do is find a way to live there.

Author: Ester Dean
Quote: I will make up a crush, you hear me?! I will look at a guy and say, for two months at least, 'I think you're cute.' And then I can be psycho. I will go in my head and make a whole life with him, he don't even understand why I'm mad at him. I'm like... 'cause you came in late last night!' And he's like, 'I don't even know you.'

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: Whatever you believe with feeling becomes your reality.

Author: King James Gadsden
Quote: Life keeps throwing me lemons because I make the best lemonade...

Author: Matt Smith
Quote: I think, that if the world were a bit more like ComicCon, it would be a better place.

Author: Jeanette Winterson,  Lighthousekeeping
Quote: I knew it like destiny, and at the same time, I knew it as choice.

Author: Philip Pullman,  Clockwork
Quote: If you want something you can have it, but only if you want everything that goes with it, including all the hard work and the despair, and only if you're willing to risk failure.

Author: Kurt Vonnegut,  Wampeters, Foma and Granfalloons
Quote: Plato says that the unexamined life is not worth living. But what if the examined life turns out to be a clunker as well?

Author: Toba Beta,  Betelgeuse Incident: Insiden Bait Al-Jauza
Quote: Many people pray to be kept out of unexpected problems. Some people pray to be able to confront and overcome them.

Author: Holly Black,  Red Glove
Quote: I need you to be happy. I need one of us to be happy.

Author: Dean Karnazes,  Ultramarathon Man: Confessions of an All-Night Runner
Quote: Struggling and suffering are the essence of a life worth living. If you're not pushing yourself beyond the comfort zone, if you're not demanding more from yourself - expanding and learning as you go - you're choosing a numb existence. You're denying yourself an extraordinary trip.

Author: Henry James,  The Ambassadors
Quote: Live all you can: it's a mistake not to. It doesn't matter what you do in particular, so long as you have had your life. If you haven't had that, what have you had?

Author: Susanna Kearsley,  Mariana
Quote: The past can teach us, nurture us, but it cannot sustain us. The essence of life is change, and we must move ever forward or the soul will wither and die.

Author: Truman Capote
Quote: Life is a moderately good play with a badly written third act.

Author: Brian Cox
Quote: We are the cosmos made conscious and life is the means by which the universe understands itself.

Author: Isaac Marion,  Warm Bodies
Quote: There's no benchmark for how life's "supposed"to happen. There is no ideal world for you to wait around for. The world is always just what it is now, it's up to you how you respond to it.

Author: Wm. Paul Young,  The Shack
Quote: Life takes a bit of time and a lot of relationship.

Author: Peter Marshall
Quote: When we long for life without difficulties, remind us that oaks grow strong in contrary winds and diamonds are made under pressure.

Author: Joseph Heller
Quote: I want to keep my dreams, even bad ones, because without them, I might have nothing all night long.

Author: Rita Mae Brown
Quote: I finally figured out the only reason to be alive is to enjoy it.

Author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips,  Breathing Room
Quote: I finally figured out that not every crisis can be managed. As much as we want to keep ourselves safe, we can't protect ourselves from everything. If we want to embrace life, we also have to embrace chaos.

Author: Andy Rooney
Quote: It's paradoxical that the idea of living a long life appeals to everyone, but the idea of getting old doesn't appeal to anyone.

Author: Gemma Malley,  The Declaration
Quote: He said that we belonged together because he was born with a flower and I was born with a butterfly and that flowers and butterflies need each other for survival.

Author: Czesław Miłosz
Quote: LearningTo believe you are magnificent. And gradually to discover that you are not magnificent. Enough labor for one human life.

Author: Sidney Sheldon,  Bloodline
Quote: Because there was a hunger in me to see everything and do everything. I wanted to be everyone I saw. I wasn't enough for me. Can you understand that?

Author: Robert Galbraith,  The Cuckoo's Calling
Quote: How easy it was to capitalize on a person’s own bent for self-destruction; how simple to nudge them into non-being, then to stand back and shrug and agree that it had been the inevitable result of a chaotic, catastrophic life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  liQUID PROse QUOtes
Quote: When we were we, with you is the only place I wanted to be. When we were just two separate souls, I used to dream of a place where we'd come together as one.-Jarod Kintz and Karen Quan

Author: Rumi
Quote: This place is a dream. Only a sleeper considers it real. Then death comes like dawn, and you wake up laughing at what you thought was your grief.

Author: Jim Morrison,  An American Prayer
Quote: Is everybody in? Is everybody in? Is everybody in? The ceremony is about to begin. The entertainment for this evening is not new, you've seen this entertainment through and through you have seen your birth, your life, your death....you may recall all the rest. Did you have a good world when you died? -enough to base a movie on??

Author: Mary E. Pearson,  The Kiss of Deception
Quote: It can take years to mold a dream. It takes only a fraction of a second for it to be shattered.

Author: Oprah Winfrey
Quote: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the mext moment

Author: Jim Butcher,  Death Masks
Quote: It isn't good to hold on too hard to the past. You can't spend your whole life looking back. Not even when you can't see what lies ahead. All you can do is keep on keeping on, and try to believe that tomorrow will be what it should be—even if it isn't what you expected.

Author: Carrie Underwood
Quote: God put us here, on this carnival ride. We close our eyes never knowing where it'll take us next.

Author: Sylvia Plath
Quote: I have stitched life into me like a rare organ

Author: Christopher McCandless
Quote: The very basic core of a man's living spirit is his passion for adventure. The joy of life comes from our encounters with new experiences, and hence there is no greater joy than to have an endlessly changing horizon, for each day to have a new and different sun.

Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quote: I want to be thoroughly used up when I die, for the harder I work the more I live. I rejoice in life for its own sake.

Author: Gordon B. Hinckley
Quote: Through all of living have much joy and laughter, life is to be enjoyed, not just endured.

Author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón,  The Shadow of the Wind
Quote: Most of us have the good or bad fortune of seeing our lives fall apart so slowly we barely notice.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Nineteen Minutes
Quote: Do you know how there are moments when the world moves so slowly you can feel your bones shifting, your mind tumbling? When you think that no matter what happens to you for the rest of your life, you will remember every last detail of that one minute forever?

Author: John Green,  Paper Towns
Quote: I don't know how I look, but I know how I feel: Young. Goofy. Infinite.

Author: Mario Puzo
Quote: Keep your friends close but your enemies closer.

Author: Saul D. Alinsky,  Reveille for Radicals
Quote: Life is an adventure of passion, risk, danger, laughter, beauty, love; a burning curiosity to go with the action to see what it is all about, to go search for a pattern of meaning, to burn one's bridges because you're never going to go back anyway, and to live to the end.

Author: Julia Hoban,  Willow
Quote: Well, sometimes I worry that my whole life will be based about what's comfortable and easy. I'll care too much about what makes me feel good to ever really reach for anything. And then I worry that even if I do, I won't succeed.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She's beautiful, but so what? If the University of Florida taught me anything, it's that beautiful women are everywhere. The trick is to find the diamond among all the glittering cubic zirconias.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I’m more of a journalist than anyone in the mainstream media, and I write fiction. More than fiction, I write absurd nonsense surrealism, and my work has more truth.

Author: Louis C.K.,  Untitled 1
Quote: You’ll be fine. You’re 25. Feeling [unsure] and lost is part of your path. Don’t avoid it. See what those feelings are showing you and use it. take a breath. You’ll be okay. Even if you don’t feel okay all the time.

Author: Christopher Rice
Quote: Everyday is a bank account, and time is our currency. No one is rich, no one is poor, we've got 24 hours each.

Author: L.M. Montgomery
Quote: A broken heart in real life isn't half as dreadful as it is in books. It's a good deal like a bad tooth, though you won't think THAT a very romantic simile. It takes spells of aching and gives you a sleepless night now and then, but between times it lets you enjoy life and dreams and echoes and peanut candy as if there were nothing the matter with it.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Accept yourself, your strengths, your weaknesses, your truths, and know what tools you have to fulfill your purpose.

Author: Ruth Rendell,  A Judgement in Stone
Quote: Some say life is the thing, but I prefer reading.

Author: أنيس منصور
Quote: الإنسان يجب أن يدق الباب .. فسوف يجد أحداً يفتح .. عن رغبة أو رهبة أو ضيق .. ولكن لابد أن ينفتح الباب .. ومن وراءه باب ثاني وثالث

Author: C.G. Jung
Quote: How can I be substantial if I do not cast a shadow? I must have a dark side also If I am to be whole

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Your greatest self has been waiting your whole life; don't make it wait any longer.

Author: Woody Allen
Quote: You rely too much on brain. The brain is the most overrated organ.

Author: Leo Babauta
Quote: The life you have left is a gift. Cherish it. Enjoy it now, to the fullest. Do what matters, now.

Author: Ansel Adams
Quote: In wisdom gathered over time I have found that every experience is a form of exploration.

Author: J.D. Stroube,  Caged by Damnation
Quote: A complete stranger has the capacity to alter the life of another irrevocably. This domino effect has the capacity to change the course of an entire world. That is what life is; a chain reaction of individuals colliding with others and influencing their lives without realizing it. A decision that seems miniscule to you, may be monumental to the fate of the world.

Author: Nathaniel Hawthorne
Quote: Oh, for the years I have not lived, but only dreamed of living.

Author: Milan Kundera,  The Unbearable Lightness of Being
Quote: Einmal ist keinmal, says Tomas to himself. What happens but once, says the German adage, might as well not have happened at all. If we have only one life to live, we might as well not have lived at all.

Author: Aleksandar Hemon,  The Lazarus Project
Quote: Home is where somebody notices when you are no longer there.

Author: Julia Child
Quote: Life itself is the proper binge.

Author: Michael Crichton,  Congo
Quote: No one escapes from life alive.

Author: Kelly Rowland
Quote: We all have different things that we go through in our everyday life, and it's really important to know just at the end of the day, it doesn't matter what you face, you know, that you're going to win at the end of the day. You got to believe in yourself. You got to believe in God, know that He's going to get you through it.

Author: James Frey,  My Friend Leonard
Quote: Leonard asks me if there's anything I need to know before he dies, I think about it for a minute, turn to him, say what's the meaning of life, Leonard? He laughs, says that's an easy one, my son, it's whatever you want it to be.

Author: Carlos Ruiz Zafón,  The Shadow of the Wind
Quote: There are no second chances in life, except to feel remorse.

Author: Fred Rogers
Quote: The connections we make in the course of a life--maybe that's what heaven is.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I drink like a fish, and I swim in my thirst. I’m so parched for her love that I think I may drown in my desire.

Author: Hugo Claus
Quote: I am a person who is unhappy with things as they stand. We cannot accept the world as it is. Each day we should wake up foaming at the mouth because of the injustice of things.

Author: Rick Riordan,  The Blood of Olympus
Quote: No,’ Nico said. ‘Getting a second life is one thing. Making it a better life, that’s the trick.’ As soon as he said it, Nico realized he could’ve been talking about himself. He decided not to bring that up.

Author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
Quote: That is the hardest thing of all. It is much harder to judge yourself than to judge others. If you succeed in judging yourself, it's because you're truly a wise man.

Author: Morgan Matson,  Since You've Been Gone
Quote: All the stuff you can’t wait to get away from, until it’s not there anymore, and then you miss it like crazy.

Author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh
Quote: it takes as much courage to have tried and failed as it does to have tried and succeded.

Author: Mitch Albom,  Tuesdays with Morrie
Quote: Dying is only one thing to be sad over. Living unhappily is something else.

Author: Katsura Hoshino
Quote: When you lost sight of your path, listen for the destination in your heart (Allen Walker, D-gray Man)

Author: David Levithan,  How They Met, and Other Stories
Quote: Love doesn’t have to be on Valentine’s Day. It doesn’t have to be by the time you turn eighteen or thirty-three or fifty-nine. It doesn’t have to conform to whatever is usual. It doesn’t have to be kismet at once, or rhapsody by the third day.It just has to be. In time. In place. In spirt.It just has to be.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Dance Dance Dance
Quote: People die all the time. Life is a lot more fragile than we think. So you should treat others in a way that leaves no regrets. Fairly, and if possible, sincerely. It's too easy not to make the effort, then weep and wring your hands after the person dies.

Author: Frances E. Willard
Quote: The world is wide, and I will not waste my life in friction when it could be turned into momentum.

Author: J.K. Rowling,  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
Quote: Whatever happens to your body, your soul will survive, untouched...

Author: Abraham Maslow
Quote: If you plan on being anything less than you are capable of being, you will probably be unhappy all the days of your life.

Author: Deepak Chopra,  Life After Death: The Burden of Proof
Quote: What keeps life fascinating is the constant creativity of the soul.

Author: Virginia Woolf,  Moments of Being
Quote: I have a deeply hidden and inarticulate desire for something beyond the daily life.

Author: Anaïs Nin
Quote: All those who try to unveil the mysteries always have tragic lives. At the end they are always punished.

Author: Scott Westerfeld,  Peeps
Quote: It's amazing how quickly nature consumes human places after we turn our backs on them. Life is a hungry thing.

Author: Sherman Alexie,  Flight
Quote: What kind of life can you have in a house without books?

Author: Jack Kerouac,  Atop an Underwood: Early Stories and Other Writings
Quote: My eyes were glued on lifeand they were full of tears.

Author: Gautama Buddha
Quote: Those who have failed to work toward the truth have missed the purpose of living.

Author: Henri J.M. Nouwen
Quote: The spiritual life does not remove us from the world but leads us deeper into it

Author: Rachel Vincent,  Alpha
Quote: I want you. I want you so badly I can’t stand it. When you left, it felt like the world got darker. Like I couldn’t truly see anything. Couldn’t feel anything.

Author: Chad Sugg
Quote: Something amazing happens when you're in love and don't give a damn about what day it is anymore.

Author: Tess Gerritsen,  Keeping The Dead
Quote: The heart makes its choices without weighing the consequences. It doesn't look ahead to the lonely nights that follow.

Author: Lana Del Rey
Quote: I used to wonder if it was God's plan that I should be alone for so much of my life. But I found peace. I found happiness within people and the world.

Author: Ralph Marston
Quote: The direction of your focus is the direction your life will move. Let yourself move toward what is good, valuable, strong and true.

Author: David Gest
Quote: Liza, I love you more than any words can say. You have made me a complete person. You are everything to me. And I cannot think of living life without you. And I love you forever.

Author: Carrie Ryan,  The Dead-Tossed Waves
Quote: Life is life. You choose to live it or you do not.

Author: Patrick Ness,  More Than This
Quote: We have to lie to ourselves to live. Otherwise, we'd go crazy.

Author: Marcel Duchamp
Quote: All this twaddle, the existence of God, atheism, determinism, liberation, societies, death, etc., are pieces of a chess game called language, and they are amusing only if one does not preoccupy oneself with 'winning or losing this game of chess.

Author: Rachel Hawkins,  Demonglass
Quote: Mom always liked to say that we hardly ever know the decisions we make that change our lives, mostly because they are little ones. You took this bus instead of that one and ended up meeting your soul mate, that kind of thing. But there was no doubt in my mind that this was one of those life-changing moments.

Author: Emma Donoghue,  Room
Quote: Everybody's damaged by something.

Author: Vladimir Nabokov,  Mary
Quote: Nostalgia in reverse, the longing for yet another strange land, grew especially strong in spring.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: It takes guts to love with gusto. Most people love as if they wish they were invisible, and then they wonder why their affections go unnoticed.

Author: Lin Yutang,  The Importance of Living
Quote: Besides the noble art of getting things done, there is the noble art of leaving things undone. The wisdom of life consists in the elimination of non-essentials.

Author: ياسر حارب,  على لسان الطائر الأزرق
Quote: في الطريق إلى قمة الجبل نحتاج إلى صديق حتى نشاركه روعة المنظر

Author: Claudia Gray
Quote: Everyone is lonely, we have to remember that life is to be lived one day at a time. You cannot worry about the past or future. Happiness is in the now.

Author: Jonathan Larson,  Rent: The Complete Book and Lyrics of the Broadway Musical
Quote: The heart may freeze, or it can burn. The pain will ease and I can learn. There is no future, there is no past. I live this moment as, my last.

Author: Lewis Carroll
Quote: It would be so nice if something made sense for a change.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Sometimes it's the same moments that take your breath away that breathe purpose and love back into your life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Apparently I’m transparent—with my feelings, not with my body. I’m an emotional ghost, and if you can’t see my love for you it’s because it’s dead.

Author: D.H. Lawrence
Quote: It is a fine thing to establish one's own religion in one's heart, not to be dependent on tradition and second-hand ideals. Life will seem to you, later, not a lesser, but a greater thing.

Author: Stephen King,  The Drawing of the Three
Quote: What we like to think of ourselves and what we really are rarely have much in common....

Author: Jeremy Aldana
Quote: It’s not so much the journey that’s important; as is the way that we treat those we encounter and those around us, along the way

Author: Chetan Bhagat
Quote: Life is not to be taken seriously, as we are really temporary here. We are like a pre-paid card with limited validity. If we are lucky, we may last another 50 years. And 50 years is just 2,500 weekends. Do we really need to get so worked up? It’s ok, bunk a few classes, goof up a few interviews, fall in love. We are people, not programmed devices.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  Along for the Ride
Quote: Maybe the truth was, it shouldn't be so easy to be amazing. Then everything would be. It's the things you fight for and struggle with before earning that have the greatest worth. When something's difficult to come by, you'll do that much more to make sure it's even harder--if not impossible--to lose.

Author: Lana Del Rey
Quote: Find someone who has a life that you want and figure out how they got it. Read books, pick your role models wisely. Find out what they did and do it.

Author: P.L. Deshpande
Quote: आयुष्यात मला भावलेलं एक गुज सांगतो. उपजिविकेसाठीआवश्यक असणाऱ्या विषयाचं शिक्षण जरुर घ्या. पोटापाण्याचा उद्योग जिद्दीनं करा, पण एवढ्यावरच थांबू नका. साहित्य, चित्र, संगीत, नाट्य, शिल्प, खेळ ह्यांतल्या एखाद्या तरी कलेशी मैत्री जमवा. पोटापाण्याचा उद्योग तुम्हाला जगवील, पण कलेशी जमलेली मैत्री तुम्ही का जगायचं हे सांगून जाईल.- पु. ल.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Never compromise your values.

Author: Jillian Dodd,  That Boy
Quote: When I think about the kind of guy I want to marry, I think I might prefer someone who knows where they are going. I mean a prince pretty much has his whole life planned out already, doesn't he? And this is important because I have no idea where I'm going or what I want to do with my life.

Author: C.S. Lewis,  The Collected Works of C.S. Lewis
Quote: The great thing, if one can, is to stop regarding all the unpleasant things as interruptions of one's 'own,' or 'real' life. The truth is of course that what one calls the interruptions are precisely one's real life -- the life God is sending one day by day.

Author: Stephen Covey
Quote: If you want small changes in your life, work on your attitude. But if you want big and primary changes, work on your paradigm.

Author: Emily Dickinson
Quote: I argue thee that love is life. And life hath immortality.

Author: Gayle Forman,  Where She Went
Quote: Whoever said that the past isn't dead had it backward. It's the future that's already dead, already played out.

Author: Cary Grant
Quote: My formula for life is very simple: in the morning, wake up; at night, go to sleep. In between I try and occupy myself as best I can.

Author: Gena Showalter,  Oh My Goth
Quote: There are times I wish I were invisible. Which is silly, since I do everything I can to stand out.

Author: Hermann Hesse,  Peter Camenzind
Quote: I began to understand that suffering and disappointments and melancholy are there not to vex us or cheapen us or deprive us of our dignity but to mature and transfigure us.

Author: Martin Luther King Jr.,  Why We Can't Wait
Quote: Quietly endure, silently suffer and patiently wait.

Author: Jojo Moyes,  Me Before You
Quote: The thing about being catapulted into a whole new life--or at least, shoved up so hard against someone else's life that you might as well have your face pressed against their window--is that it forces you to rethink your idea of who you are. Or how you might seem to other people.

Author: Ambrose Bierce
Quote: Lottery: A tax on people who are bad at math.

Author: Goldie Hawn
Quote: Why not just live in the moment, especially if it has a good beat?

Author: Amy Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night... you were a giant slinky and I watched you fall down the stairs.

Author: P.C. Cast
Quote: Give me strength, not to be better than my enemies, but to defeat my greatest enemy, the doubts within myself. Give me strength for a straight back and clear eyes, so when life fades, as the setting sun, my spirit may come to you without shame.

Author: Mark Oliver Everett,  Things The Grandchildren Should Know
Quote: Life is so full of unpredictable beauty and strange surprises. Sometimes that beauty is too much for me to handle. Do you know that feeling? When something is just too beautiful? When someone says something or writes something or plays something that moves you to the point of tears, maybe even changes you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  I Want
Quote: I want to write a book so long that it will take the average person their whole life to read. It will be exactly the same length as the Bible.

Author: Eddie Cantor
Quote: Slow down and enjoy life. It's not only the scenery you miss by going too fast - you also miss the sense of where you are going and why.

Author: Emma Donoghue,  Room
Quote: People don't always want to be with people. It gets tiring.

Author: E. Lockhart,  We Were Liars
Quote: They know that tragedy is not glamorous. They know it doesn't play out in life as it does on a stage or between the pages of a book. It is neither a punishment meted out nor a lesson conferred. Its horrors are not attributable to one single person. Tragedy is ugly and tangled, stupid and confusing.

Author: James Patterson,  Suzanne's Diary for Nicholas
Quote: But what is life if you don't live it?

Author: Jeanette Winterson
Quote: Do you wake up as I do, having forgotten what it is that hurts or where, until you move? There is a second of consciousness that is clean again. A second that is you, without memory or experience, the animal warm and waking into a brand new world. There is the sun dissolving the dark, and light as clear as music, filling the room where you sleep and the other rooms behind your eyes.

Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote: Well, I can understand how you feel. You worked hard, studying for the spelling bee, and I suppose you feel you let everyone down, and you made a fool of yourself and everything. But did you notice something, Charlie Brown?""What's that?""The world didn't come to an end.

Author: Hayao Miyazaki
Quote: Life is a winking light in the darkness.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  Along for the Ride
Quote: It's not always easy being her daughter.' I think,' she said, 'sometimes it's hard no matter whose daughter you are.

Author: Lao Tzu
Quote: The reason why the universe is eternal is that it does not live for itself; it gives life to others as it transforms.

Author: Albert Schweitzer
Quote: In everyone's life, at some time, our inner fire goes out. It is then burst into flame by an encounter with another human being. We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.

Author: Charles Eames
Quote: The details are details. They make the product. The connections, the connections, the connections. It will in the end be these details that give the product its life.

Author: Lady Gaga
Quote: It doesn't matter who you are, or where you come from, or how much money you've got in your pocket. You have your own destiny and your own life ahead of you.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Colorless Tsukuru Tazaki and His Years of Pilgrimage
Quote: Some things in life are too complicated to explain in any language.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Sometimes letting go is simply changing the labels you place on an event. Looking at the same event with fresh eyes.

Author: Douglas Pagels
Quote: Each new day is a blank page in the diary of your life. The secret of success is in turning that diary into the best story you possibly can.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Love yourself. Forgive yourself. Be true to yourself. How you treat yourself sets the standard for how others will treat you.

Author: Chelsea Fine,  Anew
Quote: Tristan was silent for a few moments, looking at the leaves before them. "Life isn't about the past and the future. It's about today."He paused. "It's about five minutes from now and two seconds ago. It's moments, you know? Not years. Years aren't what define us.

Author: Audre Lorde
Quote: There is no thing as a single-issue struggle because we do not live single-issue lives.

Author: Morrissey
Quote: Tried living in the real world instead of a shell, but I was bored before I even began.

Author: Alan Bennett,  The Uncommon Reader
Quote: You don't put your life into your books, you find it there.

Author: Og Mandino
Quote: Count your blessings. Once you realize how valuable you are and how much you have going for you, the smiles will return, the sun will break out, the music will play, and you will finally be able to move forward the life that God intended for you with grace, strength, courage, and confidence.

Author: Anonymous,  The Message Remix
Quote: You're here to be light, bringing out the God-colors in the world.(Matthew 5:14, The Message)

Author: Julian Gough,  Juno & Juliet
Quote: Hurt is a part of life. To be honest, I think hurt is a part of happiness, that our definition of happiness has gotten very narrow lately, very nervous, a little afraid of this brawling, fabulous, unpredictable world.

Author: Bill Watterson,  It's a Magical World
Quote: In the short term, it would make me happy to go play outside. In the long term, it would make me happier to do well at school and become successful. But in the VERY long term, I know which will make better memories.

Author: John Green,  The Fault in Our Stars
Quote: I liked being a person. I wanted to keep at it.

Author: Baltasar Gracian
Quote: True friendship multiplies the good in life and divides its evils. Strive to have friends, for life without friends is like life on a desert island... to find one real friend in a lifetime is good fortune; to keep him is a blessing.

Author: Tom Hanks
Quote: I have high blood sugars, and Type 2 diabetes is not going to kill me. But I just have to eat right, and exercise, and lose weight, and watch what I eat, and I will be fine for the rest of my life.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: There are two typos of people in this world: those who can edit, and those who can't.

Author: Mhairi McFarlane,  You Had Me At Hello
Quote: Do nothing, and nothing happens. Life is about decisions. You either make them or they're made for you, but you can't avoid them.

Author: Joan Erickson
Quote: Vital lives are about action. You can't feel warmth unless you create it, can't feel delight until you play, can't know serendipity unless you risk.

Author: Mario Puzo,  The Godfather
Quote: Accidents don't happen to people who take accidents as a personal insult.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  The Truth About Forever
Quote: I didnt pay atteniton to times or distance, instead focusing on how it felt just to be in motion, knowing it wasn't about the finish line but how I got there that mattered.

Author: H. Jackson Brown Jr.,  Life's Little Instruction Book: 511 Suggestions, Observations, and Reminders on How to Live a Happy and Rewarding Life
Quote: Never give up on anybody. Miracles happen everyday.

Author: Jandy Nelson,  The Sky Is Everywhere
Quote: This is our story to tell. You’d think for all the reading I do, I would have thought about this before, but I haven’t. I’ve never once thought about the interpretative, the story telling aspect of life, of my life. I always felt like I was in a story, yes, but not like I was the author of it, or like I had any say in its telling whatsoever.

Author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett,  Neglected But Undefeated
Quote: You know my name, not my story. You've heard what I've done, but not what I've been through.

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina
Quote: There are no conditions to which a person cannot grow accustomed, especially if he sees that everyone around him lives in the same way.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I love deeply. I love long. I love wide and high. That's right, my love is interdimensional, and my vortex will heal your body and soul.

Author: Kevin Brockmeier,  The View from the Seventh Layer
Quote: Sometimes you imagine that everything could have been different for you, that if only you had gone right one day when you chose to go left, you would be living a life you could never have anticipated. But at other times you think there was no other way forward--that you were always bound to end up exactly where you have.

Author: Red Haircrow
Quote: Dance above the surface of the world. Let your thoughts lift you into creativity that is not hampered by opinion.

Author: Tupac Shakur
Quote: I don’t see myself being special; I just see myself having more responsibilities than the next man. People look to me to do things for them, to have answers.

Author: Jessica Park,  Flat-Out Love
Quote: The friends you make in college are friends you'll have for life, even if you don't talk for years at a time.

Author: Kurt Vonnegut,  Cat's Cradle
Quote: You'll forget it when you're dead, and so will I. When I'm dead, I'm going to forget everything–and I advise you to do the same.

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: Do you know what you're saying when you say, "Whatever"? It's just a code word for the f-word, followed by "you."And at your age, you never, ever. say that to anyone.' "Blaze leaned back. "So now, when someone says it to me, I just say, 'You too.' (72)

Author: Joseph Campbell
Quote: We must let go of the life we have planned, so as to accept the one that is waiting for us.

Author: Leonardo DiCaprio
Quote: My mom, Irmelin, taught me the value of life. Her own life was saved by my grandmother during World War II.

Author: Henri Nouwen
Quote: Did I offer peace today? Did I bring a smile to someone's face? Did I say words of healing? Did I let go of my anger and resentment? Did I forgive? Did I love? These are the real questions. I must trust that the little bit of love that I sow now will bear many fruits, here in this world and the life to come.

Author: John Green,  Paper Towns
Quote: What about the rest of your life?"She shrugged. "What about it?""Aren't you worried about, like, forever?""Forever is composed of nows,"she says.

Author: Amanda Hocking,  My Blood Approves
Quote: Being liked for the way you looked is worse than not being liked at all.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: When I lost her I gained the future, because she was my past, and she freed me to become who I was born to be.

Author: Annie Dillard
Quote: Spend the afternoon, you can't take it with you.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The sunset sky fades from blue to orange over Gainesville, Florida, and what I lost is less than what I gained. I gained love, I lost love, and if could do it all again, I would.

Author: Betty White,  If You Ask Me
Quote: If one has no sense of humor, one is in trouble.

Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote: People who say that yesterday was better than today are ultimately devaluing their own existence.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I believe the way to master my destiny is to serve others. If I raise up others, am I not also raised up?

Author: Natalie Babbitt,  Tuck Everlasting
Quote: dont be afraid of death, be afraid of the unlived life.

Author: Stephen Colbert
Quote: Atheism, a religion dedicated to its own sense of smug superiority.

Author: Bill Gates
Quote: Life is not fair get used to used to it

Author: James Patterson,  Sundays at Tiffany's
Quote: Just because life is hard, and always ends in a bad way, doesn't mean that all stories have to, even if that's what they tell us in school and in the New York Times Review. In fact, it's a good thing that stories are as different as we are, one from another.

Author: al-Hasan al-Basri
Quote: The world is 3 days: As for yesterday, it has vanished along with all that was in it. As for tomorrow, you may never see it. As for today, it is yours, so work on it.

Author: Helen Keller
Quote: Life is a succesion of lessons which must be lived to be understood.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  The Wind-Up Bird Chronicle
Quote: Holding this soft, small living creature in my lap this way, though, and seeing how it slept with complete trust in me, I felt a warm rush in my chest. I put my hand on the cat's chest and felt his heart beating. The pulse was faint and fast, but his heart, like mine, was ticking off the time allotted to his small body with all the restless earnestness of my own.

Author: Albert Camus
Quote: What made me run away was doubtless not so much the fear of settling down, but of settling down permanently in something ugly.

Author: Hubert Selby Jr.,  Requiem for a Dream
Quote: There's a sorrow and pain in everyone's life, but every now and then there's a ray of light that melts the loneliness in your heart and brings comfort like hot soup and a soft bed.

Author: Ann Druyan
Quote: Ten long trips around the sun since I last saw that smile, but only joy and thankfulness that on a tiny world in the vastness, for a couple of moments in the immensity of time, we were one.

Author: Rob Sheffield,  Love Is a Mix Tape
Quote: Our lives were just beginning, our favorite moment was right now, our favorite songs were unwritten.

Author: Theodore Zeldin
Quote: A dream is what makes people love life even when it is painful.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: I haven't measured it, but I'll bet cat purrs vibrate at a healing frequency. Also, a whispered I love you almost certainly resonates with heart and DNA repair.

Author: Stephenie Meyer,  Breaking Dawn
Quote: Life sucks, and then you die.Yeah, I should be so lucky.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: The ability to discipline yourself to delay gratification in the short term in order to enjoy greater rewards in the long term, is the indispensable prerequisite for success.

Author: Marcus Garvey
Quote: If you haven't confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life. With confidence, you have won even before you have started.

Author: Epictetus
Quote: Freedom is the only worthy goal in life. It is won by disregarding things that lie beyond our control.

Author: Queen Elizabeth I
Quote: The past can not be cured.

Author: C.G. Jung
Quote: Even a happy life cannot be without a measure of darkness, and the word happy would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness.

Author: Parker J. Palmer,  Let Your Life Speak: Listening for the Voice of Vocation
Quote: Before I can tell my life what I want to do with it, I must listen to my life telling me who I am.

Author: Elbert Hubbard
Quote: The best way to prepare for life is to begin to live.

Author: Alysha Speer
Quote: I choose to write because it's perfect for me. It's an escape, a place I can go to hide. It's a friend, when I feel out casted from everyone else. It's a journal, when the only story I can tell is my own. It's a book, when I need to be somewhere else. It's control, when I feel so out of control. It's healing, when everything seems pretty messed up.And it's fun, when life is just flat-out boring.

Author: Omar Khayyám,  Quatrains - Ballades
Quote: Your hand can seize today, but not tomorrow; and thoughts of your tomorrow are nothing but desire. Don’t waste this breath, if your heart isn’t crazy, since "the rest of your life"won’t last forever.

Author: Angelina Jolie
Quote: You'd think, 'What if I make a mistake today, I'll regret it'. I don’t believe in regret, I feel everything leads us to where we are and we have to just jump forward, mean well, commit and just see what happens.

Author: Langston Hughes,  Selected Poems
Quote: So since I'm still here livin',I guess I will live on.I could've died for love--But for livin' I was born.

Author: Shannon L. Alder
Quote: Love doesn't make the world go 'round; love is what makes the ride worthwhile.

Author: Virginia Woolf,  To the Lighthouse
Quote: And all the lives we ever lived and all the lives to be are full of treesand changing leaves.

Author: Raymond Carver,  Ultramarine: Poems
Quote: there isn't enough of anythingas long as we live. But at intervalsa sweetness appears and, given a chanceprevails.

Author: Carl Sandburg,  Honey and Salt
Quote: Come clean with a child heartLaugh as peaches in the summer windLet rain on a house roof be a songLet the writing on your facebe a smell of apple orchards on late June.

Author: Lana Del Rey
Quote: I once had a dreams of becoming a beautiful poet, but upon an unfortunate series of events some of those dreams dashed and divided like a million stars in the night sky that I wished on over and over again, sparkling and broken.But I didn't really mind, because I knew that it takes getting everything you ever wanted, and then losing it to know what true freedom is.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: She said she loved me, and I believed her, because she was looking directly at another man when she said it.

Author: Scott Adams
Quote: Life is half delicious yogurt, half crap, and your job is to keep the plastic spoon in the yogurt.

Author: Patricia Briggs,  When Demons Walk
Quote: When life doesn't meet your expectations, it was important to take it with grace.

Author: Kirstie Alley
Quote: It's funny. No matter how hard you try, you can't close your heart forever. And the minute you open it up, you never know what's going to come in. But when it does, you just have to go for it! Because if you don't, there's not point in being here.

Author: Robin S. Sharma
Quote: Dreamers are mocked as impractical. The truth is they are the most practical, as their innovations lead to progress and a better way of life for all of us.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quote: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work. And the only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it.

Author: Joyce Meyer
Quote: No matter what has happened to you in the past or what is going on in your life right now, it has no power to keep you from having an amazingly good future if you will walk by faith in God. God loves you! He wants you to live with victory over sin so you can possess His promises for your life today!

Author: Martin Luther King Jr.
Quote: It may be true that the law cannot make a man love me, but it can stop him from lynching me, and I think that's pretty important.

Author: Eric Wright
Quote: But instead of spending our lives running towards our dreams, we are often running away from a fear of failure or a fear of criticism.

Author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina
Quote: And you know, there's less charm in life when you think about death--but it's more peaceful.

Author: Ed Sheeran
Quote: Be a true Heart, not a follower.

Author: Vera Nazarian,  The Perpetual Calendar of Inspiration
Quote: Would you like to know your future?If your answer is yes, think again. Not knowing is the greatest life motivator.So enjoy, endure, survive each moment as it comes to you in its proper sequence -- a surprise.

Author: Nick Hornby,  About a Boy
Quote: There had been times when he knew, somewhere in him, that he would get used to it, whatever it was, because he had learnt that some hard things became softer after a very little while.

Author: Jim Rohn
Quote: Don't wish it was easier wish you were better. Don't wish for less problems wish for more skills. Don't wish for less challenge wish for more wisdom

Author: Augustine of Hippo,  Homilies on the First Epistle of John
Quote: Once for all, then, a short precept is given thee: Love, and do what thou wilt: whether thou hold thy peace, through love hold thy peace; whether thou cry out, through love cry out; whether thou correct, through love correct; whether thou spare, through love do thou spare: let the root of love be within, of this root can nothing spring but what is good.

Author: Karl Lagerfeld
Quote: I love classic beauty. It’s an idea of beauty with no standard.

Author: Bob Ong,  ABNKKBSNPLAKo?!
Quote: Obligasyon kong maglayag, karapatan kong pumunta sa kung saan ko gusto, responsibilidad ko ang buhay ko.

Author: Kazuo Ishiguro,  Never Let Me Go
Quote: Poor creatures. What did we do to you? With all our schemes and plans?

Author: Corey Taylor,  Seven Deadly Sins: Settling the Argument Between Born Bad and Damaged Good
Quote: The future is meant for those who are willing to let go of the worst parts of the past. When you cannot take two steps without turning around to inspect your footsteps, you are getting nowhere fast.

Author: Kathryn Stockett,  The Help
Quote: it always sound scarier when a hollerer talk soft.

Author: Frank Herbert
Quote: The people I distrust most are those who want to improve our lives but have only one course of action.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: No matter what your history has been, your destiny is what you create today. What are you going to create?

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: How would your life be different if…You stopped validating your victim mentality? Let today be the day…You shake off your self-defeating drama and embrace your innate ability to recover and achieve.

Author: Maya Angelou
Quote: There is a very fine line between loving life and being greedy for it.

Author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower
Quote: It's much easier to not know things sometimes. Things change and friends leave. And life doesn't stop for anybody.

Author: Thisuri Wanniarachchi
Quote: Life is at its best when everything has fallen out of place, and you decide that you're going to fight to get them right, not when everything is going your way and everyone is praising you.

Author: Elbert Hubbard
Quote: The world is moving so fast these days that the man who says it can't be done is generally interrupted by someone doing it.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: A lot of the conflict you have in your life exists simply because you're not living in alignment; you're not be being true to yourself.

Author: Morrissey
Quote: Don't leave it all unsaid,somewhere in the wasteland of your head.

Author: Cassandra Clare,  City of Glass
Quote: You couldnt erase everything that caused you pain with recollection.Every memory was valuable; even the bad ones

Author: J.M. Barrie,  The Little Minister
Quote: The life of every man is a diary in which he means to write one story, and writes another; and his humblest hour is when he compares the volume as it is with what he vowed to make it.

Author: Pierre de Coubertin
Quote: The most important thing in the Olympic Games is not winning but taking part; the essential thing in life is not conquering but fighting well.

Author: Nisargadatta Maharaj
Quote: You will receive everything you need when you stop asking for what you do not need

Author: Gary Paulsen
Quote: I tried to contain myself... but I escaped!

Author: Jeffrey McDaniel
Quote: There's two kinds of women--those you write poems about and those you don't.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: You have the ability to choose your reactions.

Author: Alan Moore,  Watchmen
Quote: Real life is messy, inconsistent, and it's seldom when anything ever really gets resolved. It's taken me a long time to realize that.

Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quote: In heaven an angel is no one in particular.

Author: Omar Khayyám,  Rubaiyat of Omar Khayyam
Quote: Oh threats of Hell and Hopes of Paradise!One thing at least is certain - This Life flies;One thing is certain and the rest is Lies -The Flower that once has blown forever dies.

Author: Ray Bradbury,  Something Wicked This Way Comes
Quote: Too late, I found you can't wait to become perfect, you got to go out and fall down and get up with everybody else.

Author: Deepak Chopra,  The Third Jesus: The Christ We Cannot Ignore
Quote: The ego relies on the familiar. It is reluctant to experience the unknown, which is they very essence of life.

Author: Lisa Kleypas,  Sugar Daddy
Quote: Shock is a merciful condition. It allows you to get through disaster with a necessary distance between you and your feelings.

Author: Nicholas Sparks,  The Last Song
Quote: Strange, what being forced to slow down could do to a person.

Author: Princess Diana
Quote: Life is just a journey.

Author: Kurt Vonnegut
Quote: Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it."(George Santayana)I've got news for Mr. Santayana: we're doomed to repeat the past no matter what. That's what it is to be alive.

Author: Catherynne M. Valente,  Deathless
Quote: War is not for winning, Masha,"sighed Koschei, reading the tracks of supply lines, of pincer strategies, over her shoulder. "It is for surviving.

Author: Gabrielle Zevin,  Elsewhere
Quote: A life isn't measured in hours and minutes. It's the quality, not the length.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: We can't undo a single thing we have ever done, but we can make decisions today that propel us to the life we want and towards the healing we need.

Author: Amit Ray,  Meditation: Insights and Inspirations
Quote: You are never alone. You are eternally connected with everyone.

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: People will always have opinions about your decision because they're not courageous enough to take action on their opinion.

Author: Mia Hamm
Quote: Many people say I'm the best women's soccer player in the world. I don't think so. And because of that, someday I just might be.

Author: George Bernard Shaw
Quote: Life is no brief candle to me. It is a sort of splendid torch which I have got a hold of for the moment, and I want to make it burn as brightly as possible before handing it on to future generations.

Author: Laurie Halse Anderson,  Wintergirls
Quote: Why are you being so mean?""Friends tell friends the truth.""yeah, but not to hurt, to help.

Author: Stephen King
Quote: I wouldn't have missed a single minute of it, Not for the whole world.

Author: Taylor Swift,  Taylor Swift: Speak Now
Quote: It's alright, just wait and see, your string of lights is still bright to me. Who you are is not where you've been. You're still an innocent. It's okay life is a tough crowd, 32 is still growing up now.

Author: Alex Gaskarth
Quote: I’ll never second guess the things that I have done. I’ve got too much left to say and too much to become.

Author: Eleanor Brown,  The Weird Sisters
Quote: There are times in our lives when we have to realize our past is precisely what it is, and we cannot change it. But we can change the story we tell ourselves about it, and by doing that, we can change the future.

Author: Chuck Palahniuk
Quote: We just had a near-life experience!

Author: Laurell K. Hamilton,  Bullet
Quote: Regrets are about decisions that you know you should have done different.

Author: Aleksandar Hemon,  The Lazarus Project
Quote: When I look at my old pictures, all I can see is what I used to be but am no longer. I think: What I can see is what I am not.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  So many chairs, and no time to sit
Quote: For your birthday I got you some batteries. They’re dead, just like you’ll soon be.

Author: L.J. Smith,  The Forbidden Game
Quote: I'm as cruel as life. As cruel as love.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Live authentically. Why would you continue to compromise something that's beautiful to create something that is fake?

Author: Carroll Bryant
Quote: Know who you are, and be it. Know what you want, and go out and get it!

Author: Amelia Earhart
Quote: Courage is the price that life exacts for granting peace.

Author: Patrick Ness,  More Than This
Quote: You said we all want there to be more than this! Well, there's always more than this. There's always something you don't know.

Author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow,  Voices of the Night
Quote: Tell me not in mournful numbers,Life is but an empty dream!For the soul is dead that slumbers,And things are not what they seem.Life is real! Life is earnest!And the grave is not its goal;Dust thou are, to dust thou returnest,Was not spoken of the soul.

Author: Wendy Wasserstein
Quote: The trick. . .is to find the balance between the bright colors of humor and the serious issues of identity, self-loathing, and the possibility for intimacy and love when it seems no longer possible or, sadder yet, no longer necessary.

Author: Douglas Coupland
Quote: Life is boring. People are vengeful. Good things always end. We do so many things and we don’t know why, and if we do find out why, it’s decades later and knowing why doesn’t matter any more.

Author: Alysha Speer
Quote: You never really know what's coming. A small wave, or maybe a big one. All you can really do is hope that when it comes, you can surf over it, instead of drown in its monstrosity.

Author: Maya Angelou
Quote: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: He who is not everyday conquering some fear has not learned the secret of life.

Author: Natalie Babbitt,  Tuck Everlasting
Quote: You can't have living without dying. So you can't call it living, what we got. We just are, we just be, like rocks beside the road.

Author: Marie Lu,  Champion
Quote: I always knew, on some level, that I wouldn't live long. It's simply not written in my stars.

Author: Dylan Moran
Quote: People will kill you. Over time. They will shave out every last morsel of fun in you with little, harmless sounding phrases that people uses every day, like: 'Be realistic!'"[What It Is (2009)]

Author: مصطفى محمود,  الأحلام
Quote: الفرح الوحشي والمرح العنيف والضحك المجلجل حالات لا تدل على السعادة ، إنها تشنجات البؤساء الذين يريدون أن يأكدوا لأنفسهم وللناس أنهم يفرحون، يفرحون بشدة.

Author: Nicole Richie
Quote: You just have to go after what you want and if it doesn't want you back then so be it; it doesn't deserve you anyways.

Author: Sandy Brewer,  Pursuit of Light: An Extraordinary Journey
Quote: No matter what happened yesterday it is insignificant when compared to what lies within the core of your being today.

Author: Jim Butcher,  White Night
Quote: Many things are not as they seem: The worst things in life never are.

Author: Jonathan Safran Foer
Quote: I want an infinitely blank book and the rest of time......why didn't I learn to treat everything like it was the last time, my greatest regret is how much I believed in the future.

Author: Rascal Flatts
Quote: I wake up and tear drops, they fall down like rain. I put on that old song we danced to and then, I head off to my job cause not much has changed. Punch the clock, head for home, check the phone. Just in case. Go to bed, dream of you. That's what I am doing these days.

Author: Denis Waitley
Quote: There are two primary choices in life: to accept conditions as they exist, or accept the responsibility for changing them

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Salem Falls
Quote: A very wise man once told me that you can't look back-you just have to put the past behind you, and find something better in your future.

Author: Max Lucado
Quote: Sometimes God allows what he hates to accomplish what he loves.

Author: Morrissey
Quote: I was wasting my time, praying for love.For a love that never comes, from someone who does not exist.

Author: Irvin D. Yalom,  When Nietzsche Wept
Quote: Life is a spark between two identical voids, the darkness before birth and the one after death.

Author: Leonardo da Vinci
Quote: All our knowledge has its origin in our perceptions

Author: Sylvia Plath,  The Unabridged Journals of Sylvia Plath
Quote: Oh, something is there, waiting for me. Perhaps someday the revelation will burst in upon me and I will see the other side of this monumental grotesque joke. And then I'll laugh. And then I'll know what life is.

Author: Alan Bennett,  Getting On
Quote: We started off trying to set up a small anarchist community, but people wouldn't obey the rules.

Author: Tara Kelly,  Harmonic Feedback
Quote: All I know is I make sense to me- it's other people who seem complicated.

Author: Tennessee Williams
Quote: Life is all memory, except for the one present moment that goes by you so quickly you hardly catch it going.

Author: Quentin Crisp
Quote: The young always have the same problem - how to rebel and conform at the same time. They have now solved this by defying their parents and copying one another.

Author: Vic Johnson,  Day by Day with James Allen
Quote: In life, there are no mistakes, only lessons.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: You can't just wish change; you have to live the change in order for it to become a reality.

Author: Criss Jami,  Venus in Arms
Quote: To be heroic is to be courageous enough to die for something; to be inspirational is to be crazy enough to live a little.

Author: Sara Gruen,  Water for Elephants
Quote: Even as your body betrays you, your mind denies it.

Author: Charlotte Brontë,  Villette
Quote: Life is so constructed that an event does not, cannot, will not, match the expectation.

Author: Henry David Thoreau,  Walden
Quote: A written word is the choicest of relics. It is something at once more intimate with us and more universal than any other work of art. It is the work of art nearest to life itself. It may be translated into every language, and not only be read but actually breathed from all human lips; -- not be represented on canvas or in marble only, but be carved out of the breath of life itself.

Author: Thomas S. Monson,  Pathways To Perfection: Discourses Of Thomas S. Monson
Quote: To live greatly, we must develop the capacity to face trouble with courage, disappointment with cheerfulness, and triumph with humility.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Keeping Faith
Quote: This is love, I think. A place where people who have been alone may lock together like hawks and spin in the air, dizzy with surprise at the connection. A place you go willingly, and with wonder

Author: John Andreas Widtsoe,  In a Sunlit Land
Quote: Decide what you want to be....Pay the Price ...And be what you want to be.

Author: Marian Keyes,  Lucy Sullivan Is Getting Married
Quote: I had spent my whole life feeling homesick. The only difference between the two of us was that I didn't know what or where home was.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Stop giving your life away to other people.

Author: Harold S. Kushner
Quote: I think of life as a good book. The further you get into it, the more it begins to make sense.

Author: Santosh Kalwar
Quote: Her happiness floated like waves of ocean along the coast of her life. She found lyrics of her life in his arms but she never sung her song.

Author: Jennifer Elisabeth,  Born Ready: Unleash Your Inner Dream Girl
Quote: Don’t worry if people think you’re crazy. You are crazy. You have that kind of intoxicating insanity that lets other people dream outside of the lines and become who they’re destined to be.

Author: Rainer Maria Rilke
Quote: There are no classes in life for beginners: right away you are always asked to deal with what is most difficult.

Author: Jim Morrison
Quote: This is the strangest life I have ever known.

Author: Nicholas Sparks
Quote: You should read something else."Why would he have done that to him?"I don't know,"she said.Do you ever feel like Job?"She smiled, a little twinkle in her eyes.Sometimes."But you haven't lost your faith?"No,"I knew she hadn't, but I think I was losing mine.Is it because you think you might get better?"No,"she said,"its because its the only thing I have left.

Author: Brené Brown,  The Gifts of Imperfection: Let Go of Who You Think You're Supposed to Be and Embrace Who You Are
Quote: When we fail to set boundaries and hold people accountable, we feel used and mistreated. This is why we sometimes attack who they are, which is far more hurtful than addressing a behavior or a choice.

Author: Tecumseh
Quote: When you rise in the morning, give thanks for the light, for your life, for your strength. Give thanks for your food and for the joy of living. If you see no reason to give thanks, the fault lies in yourself.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Don't give up! It's not over. The universe is balanced. Every set-back bears with it the seeds of a come-back.

Author: Bill Hicks
Quote: Oh sorry, I was taking life seriously.

Author: Margaret Drabble
Quote: When nothing is sure, everything is possible.

Author: Miranda July,  No One Belongs Here More Than You
Quote: I walked down the hall and saw that [she] was sitting on the floor next to a chair. This is always a bad sign. It's a slippery slope, and it's best just to sit in chairs, to eat when hungry, to sleep and rise and work. But we have all been there. Chairs are for people, and you're not sure if you are one.
