Quote: at your weakest, you end up showing more strength; at your lowest, you are suddenly lifted higher than you’ve ever been. They all border one another, these opposites and show how quickly we can be altered.

Author: Noah Levine
Quote: Waking up is not a selfish pursuit of happiness, it is a revolutionary stance, from the inside out, for the benefit of all beings in existence.

Author: Sonia Sotomayor
Quote: I want to state upfront, unequivocally and without doubt: I do not believe that any racial, ethnic or gender group has an advantage in sound judging. I do believe that every person has an equal opportunity to be a good and wise judge, regardless of their background or life experiences.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Yellow flowers are like physical manifestations of sunlight. I’m growing a garden of sunglasses just to help save eyesight and make the world a little bit cooler.

Author: Jim Butcher,  Changes
Quote: There're things we keep hidden from one another. Things we hide from ourselves. Things that are kept hidden from us. And things no one knows. You always learn the damnedest things at the worst possible times.

Author: Thomas Jefferson
Quote: Timid men prefer the calm of despotism to the tempestuous sea of Liberty.

Author: Alexander McCall Smith,  The No. 1 Ladies' Detective Agency
Quote: It was time to take the pumpkin out of the pot and eat it. In the final analysis, that was what solved these big problems of life. You could think and think and get nowhere, but you still had to eat your pumpkin. That brought you down to earth. That gave you a reason for going on. Pumpkin.

Author: Suzanne Selfors,  Coffeehouse Angel
Quote: Live. How many of us need to be reminded that living has nothing to do with trying to be as good as someone else, or trying to fit into some category, or filling in the blanks on some stupid checklist. That it has nothing to do with punishing yourself for past mistakes.

Author: Meg Rosoff,  How I Live Now
Quote: Things Happen and once they start happening you pretty much just to hold on for dear life and see where they drop you when they stop.

Author: Radiohead
Quote: Most people gaze neither into the past nor the future; they explore neither truth nor lies. They gaze at the television.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: If you envy successful people, you create a negative force field of attraction that repels you from ever doing the things that you need to do to be successful. If you admire successful people, you create a positive force field of attraction that draws you toward becoming more and more like the kinds of people that you want to be like.

Author: Mac Miller
Quote: No matter where life takes me, you'll find me with a smile. Presumed to be happy, always laughing like a child. I never thought life could be this sweet! It's got me cheesing from cheek to cheek!

Author: Terry Lander,  Life Through the Eyes of an Insider: 101 Poems to Help You Understand Life Better
Quote: I’m not aspiring to be someone else – If I’m me for the rest of my life then so be it

Author: C.S. Lewis
Quote: The rule of the universe is that others can do for us what we cannot do for ourselves, and one can paddle every canoe except one's own.

Author: Amy Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night.. You were balancing ten tiny footballs on your nose while dancing with a turquoise unicorn.

Author: Philippa Gregory
Quote: I have given my word that only death will take me from you.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Imagination is a quality that was given to man compensate him from whats not. The sense of humor was given to console him from what is.

Author: Cecelia Ahern,  The Book of Tomorrow
Quote: Hope like that, as I thought before, doesn’t make you a weak person. It’s hopelessness that makes you weak. Hope makes you stronger, because it brings with it a sense of reason. Not a reason for how or why they were taken from you, but a reason for you to live. Because it’s a maybe. A ‘maybe someday things won’t always be this shit.’ And that ‘maybe’ immediately makes the shittiness better.

Author: Jim Beaver,  Life's That Way: A Memoir
Quote: Forgiveness is not something you do for someone else; it's something you do for yourself. To forgive is not to condone, it is to refuse to continue feeling bad about an injury.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: The more credit you give away, the more will come back to you. The more you help others, the more they will want to help you.

Author: Jean M. Auel
Quote: Life is neither static nor unchanging. With no individuality, there can be no change, no adaptation and, in an inherently changing world, any species unable to adapt is also doomed.

Author: Frank Lloyd Wright,  The Natural House
Quote: As we live and as we are, Simplicity - with a capital "S"- is difficult to comprehend nowadays. We are no longer truly simple. We no longer live in simple terms or places. Life is a more complex struggle now. It is now valiant to be simple: a courageous thing to even want to be simple. It is a spiritual thing to comprehend what simplicity means.

Author: Derek Landy,  Death Bringer
Quote: Still, he figured, sometimes you've got to do what you've got to do, and then sometimes you've just got to run like hell after it's done.

Author: Rai Aren,  Secret of the Sands
Quote: Know that the same spark of life that is within you, is within all of our animal friends, the desire to live is the same within all of us...

Author: Michelle Kwan
Quote: If you have nothing in life but a good friend, you're rich.

Author: Ming-Dao Deng
Quote: All teachings are mere references. The true experience is living your own life. Then, even the holiest of words are only words.

Author: Patrick Ness,  More Than This
Quote: People see stories everywhere...We take random events and we put them together in a pattern so we can comfort ourselves with a story, no matter how much it obviously isn't true...We have to lie to ourselves to live. Otherwise, we'd go crazy.

Author: Gustave Flaubert,  Madame Bovary
Quote: But, in her life, nothing was going to happen. Such was the will of God! The future was a dark corridor, and at the far end the door was bolted.

Author: Pitbull
Quote: I'm taking all the negatives in my life, and turning them into a positive.

Author: Greta Garbo
Quote: I'm a completely worthless woman and no man should risk his life for me.

Author: Colleen Hoover,  Slammed
Quote: Regret is counterproductive. It's looking back on a past that you can't change. Questioning things as they occur can prevent regret in the future.

Author: Simone Weil,  Gravity and Grace
Quote: All the natural movements of the soul are controlled by laws analogous to those of physical gravity. Grace is the only exception. Grace fills empty spaces, but it can only enter where there is a void to receive it, and it is grace itself which makes this void. The imagination is continually at work filling up all the fissures through which grace might pass.

Author: Daniel C. Tomas
Quote: Life's just a bunch of accidents, connected by one perfect end.

Author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin
Quote: Do not forget that the value and interest of life is not so much to do conspicuous things...as to do ordinary things with the perception of their enormous value.

Author: Alexandre Dumas,  The Three Musketeers
Quote: I do not cling to life sufficiently to fear death.

Author: John Grogan,  Marley and Me: Life and Love With the World's Worst Dog
Quote: In a dog's life, some plaster would fall, some cushions would open, some rugs would shred. Like any relationship, this one had its costs. They were costs we came to accept and balance against the joy and amusement and protection and companionship he gave us.

Author: Joseph Campbell,  The Power of Myth
Quote: The demon that you can swallow gives you its power, and the greater life’s pain, the greater life’s reply.

Author: Emily Maguire,  Taming the Beast
Quote: But then, life is a constant withering of possibilities. Some are stolen with the lives of people you love. Others are let go, with regret and reluctance and deep, deep sorrow. But there is compensation for lives unlived in the intoxicating joy of knowing that the life you have - right here, right now - if the one you have chosen. There is power in that, and hope.

Author: Natsuki Takaya
Quote: ...you must always be yourself, and do things at your own pace. Someday, you'll catch up.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: Cake is happiness! If you know the way of the cake, you know the way of happiness! If you have a cake in front of you, you should not look any further for joy!

Author: Vernon Howard
Quote: You have succeeded in life when all you really WANT is only what you really NEED.

Author: Santosh Kalwar
Quote: Life is an experiment in which you may fail or succeed. Explore more, expect least.

Author: Nick Drake
Quote: Life is but a memory Happened long ago. Theatre full of sadness For a long forgotten show.

Author: Stephen King,  The Long Walk
Quote: They're animals, all right. But why are you so goddam sure that makes us human beings?

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: The sky itches and that’s why I tickled it with the feather of a bird. Do you realize it’s been 14 days since two weeks ago? Boy, time flies.

Author: C. JoyBell C.
Quote: The difference between me and other people is that they all walk around with onion skins wrapped around them. Pre-meditations, pretentions, the faces that they present to the world, the faces that they present to themselves.. onion skins that come in layer after layer. They're on the inside of all that. And I... I am the inside of the onion skin walking around. I am only me.

Author: Charles Bukowski,  You Get So Alone at Times That it Just Makes Sense
Quote: having nothing to struggleagainstthey have nothing to strugglefor.

Author: Lauren Kate
Quote: In this lifetime you're nothing more than you appear to be: a stupid, selfish, ignorant, spoiled little girl who thinks the world lives or dies on whether she gets to go out with some good-looking boy at school...I'd still relish this moment...killing you.

Author: Buzz Aldrin
Quote: Timing has always been a key element in my life. I have been blessed to have been in the right place at the right time.

Author: Santosh Kalwar,  Quote Me Everyday
Quote: Every single desire can lead to dream and every single dream has possibility to become reality.

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: Allow yourself to enjoy each happy moment in your life.

Author: Kevin Smith
Quote: BRODIE:Hell hath no fury like a woman scorned for SEGA.

Author: Sylvia Plath
Quote: Life was not to be sitting in hot amorphic leisure in my backyard idly writing or not writing, as the spirit moved me. It was, instead, running madly, in a crowded schedule, in a squirrel cage of busy people. Working, living, dancing, dreaming, talking, kissing- singing, laughing, learning.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Colorless Tsukuru Tazaki and His Years of Pilgrimage
Quote: Everything has boundaries. The same holds true with thought. You shouldn't fear boundaries, but you should not be afraid of destroying them. That's what is most important if you want to be free: respect for and exasperation with boundaries.

Author: Gustave Flaubert
Quote: We must laugh and cry, enjoy and suffer, in a word, vibrate to our full capacity … I think that’s what being really human means.

Author: Colleen Hoover,  Hopeless
Quote: I wanted to cry because I needed you there with me so bad. I knew in that moment that I was in love with you. I was in love with the way you loved me. When you wrapped your arms around me and held me, I knew that no matter what happened with my life, you were my home. You stole the biggest piece of my heart that night.

Author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
Quote: What can we see, read, acquire, but ourselves. Take the book, my friend, and read your eyes out, you will never find there what I find.

Author: Terence McKenna
Quote: Life lived in the absence of the psychedelic experience that primordial shamanism is based on is life trivialized, life denied, life enslaved to the ego.

Author: George Burns
Quote: Don't stay in bed, unless you can make money in bed.

Author: Jodi Picoult
Quote: The truth was, history repeated itself on a daily basis; mistakes were made over and over. People were haunted by what they had done, and by what they hadn't had time to do.

Author: Nicole McKay,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night... you kept meowing at people and licking yourself it was not unlike you normally.

Author: James Patterson
Quote: Life is hard, and a lot of people come home tired from work. If they're gonna spend half an hour reading, they want some entertainment and a sense of achievement. So that's what I give them. That's all I'm trying to do. Is that really so wrong?

Author: Arthur Miller
Quote: Maybe all one can do is hope to end up with the right regrets.

Author: Jayleigh Cape
Quote: Life keeps throwing me curve balls and I don't even own a bat. At least my dodging skills are improving.

Author: Ta-Nehisi Coates,  Between the World and Me
Quote: I would not have you descend into your own dream. I would have you be a conscious citizen of this terrible and beautiful world.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Happiness has to do with your mindset, not with outside circumstance.

Author: Tom Robbins
Quote: In the end, perhaps we should simply imagine a joke; a long joke that's continually retold in an accent too thick and strange to ever be completely understood. Life is that joke my friends. The soul is the punch line.

Author: Yasmina Khadra,  Ce que le jour doit à la nuit
Quote: Life is a train that stops at no stations; you either jump abroad or stand on the platform and watch as it passes.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  At even one penny, this book would be overpriced. In fact, free is too expensive, because you'd still waste time by reading it.
Quote: Only the living can read. This means that when I write, my target market is people of the future. Greetings, people of the moon!

Author: Tom Stoppard,  Rosencrantz and Guildenstern Are Dead
Quote: Be happy -- if you're not even happy, what's so good about surviving?

Author: Jordan Belfort
Quote: When you live your life by poor standards, you inflict damage on everyone who crosses your path, especially those you love.

Author: Joseph Conrad,  Heart of Darkness
Quote: Like a running blaze on a plain, like a flash of lightning in the clouds. We live in the flicker.

Author: Voltaire
Quote: Each player must accept the cards life deals him or her; but once they are in hand, he or she alone must decide how to play the cars in order to win the game.

Author: Isaac Asimov
Quote: The first step in making rabbit stew is catching the rabbit.

Author: L.J. Smith,  The Forbidden Game
Quote: The image isn't reality. Even though we're used to thinking that way alot of the time. We show a kid a picture of a dog and say 'This is a doggie' - but it's not. It's just an image.

Author: Woody Allen
Quote: Honey! Bring down a copy of my will - and an eraser!

Author: John Gray,  Men Are from Mars, Women Are from Venus
Quote: If we are to feel the positive feelings of love, happiness, trust, and gratitude, we periodically also have to feel anger, sadness, fear, and sorrow.

Author: Bill Shankly
Quote: Some people think football [soccer] is a matter of life and death. I don't like that attitude. I can assure them it is much more serious than that.

Author: Gretchen McNeil,  Possess
Quote: Everybody was sorry. Sorry was easy. Sorry was for suckers.

Author: أروى خميّس,  على الأرجوحة..تتناثر الأسرار
Quote: الصداقة باختصار هي إحدى إنجازاتنا الشخصية في هذه الحياة ..

Author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky,  The Brothers Karamazov
Quote: But I always liked side-paths, little dark back-alleys behind the main road- there one finds adventures and surprises, and precious metal in the dirt.

Author: Heather Vogel Frederick,  Pies & Prejudice
Quote: Never say 'I can't.' 'I can't' is a limit, and life is about breaking through limits. Say 'I will' instead.

Author: Ginnetta Correli
Quote: Children and dogs are the messengers of God some of us do not deserve them

Author: Stephen King,  Wolves of the Calla
Quote: I wanted to say goodbye to someone, and have someone say goodbye to me. The goodbyes we speak and the goodbyes we hear are the goodbyes that tell us we´re still alive.

Author: Charlie Kaufman
Quote: There really is only one ending to any story. Human life ends in death. Until then, it keeps going and gets complicated and there's loss. Everything involves loss; every relationship ends in one way or another.

Author: A.J. Cronin
Quote: That is life... to begin again when everything is lost!

Author: حنان اللحام,  هدي السيرة النبوية في التغيير الاجتماعي
Quote: اصحاب العقول الواقفة عند حرفية النص-قرانا وسنة- كثيرا ما تفلت منهم المقاصد والمنافع فيمشون على وجوههم

Author: Helen Macdonald,  H is for Hawk
Quote: There is a time in life when you expect the world to be always full of new things. And then comes a day when you realise that is not how it will be at all. You see that life will become a thing made of holes. Absences. Losses. Things that were there and are no longer. And you realise, too, that you have to grow around and between the gaps, [...]

Author: Jim Rohn
Quote: We must all suffer from one of two pains: the pain of discipline or the pain of regret. The difference is discipline weighs ounces while regret weighs tons.

Author: Rick Rubin
Quote: It's a big theme in my life, learning about myself and being a better person. I'm a work in progress; I have revelations every day.

Author: Henry Van Dyke
Quote: Be glad of life because it gives you the chance to love and to work and to play and to look up at the stars.

Author: Lorrie Moore,  Anagrams
Quote: They had, finally, the only thing anyone really wants in life: someone to hold your hand when you die.

Author: Greta Garbo
Quote: How can one change one's entire life and build a new one on one moment of love? And yet, that's what you make me want to close my eyes and do.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: Disciplining yourself to do what you know is right and importance, although difficult, is the highroad to pride, self-esteem, and personal satisfaction.

Author: Jonathan Anthony Burkett,  Friends 2 Lovers: The Unthinkable
Quote: After listening and getting to know more about you. Also, feeling a deep connection between us that goes beyond physical attraction. I'm beginning to feel for, so much more than the friendship that I waited to grow with you. I'm not going to try and rush things. However, I don't want to wait until it's to late.

Author: Dan Millman,  Way of the Peaceful Warrior: A Book That Changes Lives
Quote: The world's a puzzle; no need to make sense out of it."- Socrates

Author: Jonathan Safran Foer,  Extremely Loud and Incredibly Close
Quote: ...people with nothing to declare carry the most.

Author: Frank Warren
Quote: There are two kinds of secrets. The ones we keep from others and the ones we keep from ourselves.

Author: William Faulkner,  As I Lay Dying
Quote: I could just remember how my father used to say that the reason for living was to get ready to stay dead a long time.

Author: Don DeLillo
Quote: What we are reluctant to touch often seems the very fabric of our salvation.

Author: Björk
Quote: I'm a fountain of blood. In the shape of a girl.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free
Quote: Simplify your life. You don't grow spiritual, you shrink spiritual.

Author: Martin Luther King Jr.,  Why We Can't Wait
Quote: Find a voice in a whisper.

Author: Julia Sorel
Quote: if youre never scared, or embarased, or hurt, it means you never take any chances.

Author: Robert Burns,  Collected Poems of Robert Burns
Quote: The best laid schemes o' mice an' men gang aft agley.

Author: Wallace Stegner,  All the Little Live Things
Quote: It is the beginning of wisdom when you recognize that the best you can do is choose which rules you want to live by, and it's persistent and aggravated imbecility to pretend you can live without any.

Author: A.C. Grayling,  The Heart of Things: Applying Philosophy to the 21st Century
Quote: Middle age has been defined as what happens when a person's broad mind and narrow waist change places.

Author: Joan Miro
Quote: For me an object is something living. This cigarette or this box of matches contains a secret life much more intense than that of certain human beings.

Author: Bauvard,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you. You were lost in a daydream, when I walked in and you began screaming. But I know that could never actually happen. In real life I only enter people’s nightmares.

Author: Roald Dahl
Quote: I think probably kindness is my number one attribute in a human being. I'll put it before any of the things like courage or bravery or generosity or anything else.Brian Sibley: Or brains even?Oh gosh, yes, brains is one of the least. You can be a lovely person without brains, absolutely lovely. Kindness - that simple word. To be kind - it covers everything, to my mind.If you're kind that's it.

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: No one lives long enough to learn everything they need to learn starting from scratch. To be successful, we absolutely, positively have to find people who have already paid the price to learn the things that we need to learn to achieve our goals.

Author: Scott Westerfeld
Quote: Not everything made you stronger. It was possible to survive, yet still be crippled for your trouble. Sometimes it was okay to run away, to skip the test, to chicken out. Or at least to get some help.

Author: Leonard Nimoy
Quote: Live Long and Prosper

Author: Brian Tracy
Quote: Today the greatest single source of wealth is between your ears.

Author: Melina Marchetta,  Froi of the Exiles
Quote: Some of us weren't born for rewards, Froi. We were born for sacrifices.

Author: Kurt Vonnegut,  The Sirens of Titan
Quote: Mankind flung its advance agents ever outward, ever outward. Eventually it flung them out into space, into the colorless, tasteless, weightless sea of outwardness without end. It flung them like stones.

Author: Dorothy Thompson
Quote: Peace is not the absence of conflict but the presence of creative alternatives for responding to conflict -- alternatives to passive or aggressive responses, alternatives to violence.

Author: Gertrude Stein,  Tender Buttons
Quote: In the morning there is meaning, in the evening there is feeling.

Author: Tony McCollum
Quote: When people walk away from you, let them go. Your destiny is never tied to anyone who leaves you, and it doesn't mean they are bad people. It just means that their part in your story is over.

Author: Pablo
Quote: Stop searching the world for treasure, the real treasure is in yourself.

Author: Vicki Corona,  Tahitian Choreographies: Intermediate to Advanced Level Female Instruction
Quote: Remember that life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away!

Author: Slavoj Žižek
Quote: The fact that a cloud from a minor volcanic eruption in Iceland—a small disturbance in the complex mechanism of life on the Earth—can bring to a standstill the aerial traffic over an entire continent is a reminder of how, with all its power to transform nature, humankind remains just another species on the planet Earth.

Author: Banana Yoshimoto,  Kitchen
Quote: When was it I realized that, on this truly dark and solitary path we all walk, the only way we can light is our own? Although I was raised with love, I was always lonely.Someday, without fail, everyone will disappear, scattered into the blackness of time.

Author: Spider Robinson
Quote: …when writing, always hook the reader with your first sentence…in love, never settle…value yourself first and this will help you to value others…life is short, so enjoy it to the fullest…everyone in the world is different, and that’s ok…

Author: Miguel Syjuco,  Ilustrado
Quote: It kills me how these days everyone has clinical justification for their strangeness.

Author: Edgar Lee Masters,  Spoon River Anthology
Quote: To put meaning in one's life may end in madness,But life without meaning is the tortureOf restlessness and vague desire--It is a boat longing for the sea and yet afraid.

Author: Virginia Woolf,  Mrs. Dalloway
Quote: First a warning, musical; then the hour, irrevocable. The leaden circles dissolved in the air.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: Opportunity is not your opponent—it is your ally, but it’s hard to see that because opportunity is often camouflaged and hidden among danger and chaos.

Author: Guy de Maupassant
Quote: A human being - what is a human being? Everything and nothing. Through the power of thought it can mirror everything it experiences. Through memory and knowledge it becomes a microcosm, carrying the world within itself. A mirror of things, a mirror of facts. Each human being becomes a little universe within the universe!

Author: Ned Vizzini,  It's Kind of a Funny Story
Quote: It was almost like a reverse nightmare, like when you wake up from a nightmare, you're so relieved. I woke up into a nightmare.""And what is that nightmare, Craig?""Life.

Author: Martin Luther King Jr.
Quote: Like anybody, I would like to have a long life. Longevity has its place. But I'm not concerned about that now. I just want to do God's will.

Author: Marcia Lynn McClure
Quote: Sometimes just the tiniest allocation of time spent with a friend, imprints on your mind and gives you something to smile about for the rest of the week, month, or your life!

Author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh,  Gift from the Sea
Quote: The shape of my life is, of course, determined by many things; my background and childhood, my mind and its education, my conscience and its pressures, my heart and its desires.

Author: Charles M. Schulz
Quote: I'm dying and all I hear are insults!

Author: Julius Caesar
Quote: It is better to create than to learn! Creating is the essence of life.

Author: Douglas Coupland,  The Gum Thief
Quote: A few years ago it dawned on me that everybody past a certain age ... pretty much constantly dreams of being able to escape from their lives. They don't want to be who they are any more. They want out. This list includes Thurston Howell the Third, Ann-Margret, the cat members of Rent, Václav Havel, space shuttle astronauts and Snuffleupagus. It's universal.

Author: Adele Ashworth,  Winter Garden
Quote: Love expands your soul with something inexplicably fulfilling. If you die without ever having experienced it, you will miss life's only true joy

Author: Brian Celio
Quote: Just because you're scarred for life doesn't mean you should be scared to live.

Author: Andrew Davidson,  The Gargoyle
Quote: Heaven is an idea constructed by man to help him cope with the fact that life on earth is both brutally short and, paradoxically, far too long.

Author: Ken Kesey,  One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
Quote: But he won’t let the pain blot out the humor no more’n he’ll let the humor blot out the pain.

Author: Loretta Ellsworth,  In a Heartbeat
Quote: I look back to where my life had been. It's always risky to think of letting go. That's why this is the perfect ending. Nothing left to reconcile.

Author: Arthur Schopenhauer,  The World as Will and Representation, Vol 1
Quote: The life of every individual, viewed as a whole and in general, and when only its most significant features are emphasized, is really a tragedy; but gone through in detail it has the character of a comedy.

Author: Sarah Dessen,  This Lullaby
Quote: Maybe marriage, like life, isn't only about the big moments, whether they be good or bad. Maybe it's all the small things—like being guided slowly forward, surely, day after day—that stretches out to strengthen even the most tenuous bond.

Author: Solomon Northup,  Twelve Years a Slave
Quote: Life is dear to every living thing; the worm that crawls upon the ground will struggle for it.

Author: Voltaire
Quote: If we do not find anything very pleasant, at least we shall find something new.

Author: Ann Brashares,  The Second Summer of the Sisterhood
Quote: Lena knew she had spent too much of her life in a state of passive dread, just waiting for something bad to happen. In a life like that, relief was as close as you got to happiness.

Author: Jennifer Elisabeth,  Born Ready: Unleash Your Inner Dream Girl
Quote: I can do this… I can start over. I can save my own life and I’m never going to be alone as long as I have stars to wish on and people to still love.

Author: George Washington
Quote: My mother was the most beautiful woman I ever saw. All I am I owe to my mother. I attribute all my success in life to the moral, intellectual and physical education I received from her.

Author: Dale Carnegie
Quote: Today is life-the only life you are sure of. Make the most of today. Get interested in something. Shake yourself awake. Develop a hobby. Let the winds of enthusiasm sweep through you. Live today with gusto.

Author: Mitch Albom,  Tuesdays with Morrie
Quote: It’s very simple. As you grow, you learn more. If you stayed at twenty-two, you’d always be as ignorant as you were at twenty-two. Aging is not just decay, you know. It’s growth. It’s more than the negative that you’re going to die, it’s also the positive that you understand you’re going to die, and that you live a better life because of it.

Author: Katherine Paterson,  Bridge to Terabithia
Quote: Sometimes it seemed to him that his life was delicate as a dandelion. One little puff from any direction, and it was blown to bits.

Author: Mercedes Lackey,  Owlflight
Quote: To treat a person like a carpet, it is necessary that one do the walking, and one allow himself to be walked on.--Shin'a'in saying

Author: Elton John
Quote: Live for each second without hesitation

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Perfect Match
Quote: Life, it turns out, goes on. There is no cosmic rule that grants you immunity from the details just because you have come face-to-face with a catastrophe. The garbage can still overflow, the bills arrive in the mail, telemarketers, interrupt dinner.

Author: Paulo Coelho
Quote: Hide your craziness behind a beautiful smile. That's all you need.

Author: Toba Beta,  Master of Stupidity
Quote: Sometimes, some lies that spoken with high confidencecould be more receptive than facts that spoken with doubt.

Author: Robin Hobb,  Ship of Destiny
Quote: That is the challenge Companion. To take what has happened to you and learn from it. Nothing is quite so destructive as pity, especially self-pity. No event in life is so terrible that one cannot rise above it.

Author: Sholem Aleichem
Quote: Life is a dream for the wise, a game for the fool, a comedy for the rich, a tragedy for the poor.

Author: Tim Burton,  The Melancholy Death of Oyster Boy and Other Stories
Quote: Mr. Smith yelled at the doctor,What have you done to my boy?He's not flesh and blood,he's aluminum alloy!"The doctor said gently,What I'm going to saywill sound pretty wild.But you're not the father of this strange looking child.You see, there still is some questionabout the child's gender,but we think that its fatheris a microwave blender.

Author: Aleksandar Hemon,  The Lazarus Project
Quote: Your nightmares follow you like a shadow, forever.

Author: Conan O'Brien
Quote: Applaud my idiocy.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: What do you want a meaning for? Life is a desire, not a meaning.

Author: Mitch Albom,  The First Phone Call from Heaven
Quote: Sometimes, love brings you together even as life keeps you apart.

Author: Brian Andreas
Quote: Start here & go until you die, he said. What's so complicated about that?

Author: Ransom Riggs,  Miss Peregrine’s Home for Peculiar Children
Quote: If I never went home, what exactly would I be missing? I pictured my cold cavernous house, my friendless town full of bad memories, the utterly unremarkable life that had been mapped out for me. It had never once occurred to me, I realized, to refuse it.

Author: Kami Garcia,  Beautiful Creatures
Quote: It’s funny how you can live somewhere your whole life, but not really see it.

Author: Veronica Roth,  Insurgent
Quote: Because inside me is a beast that snarls, and growls, and strains toward freedom.. and as hard as I try, I cannot kill it.

Author: Peter Marshall
Quote: The world has enough women who know how to be smart. It needs women who are willing to be simple. The world has enough women who know how to be brilliant. It needs some who will be brave. The world has enough women who are popular. It needs more who are pure. We need women, and men, too, who would rather be morally right than socially correct.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  A Wild Sheep Chase
Quote: My biggest fault is that the faults I was born with grow bigger each year.

Author: Lao Tzu
Quote: In the end,The treasure of life is missed by those who hold on and gained by those who let go.

Author: Cecelia Ahern
Quote: At moments when life is at its worst there are two things you can do: 1.) break down,lose hope and refuse to go on while lying face down on the ground banging your fists and kicking your legs, or 2.) laugh. Bobby and I did the latter.

Author: Daniel Radcliffe
Quote: Go boldly and honestly through the world. Learn to love the fact that there is nobody else quite like you.

Author: George Gordon Byron,  Poetical Works
Quote: We'll Go No More A-rovingSo, we'll go no more a-rovingSo late into the night,Though the heart still be as loving,And the moon still be as bright.For the sword outwears its sheath,And the soul wears out the breast,And the heart must pause to breathe,And love itself have rest.Though the night was made for loving,And the day returns too soon,Yet we'll go no more a-rovingBy the light of the moon.

Author: Frank Herbert,  Dune Messiah
Quote: The flesh surrenders itself. Eternity takes back its own. Our bodies stirred these waters briefly, danced with a certain intoxication before the love of life and self, dealt with a few strange ideas, then submitted to the instruments of Time. What can we say of this? I occurred. I am not...yet, I occurred.

Author: Pablo
Quote: Regardless of Sunshine or Rain, Be Thankful for another GREAT day…and treat Life as the ULTIMATE Gift.... Because IT IS :)

Author: Dalai Lama XIV
Quote: Life is as dear to a mute creature as it is to man. Just as one wants happiness and fears pain, just as one wants to live and not die, so do other creatures.

Author: Jodi Picoult,  Plain Truth
Quote: She shrugged. "You can be happy for someone else's good fortune, but that doesn't mean you forget your own bad luck.

Author: Lauren Myracle,  Shine
Quote: If everyone started off the day singing, just think how happy they'd be.

Author: Gabrielle Zevin
Quote: In the end, the end of a life only matters to friends, family, and other folks you used to know. For everyone else, it's just another end.

Author: Bertrand Russell
Quote: Those who have never known the deep intimacy and the intense companionship of mutual love have missed the best thing that life has to give.

Author: Matty Healy
Quote: Life’s too short to drink crappy coffee and cry over boys who don’t care.

Author: Carlos María Domínguez,  The House of Paper
Quote: To build up a library is to create a life. It's never just a random collection of books.

Author: Lorraine Heath,  Surrender to the Devil
Quote: Life is a journey, Frannie darling,"Feagan had once told me. "Choose well those with whom you travel."As always, I've followed Feagan's counsel.

Author: Omar Khayyám
Quote: This worldthat was our homefor a brief spellnever brought us anythingbut pain and grief;its a shame that not one of our problemswas ever solved.We departwith a thousand regretsin our hearts.

Author: C.S. Lewis
Quote: The human heart is not unchanging (nay, changes almost out of recognition in the twinkling of an eye)...

Author: Jean-Paul Sartre,  No Exit
Quote: I never could bear the idea of anyone's expecting something from me. Italways made me want to do just the opposite.

Author: Ray Bradbury,  Fahrenheit 451
Quote: I just want someone to hear what I have to say. And maybe if I talk long enough, it’ll make sense.

Author: Aleksandar Hemon,  The Lazarus Project
Quote: All the lives I could live, all the people I will never know, never will be, they are everywhere. That is all that the world is.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: A little part of me dies every time I try to commit suicide. If life is a buffet, I’m still in the mac and cheese phase. Maybe one day I’ll mature into more of a meatloaf kind of guy.

Author: Haruki Murakami,  Kafka on the Shore
Quote: I don’t know what it means to live.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: It’s 4:00 in the afternoon and I’m just now putting on clothes. The life of a writer is as free as the pizza I just had delivered is not.

Author: Michael Landon Jr.
Quote: Somebody should tell us, right at the start of our lives, that we are dying. Then we might live life to the limit, every minute of every day. Do it! I say. Whatever you want to do, do it now! There are only so many tomorrows.

Author: Morgan Rhodes,  Falling Kingdoms
Quote: You must draw from that strength. You must increase it. And you must hold on to it because sometimes that small glimmer of inner strength is all that we have to help us press forward through the darkness.

Author: Wendy Wasserstein
Quote: Don't live down to expectations. Go out there and do something remarkable.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book is Not FOR SALE
Quote: If I saw a hitchhiker wearing a tie-dyed shirt, I’d assume he’s been waiting for a ride since the 1960s. I think that kind of patience is groovy.

Author: Charlie Kaufman,  Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind: The Shooting Script
Quote: CLEMENTINE: This is it, Joel. It's going to be gone soon.JOEL: I know.CLEMENTINE: What do we do?JOEL: Enjoy it.

Author: Aidan Chambers,  Dying to Know You
Quote: Sometimes the course of our lives depends on what we do or don't do in a few seconds, a heartbeat, when we either seize the opportunity, or just miss it. Miss the moment and you never get a chance again.

Author: Amit Ray
Quote: Life is a mystery- mystery of beauty, bliss and divinity. Meditation is the art of unfolding that mystery.

Author: Gena Showalter,  The Darkest Night
Quote: That means life itself is a fairy tale. Like the characters, we all live and love and search for a happily-ever-after.

Author: Solomon Ortiz
Quote: Education is the key to success in life, and teachers make a lasting impact in the lives of their students.

Author: Wayne Dyer
Quote: Strong emotions such as passion and bliss are indications that you're connected to Spirit, or 'inspired,' if you will. When you're inspired, you activate dormant forces, and the abundance you seek in any form comes streaming into your life.

Author: Jules Renard
Quote: As I grow to understand life less and less,I learn to love it more and more.

Author: Virginia Woolf,  Orlando
Quote: The flower bloomed and faded. The sun rose and sank. The lover loved and went. And what the poets said in rhyme, the young translated into practice.

Author: prixie
Quote: Single is not a status, it is a word that describes a person who is strong enough to live and enjoy life without depending on others.

Author: David Levithan,  Dash & Lily's Book of Dares
Quote: I'm told there's no going back. So I'm choosing forward.

Author: Steve Jobs
Quote: Don't be trapped by dogma — which is living with the results of other people's thinking.

Author: Mitch Albom
Quote: Everyone is in such a hurry. People haven’t found meaning in their lives, so they’re running all the time looking for it. They think the next car, the next house, the next job. Then they find those things are empty, too, and they keep running. Once you start running, it’s hard to slow yourself down.

Author: Rabih Alameddine,  Koolaids: The Art of War
Quote: I wonder if being sane means disregarding the chaos that is life, pretending only an infinitesimal segment of it is reality.

Author: Morrissey
Quote: There's so much destruction all over the world - and all you can do is complain about ME!

Author: Ravi Zacharias
Quote: You can only learn so much from books. You can only learn so much from education. Ultimately, it is the wisdom of God that will carry you through in the toughest situations of life.

Author: David Wroblewski,  The Story of Edgar Sawtelle
Quote: Life was a swarm of accidents waiting in the treetops, descending upon any living thing that passed, ready to eat them alive. You swam in a river of chance and coincidence. You clung to the happiest accidents- the rest you let float by.

Author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass
Quote: There are some places in life where you can only go alone. Embrace the beauty of your solo journey.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Has No Title
Quote: My name is a half an hour early, but my body is on time.

Author: Pablo
Quote: Everyday it gets easier to connect with an electronic device that it is to connect with real people.

Author: Masashi Kishimoto
Quote: You said you want to became Hokage. I have become the Kazekage. If you are willing to bear the name Kage, you have to do what you must do.

Author: Michel Houellebecq,  Whatever
Quote: An entire life spent reading would have fulfilled my every desire; I already knew that at the age of seven. The texture of the world is painful, inadequate; unalterable, or so it seems to me. Really, I believe that an entire life spent reading would have suited me best. Such a life has not been granted me...

Author: Michael Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night. The best day of my life was when I taught you how to juggle, but the best day of yours was when you taught someone else.

Author: Gregory Maguire,  A Lion Among Men
Quote: Remember to breathe. It is after all, the secret of life.

Author: Morgan Matson,  Second Chance Summer
Quote: What was the point of trying to run away if people were going to insist on reminding you of what you were running from?

Author: Kevin Smith
Quote: AZRAEL:No pleasure, no rapture, no exquisite sin greater... than central air.

Author: Jess Walter,  Beautiful Ruins
Quote: All we have is the story we tell. Everything we do, every decision we make, our strength, weakness, motivation, history, and character-what we believe-none of it is real; it's all part of the story we tell. But here's the thing: it's our goddamned story!

Author: Ernesto Sabato
Quote: Lo esperado no sucede. Es lo inesperado lo que acontece.

Author: David Olguín
Quote: Sin sorpresas, aunque sean disagredables, nadie estaria dispuesto a vivir.

Author: Tiger Woods
Quote: If you are given a chance to be a role model, I think you should always take it because you can influence a person's life in a positive light, and that's what I want to do. That's what it's all about.

Author: Alden Nowlan
Quote: Growing up is never straight forward.There are moments when everything is fine, and other moments where you realize that there are certain memories that you'll never get back, and certain people that are going to change, and the hardest part is knowing thatthere's nothing you can do except watch them.

Author: Nicholson Baker,  The Anthologist
Quote: But spending your life concentrating on death is like watching a whole movie and thinking only about the credits that are going to roll at the end. It’s a mistake of emphasis.

Author: Toba Beta,  Master of Stupidity
Quote: Every man should believe in something.If not..he would doubt everything, even himself.

Author: Rene Denfeld,  The Enchanted
Quote: I would think for hours how strange it was that some parts of words are silent, just like some parts of our lives. Did the people who wrote the dictionaries decide to mirror language to our lives, or did it just happen that way?

Author: Diablo Cody
Quote: When you're in a competitive environment, always give out the impression that you don't care. It makes people want you more. If you act desperate, it's over. I think a passive attitude is helpful. It comes naturally because I'm lazy.

Author: Philip K. Dick,  Flow My Tears, the Policeman Said
Quote: To live is to be haunted.

Author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
Quote: Let mental culture go on advancing, let the natural sciences progress in even greater extent and depth, and the human mind widen itself as much as it desires: beyond the elevation and moral culture of Christianity, as it shines forth in the Gospels, it will not go.

Author: George Harrison
Quote: Some things take so longBut how do I explainWhen not too many peopleCan see we're all the sameAnd because of all their tearsYour eyes can't hope to seeThe beauty that surrounds themNow, isn't it a pity

Author: Mr. Nobody
Quote: Every path is the right path. Everything could've been anything else. And it would have just as much meaning.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: If you want to find happiness, find gratitude.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: Participate in your dreams today. There are unlimited opportunities available with this new day. Take action on those wonderful dreams you've had in your mind for so long. Remember, success is something you experience when you act accordingly.

Author: Friedrich Nietzsche
Quote: The overman...Who has organized the chaos of his passions, given style to his character, and become creative. Aware of life's terrors, he affirms life without resentment.

Author: John Henry Jowett
Quote: Life without thankfulness is devoid of love and passion. Hope without thankfulness is lacking in fine perception. Faith without thankfulness lacks strength and fortitude. Every virtue divorced from thankfulness is maimed and limps along the spiritual road.

Author: Bob Feller
Quote: Every day is a new opportunity. You can build on yesterday's success or put its failures behind and start over again. That's the way life is, with a new game every day, and that's the way baseball is.

Author: Stella Adler
Quote: The word theatre comes from the Greeks. It means the seeing place. It is the place people come to see the truth about life and the social situation.

Author: Poppy Z. Brite,  Lost Souls
Quote: If you want something, you don't wait for the world to deal it out for you. You take it.

Author: Nicole Krauss,  The History of Love
Quote: That's what I do. Watch movies and read. Sometimes I even pretend to write, but I'm not fooling anyone. Oh, and I go to the mailbox.

Author: Spurious quote attributed to George Washington but never said by him .
Quote: A free people ought not only to be armed and disciplined, but they should have sufficient arms and ammunition to maintain a status of independence from any who might attempt to abuse them, which would include their own government

Author: Sarah Dessen
Quote: It seemed like this day could go in so many directions, like a spiderweb shooting out toward endless possibilities. Whenever you made a choice, especially one you'd been resisting, it always affected everything else, some in big ways, like a tremor beneath your feet, others in so tiny a shift you hardly noticed a change at all. But it was happening.

Author: Alain de Botton
Quote: Feeling lost, crazy and desperate belongs to a good life as much as optimism, certainty and reason.

Author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy
Quote: Tell me that the purpose of life is to have fun, and without a care in the world I'll begin wreaking havoc on everything I pass. Now that's what I call pure, honest fun.

Author: Jackie Robinson
Quote: A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives.

Author: Thomas Gray,  An Elegy Written In A Country Churchyard
Quote: Full many a gem of purest ray sereneThe dark unfathom'd caves of ocean bear:Full many a flower is born to blush unseen,And waste its sweetness on the desert air.

Author: Jason Mraz
Quote: Some of us go full circle. Some of us blindly go nowhere. The circle doesn’t have to be very large to make a point, kick your ass and/or be entertaining. Remember that and stay light. Even the deaf know good music when they hear it.

Author: Bruce Sterling
Quote: You know what's truly weird about any financial crisis? We made it up. Currency, money, finance, they're all social inventions. When the sun comes up in the morning it's shining on the same physical landscape, all the atoms are in place.

Author: Jack Gilbert,  The Dance Most of All: Poems
Quote: Waking At NightThe blue river is grey at morningand evening. There is twilightat dawn and dusk. I lie in the darkwondering if this quiet in me nowis a beginning or an end.

Author: Cara Delevingne
Quote: I wish my school days could have dragged on a little longer, or that I could go back and do it later in life.

Author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience
Quote: A new day: Be open enough to see opportunities. Be wise enough to be grateful. Be courageous enough to be happy.

Author: Deb Caletti,  Honey, Baby, Sweetheart
Quote: To an untrained eye, need and love were as easily mistaken for each other as the real master's painting and a forgery.

Author: Steve Maraboli
Quote: The power to change your life lies in the simplest of steps.

Author: Lemmy Kilmister
Quote: In my life so far, I have discovered that there are really only two kinds of people: those who are for you, and those who are against you. Learn to recognize them, for they are often and easily mistaken for each other.

Author: Andrew Matthews
Quote: People who do not love themselves can adore others, because adoration is making someone else big and ourselves small. They can desire others, because desire comes out of sense of inner incompleteness, which demands to be filled. But they can not love others, because love is an affirmation of the living growing being in all of us. If you don’t have it, you cant give it.

Author: Milan Kundera,  The Book of Laughter and Forgetting
Quote: ...because love is continual interrogation. I don't know of a better definition of love.

Author: Criss Jami,  Venus in Arms
Quote: With a hint of good judgment, to fear nothing, not failure or suffering or even death, indicates that you value life the most. You live to the extreme; you push limits; you spend your time building legacies. Those do not die.

Author: Michael Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night. We watched pornography together, but purely for the storyline.

Author: David Guterson,  Snow Falling on Cedars
Quote: To deny that there was this dark side of life would be like pretending that the cold of winter was somehow only a temporary illusion, a way station on the way to the higher "reality"of long, warm, pleasant summers. But summer, it turned out, was no more real than the snow that melted in wintertime.

Author: Cecelia Ahern,  The Book of Tomorrow
Quote: As the rain falls and the sun shines, they grow, grow, grow; minds so open, they go through life aware and accepting, seeing light where there's dark, seeing possibility in dead ends, tasting victory as others spit out failure, questioning where others accept. Just a little less jaded, a little less cynical.

Author: Steven Tyler
Quote: Every life has a measure of sorrow, and sometimes this is what awakens us.

Author: James Hilton,  Random Harvest
Quote: Have you ever been going somewhere with a crowd and you're certain it's the wrong road and you tell them, but they won't listen, so you just have to plod along in what you know is the wrong direction till somebody more important gets the same idea?

Author: Carrie Ryan,  The Dead-Tossed Waves
Quote: But of course everything presses forward, even as we dig our feet against the reality of it all.

Author: Samantha Sotto,  Before Ever After
Quote: If we accept time for what it is, how it flows and how we flow with it, I doubt very much that would continue wasting loads of it by constantly checking our watches.

Author: Yvonne Wood,  Dead Beautiful
Quote: There are no such things as curses; only people and their decisions

Author: Louisa May Alcott,  Little Women
Quote: I never wanted to go away, and the hard part now is the leaving you all. I'm not afraid, but it seems as if I should be homesick for you even in heaven.

Author: Amy Summers,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night.. You were playing with chicken livers and told me everyone was in quarantine.

Author: أحمد خالد توفيق
Quote: هؤلاء يوصلونك للحظة تسكت فيها من الاشمئزاز .. فيحسبون انهم انتصروا و افحموك ...

Author: Mick Jagger
Quote: It's all right letting yourself go, as long as you can get yourself back.

Author: Windry Ramadhina,  Orange
Quote: Lucu, terkadang manusia tidak menyadari apa yang sesungguhnya mereka inginkan sebelum benar-benar kehilangan.

Author: Mario Puzo
Quote: He'd always been a man who followed his head and not his heart.The heart was just a bloody motor.The head was meant to drive

Author: ياسر حارب,  على لسان الطائر الأزرق
Quote: المدينة التي تزدحم فيها الطرقات تزدحم فيها الأفكار وكلّما حلّقت في سماءها طائرة حلّقت أمامها أمنية لتدلّها على الطريق

Author: Jarod Kintz,  The Merits of Marthaism, and How Being Named Susan Can Benefit You
Quote: Riding a bicycle makes you impotent. That’s why I carry a bicycle seat in my pocket—because it’s better than wearing a condom.

Author: Nicole McKay,  I Had a Dream About You
Quote: I had a dream about you last night.. you were trying to give coordinates to an apple

Author: Jonathan Tropper
Quote: Sometimes it’s heartbreaking to see your siblings as the people they’ve become. Maybe that’s why we all stay away from each other as a matter of course.

Author: L.M. Montgomery,  Anne of Green Gables
Quote: ...Isn't it splendid to think of all the things there are to find out about? It just makes me feel glad to be alive--it's such an interesting world. It wouldn't be half so interesting if we knew all about everything, would it? There'd be no scope for imagination then, would there?

Author: Morrissey
Quote: I was wasting my life, always thinking about myself.

Author: Sidney Crosby
Quote: Whether you're trying to learn in hockey or trying to learn in life, I've always tried to be observant and tried to learn more, tried to evolve, whether it's as a hockey player or as a person. With each year, I try to do that.

Author: Samantha Sotto,  Before Ever After
Quote: Life is a barter of choice and consequences.

Author: Jess C. Scott,  Clear: A Guide to Treating Acne Naturally
Quote: Be patient. Your skin took a while to deteriorate. Give it some time to reflect a calmer inner state. As one of my friends states on his Facebook profile: "The true Losers in Life, are not those who Try and Fail, but those who Fail to Try.

Author: Sophie Kinsella,  Twenties Girl
Quote: Life is like an escalator. You see, it carries you on regardless. And you might as well enjoy the view and seize every opportunity while you're passing. Otherwise, it'll be too late.

Author: Katherine Center,  Everyone Is Beautiful
Quote: Nobody was perfect. Not even close. And everybody had wrinkles from smiling and squinting and craining their necks. Everybody has marks on their bodies from years of living- a trail of life left on them. Evidence of all the adventures and sleepless nights and practical jokes and heartbreaks that had made them who they are.

Author: Lynn Johnston
Quote: An apology is the superglue of life! It can repair just about anything!!

Author: Andrew Marvell,  To His Coy Mistress
Quote: Had we but world enough and time, This coyness, lady, were no crime. We would sit down, and think which way To walk, and pass our long love’s day.

Author: The Killers,  The Killers, Hot Fuss
Quote: If you can't hold on, hold on

Author: Robert Fulghum,  It Was on Fire When I Lay Down on It
Quote: I often say that I don't worry about the meaning of life--I can't handle that big stuff. What concerns me is the meaning in life--day by day, hour by hour, while I'm doing whatever it is that I do. What counts is not what I do, but how I think about myself while I'm doing it.

Author: Tariq Ramadan
Quote: Cultures, along with the religions that shape and nurture them, are value systems, sets of traditions and habits clustered around one or several languages, producing meaning: for the self, for the here and now, for the community, for life.

Author: Clive Barker,  The Great and Secret Show
Quote: Is there any good news?' Tesla said.Who ever promised that? Who ever said there'd be  good  news?

Author: Eric Roth
Quote: For what it’s worth: it’s never too late to be whoever you want to be. I hope you live a life you’re proud of, and if you find that you’re not, I hope you have the strength to start all over again.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  Love quotes for the ages. And the ageless sages.
Quote: Leave me with my leftover meatloaf and my Yesterday Sandwich. I’ll be in love tomorrow, if you come back with the ketchup.

Author: Jerry Spinelli,  Love, Stargirl
Quote: I felt alone on the planet, drifting through the cosmos. With both hands I reached out to the night. There was no answer. Or maybe I just couldn't hear it.

Author: Chad Sugg
Quote: My body is an ugly masterpiece that lives off the beauty of sound.

Author: Ryan Sheckler
Quote: My life path has been a blessing and a great learning experience. Skateboarding is my passion and I don't see that changing. When I'm not skating, I love to surf. I'm open to the new experiences and opportunities.

Author: John Green,  Will Grayson, Will Grayson
Quote: Long week. Long month. Long life.

Author: Chris Cleave,  Little Bee
Quote: We were exiles from reality that summer. We were refugees from ourselves.

Author: Ann Landers
Quote: If you have love in your life it can make up for a great many things you lack. If you don't have it, no matter what else there is, it's not enough.

Author: Hubert H. Humphrey
Quote: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.

Author: Ginnifer Goodwin
Quote: You know, one of my biggest dreams in life is to play a Disney princess.

Author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky
Quote: It seems, in fact, as though the second half of a man's life is made up of nothing, but the habits he has accumulated during the first half.

Author: Stephen Covey
Quote: You can retire from a job, but don't ever retire from making extremely meaningful contributions in life.

Author: Deepak Chopra
Quote: The masculine energy was about survival. The male was the hunter who risked his life and had to be in the fight-flight mode.

Author: Marilyn Manson
Quote: I feel like I've dreamed half of my life that hasn't happened yet, so a lot of times I'm going along, and I do stuff, and I know that I've done it. I have deja vus more than I have regular experiences. If half of your day is a deja vu, then you start to wonder, 'What is real and what isn't?'

Author: Joan Cusack
Quote: I think just because life is hard, it does seem fun to have a break and laugh about things, so I think in the end, my instincts go there.

Author: Charles R. Swindoll
Quote: I cannot even imagine where I would be today were it not for that handful of friends who have given me a heart full of joy. Let's face it, friends make life a lot more fun.

Author: Marilyn Monroe
Quote: Sometimes I feel my whole life has been one big rejection.

Author: Ann Landers
Quote: If you have love in your life, it can make up for a great many things that are missing. If you don't have love in your life, no matter what else there is, it's not enough.

Author: Voltaire
Quote: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well.

Author: Sylvester Stallone
Quote: When you're on top and you lead the parade, everyone's there throwing lilies and lilac water on your head. But when those parades have gone by and there's a storm in your heart, there are very few people that are going to sit there and listen to you bemoan life.

Author: Desmond Tutu
Quote: Your ordinary acts of love and hope point to the extraordinary promise that every human life is of inestimable value.

Author: Lady Gaga
Quote: I am my own sanctuary and I can be reborn as many times as I choose throughout my life.

Author: Robert Byrne
Quote: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.

Author: Drew Houston
Quote: Instead of trying to make your life perfect, give yourself the freedom to make it an adventure, and go ever upward.

Author: Robert Griffin III
Quote: Every time you step on the football field in between those lines you're putting your life, your career, every single ligament in your body in jeopardy.

Author: Martin Jacques
Quote: Stuart Hall was an utterly unique figure. Although he arrived at the age of 19 from Jamaica and spent the rest of his life here, he never felt at home in Britain. This juxtaposition was a crucial source of his strength and originality. Because of his colour and origin, he saw the country differently - not as a native, but as an outsider.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Has No Title
Quote: The first door in the hall leads to youth, the second door leads to middle age, and the third door leads to the bathroom. But knock first, because I think grandpa’s in there.

Author: Amy Chua
Quote: For my senior prom, my father finally said I could go - as long as I was home by 9 P.M.! That was around the time that most people were heading out. When I was little I was so mad at them all the time. 'Why can't I do this?' 'Why are there so many rules?' But looking back now, my parents gave me the foundation to have so many choices in life.

Author: Joseph Campbell
Quote: Your life is the fruit of your own doing. You have no one to blame but yourself.

Author: Hugh Dillon
Quote: Life is too short to spend in negativity. So I have made a conscious effort to not be where I don't want to be.

Author: Lucille Ball
Quote: In life, all good things come hard, but wisdom is the hardest to come by.

Author: Benjamin Disraeli
Quote: Life is too short to be little. Man is never so manly as when he feels deeply, acts boldly, and expresses himself with frankness and with fervor.

Author: Franz Kafka
Quote: We are sinful not only because we have eaten of the Tree of Knowledge, but also because we have not yet eaten of the Tree of Life. The state in which we are is sinful, irrespective of guilt.

Author: Young Jeezy
Quote: I think I got a lot of life skills; I got a lot of wisdom; I've seen a lot of bad things happen to a lot of good people.

Author: Bob Marley
Quote: Everything is political. I will never be a politician or even think political. Me just deal with life and nature. That is the greatest thing to me.

Author: Henry Ward Beecher
Quote: We sleep, but the loom of life never stops, and the pattern which was weaving when the sun went down is weaving when it comes up in the morning.

Author: Mena Suvari
Quote: A year or so ago I went through all the people in my life and asked myself: does this person inspire me, genuinely love me and support me unconditionally? I wanted nothing but positive influences in my life.

Author: Kanye West
Quote: If you have the opportunity to play this game of life you need to appreciate every moment. a lot of people don't appreciate the moment until it's passed.

Author: Jarod Kintz,  This Book Has No Title
Quote: Are you an Is there? or a There isn’t! kind of person? I’m more of an Is there isn’t? kind of guy.

Author: Janice Dickinson
Quote: The past explains how I got here, but the future is up to me - and I love to live life at full throttle.

Author: Alice Dreger
Quote: You can't go into new life experiences without the understanding that yeah, you may fail, but knowing you might fail can't stop you from trying.

Author: Michael Morpurgo
Quote: Don't worry about writing a book or getting famous or making money. Just lead an interesting life.

Author: Arthur Ashe
Quote: From what we get, we can make a living; what we give, however, makes a life.

Author: Henri Frederic Amiel
Quote: Life is short and we have never too much time for gladdening the hearts of those who are travelling the dark journey with us. Oh be swift to love, make haste to be kind.

Author: Isaac Bashevis Singer
Quote: Kindness, I've discovered, is everything in life.

Author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
Quote: The bird is powered by its own life and by its motivation.

Author: Isaac Asimov
Quote: Life is pleasant. Death is peaceful. It's the transition that's troublesome.

Author: Vladimir Nabokov
Quote: Life is a great sunrise. I do not see why death should not be an even greater one.

Author: Henry David Thoreau
Quote: I went to the woods because I wished to live deliberately, to front only the essential facts of life, and see if I could not learn what it had to teach, and not, when I came to die, discover that I had not lived.

Author: Alice Roosevelt Longworth
Quote: I have a simple philosophy: Fill what's empty. Empty what's full. Scratch where it itches.

Author: Irving Berlin
Quote: Life is 10 percent what you make it, and 90 percent how you take it.

Author: Albert Einstein
Quote: The monotony and solitude of a quiet life stimulates the creative mind.

Author: Charlie Chaplin
Quote: Life is a tragedy when seen in close-up, but a comedy in long-shot.

Author: Langston Hughes
Quote: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.

Author: Robert Byrne
Quote: The purpose of life is a life of purpose.

Author: Publilius Syrus
Quote: Each day is the scholar of yesterday.

Author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.
Quote: Life is painting a picture, not doing a sum.

Author: Bella Thorne
Quote: Everyone suffers some injustice in life, and what better motivation than to help others not suffer in the same way.

Author: Horace Walpole
Quote: The whole secret of life is to be interested in one thing profoundly and in a thousand things well.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Life imitates art far more than art imitates Life.

Author: Anais Nin
Quote: People living deeply have no fear of death.

Author: Alan Alda
Quote: Be brave enough to live life creatively. The creative place where no one else has ever been.

Author: William Shakespeare
Quote: I bear a charmed life.

Author: Oscar Wilde
Quote: Life is far too important a thing ever to talk seriously about.

Author: Martin Luther King, Jr.
Quote: The quality, not the longevity, of one's life is what is important.

Author: Wayne Dyer
Quote: The essential lesson I've learned in life is to just be yourself. Treasure the magnificent being that you are and recognize first and foremost you're not here as a human being only. You're a spiritual being having a human experience.

Author: Seneca
Quote: Begin at once to live, and count each separate day as a separate life.

Author: Stephen Covey
Quote: There are three constants in life... change, choice and principles.

Author: John Wooden
Quote: All of life is peaks and valleys. Don't let the peaks get too high and the valleys too low.

Author: Mel Brooks
Quote: Look, I don't want to wax philosophic, but I will say that if you're alive you've got to flap your arms and legs, you've got to jump around a lot, for life is the very opposite of death, and therefore you must at very least think noisy and colorfully, or you're not alive.

Author: Frank Lloyd Wright
Quote: Give me the luxuries of life and I will willingly do without the necessities.

Author: Mark Twain
Quote: When we remember we are all mad, the mysteries disappear and life stands explained.

Author: Marcus Aurelius
Quote: The art of living is more like wrestling than dancing.
